story:
Dualomo™ Hybrid Board

This campaign is closed but you can still order through www.bustinboards.com - https://bustinboards.com/products/dualomo-hybrid-pre-order

Meet the Dualomo™ Hybrid, the world’s first electric board that pushes, carves & pumps more like a traditional board while ALSO offering a high-performance electric mode that rivals any e-board on the market.  

THE CAMPAIGN IS CLOSED, BUT YOU CAN STILL ORDER THROUGH WWW.BUSTINBOARDS.COM.

Designed and produced in collaboration with Bustin Boards Co, a 17-year-old specialty skateboard company founded in Brooklyn, NY with more than 50,000 customers worldwide!  

Hand-crafted in the USA with components from the best brands in the industry!  The Dualomo™ Hybrid board is hand-made and hand-assembled in the USA, with more than 70% of raw materials & parts sourced domestically.    We're proud and confident to work with awesome brands like Bustin Boards, Paris Trucks, Five-O Wheels and Samsung!  Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to follow our manufacturing process!

What makes it a "Hybrid Board"? 
We heard the call of riders who wanted a power-assist function for up hills and long commutes, but who insist that PUSHING and PUMPING are still essential elements of all skateboarding.  In response, we designed a hub-motor drivetrain and board design that is easier to push and pump than any electric skateboard you've tried, period. 

How does it work?
We started with a brushless motor design which, unlike most electric boards, uses NO belts or gears that slow you down.  We spent over a year developing and refining our system, which dramatically reduces the drag and friction found in most brushless motor designs. For a crucial final touch we partnered with Bustin Boards to create an ultra-light, ultra-low, ultra-skate-friendly board and setup to make this the easiest electric board you'll ever push whether the power is on or off. 

It's a powerful electric vehicle when you want it to be while maintaining the feel and responsiveness of a high-performance traditional longboard.  Hence we dubbed it the "Dualomo Hybrid".

   

Different From The Ground Up

We rode every brand-name electric board on the market and were left bored time after time.  None of them pushed, pumped or carved like the traditional boards we were used to.  They were stiff, heavy and unresponsive;  and generally made us feel like crash test dummies riding on the hood of a lawnmower holding a Wii controller (you get the point).  

We had a vision for something more lively, more practical and more like a skateboard.  Tired of waiting, we began developing our own design and technology.  After a year of perfecting our electronics, we teamed up with Bustin Boards to create a board unlike anything we've seen before;  a hard-carving, push-friendly, ultra-fast hybrid electric skateboard.

Today the final production model is complete and we are ready to change the way real riders think about electric skateboards.  The Dualomo™ Hybrid will be hand-crafted in the USA with 70% of raw parts sourced here, making it a safe bet for our backers!  All of our tooling and molds are COMPLETE and we're ready to roll with final production in October, with ALL boards shipping in March (or sooner)!    

The Dualomo™ Hybrid WILL SHIP WORLDWIDE from our US-based production facility.  International shipping is just $75 and we will use FedEx™ Air for fast, reliable delivery.  Also, if you live in the USA, shipping is just $25!

Help us get it off the ground here on Indiegogo and we'll reward you with a deal that will make your friends jealous for years to come.  Thanks!

 

3 MODELS TO CHOOSE FROM

 

 

HOW THE DUALOMO HYBRID-X MODEL STACKS UP TO COMPETITION

 

RIDER TESTIMONIALS

Follow us on Instagram & Facebook for your chance to demo the Dualomo Hybrid.

“I have been skating longer than electric boards have been a thing but it’s always been a concept that fascinated me. The dream of effortlessly coasting back up to the top of the run on the same board you ripped down it always seemed like the perfect way to maximize your actual skate time. As E-Boards have quickly become a thing in today’s market, no boards until the Dualomo quite met the qualifications demanded by my self and other real skaters out there. Finally, we now have a fully functional skateboard that can double as a commute crushing machine.”
Josh - Apex, NC

“I definitely had a blast with the hybrid board. I loved its ability to shoot quickly up hills and just its over all speed was awesome. The fact that it can be used as a traditional longboard is sick!”
Riley - Greencastle PA

“As a guy in my mid 40’s, I had the opportunity to test the new Dualomo Hybrid recently.  I’m a longtime supporter of the longboard culture but given work, family and lots of other competing interests have never found the time to ride much.  The new board instantly captured my attention.  The ride was smooth, effortless and incredibly intuitive.  With other electric rides that I’ve tested, the motor noticeably slowed downhill cruising.  This board is like riding a non-powered setup down the hills in my hometown.  I can definitely see using this for years to come, both as a weekend ride and even a daily commuter for my trip to work.” 
Kris - Park City, UT

"I had a bunch of longboards in high school and college but, at 23, I thought I had outgrown the stage.  The Dualomo brought back everything I loved about longboarding and more.  Thanks for letting me demo the board and I'll definitely be picking one up to ride to work!"
Meghan - Mclean, VA

"I didn't know what to expect from an electric board after being a traditional skateboarder my whole life.  Honestly its much more fun that I ever expected.  It reminds of snowboarding, skating and surfer all rolled into one.  The quality of everything was great and the power was tremendous, even up hill."
Mike - Hagerstown, MD

"I've been skating since the 1970's and have seen a lot of changes in the industry.  By far, the most exciting is the evolution to an electric-power board that I can ride downhill, push on flat ground, as well as glide up hills!  When I'm on the Dualomo, I feel like I'm surfing an endless wave.  Carving turns down hills, pushing through town, or ripping up inclines give the same feelings of freedom that caused me to fall in love with skateboarding!  There are many options out there for electric boards, but the way that the Dualomo carves is second to none.  I recommend this board to anyone, from beginners to those riding for years."
John - Vienna, VA

Frequently Asked Questions

 

When does my board deliver?
As many of our you have heard we've made great strides on our manufacturing and are now shipping in January 2019.  We are aware that some of the perk items still read "March 2019".  This is because we CANNOT alter the written details of products that have already been purchased.  REST ASSURED, that we are aiming to ship ALL boards ordered through the campaign in January!

Why did you make it?
As riders, we've watched as the race towards tech has over-shadowed a clear lack of functional design in every new electric board to hit the market.  Like all skaters, snowboarders and surfers, we have dreamt of the perpetual concrete wave.  We were excited about the innovations we saw with electric boards, but every new option to hit the market left us bored time after time.  Before long all of the brand-name, expensive boards we thought we'd love ended up unused, piled in the back of our garage.

It was then that we realized that it was our calling to make a GREAT electric board that skated like a GREAT skateboard or longboard.  Two years later, here we are and we could not be more proud and excited to bring the Dualomo Hybrid to all of you!  

 

I see you have 3 models, which is the right one for me?
This is a question we are getting a lot and its kind of hard to answer.  Some of it depends on your budget and some of depends on your needs for speed/range.  Like all inventors, we started out aiming for the moon and wanted to produce a board with better specs than our competition.  After about 10 prototypes and thousands of tests and tweaks, we achieved that with the Hybrid-X.  However, soon after we unveiled pricing to our social media followers, we heard from many of you that you wanted an economical version.  Some of you said you just actually didn't WANT to go 25mph (a reasonable opinion, especially for beginners and young riders).

In response, we managed to pair back the technology and save quite a bit of cost in doing so.  This gave us the ability to offer lower-cost, slower-speed models that are built with the same components and technology as our top board, the Hybrid-X.

 

Do all three models use the same board?
YES, all three models (Hybrid-E, Hybrid-S and Hybrid-X) use the exact same board from Bustin Boards, a custom 35" Sportster board made with Bustin's signature ThermoGlass™ and (E)Core™ construction.  

 

Do all three models use the same components?
Almost.  All three boards use genuine Paris™ Trucks and Five-O™ wheels.  The Hybrid-X and Hybrid-S both use Bustin CERAMIC bearings, while the Hybrid-E uses Bustin Abec-9 bearings.  

 

Does the board use a controller like other electric skateboards?
Yes it does.  We designed the controller with a familiar feel for all of you e-skaters, but made it small enough to stash in your pocket when you're pushing the board manually.  Most likely you'll keep it in hand as you develop your PUSH/POWER rhythm of your hybrid skate.  The controller has two speed settings and also comes with a nifty wrist strap so you don't drop it.

 

Do I have to be an experienced skateboarder or longboarder to ride it?
Absolutely not.  Most people are surprised to hear that its easier to learn on an electric skateboard than on a regular one.  Use the kids/beginner setting to learn how to keep your balance and carve.  As you get more comfortable, start practicing your push and before you know it you'll be ready to hit the skate park (well maybe not that quite yet).  Whether you're a seasoned pro looking to get less sweaty on your long commutes or a brand newbie who's never set foot on a skateboard, we promise that you can learn how to ride this board!

 

What’s the deal with the PUSH feature?  How does that work exactly?
Unlike other electric skateboards, the Dualomo Hybrid allows for a more natural manual push (with your legs and feet that is) whether the board is turned OFF or ON.  This makes it 1000% more like a normal skateboard or longboard;  and less like one of those people mover belts at airports. 

We appreciate the Push-Function most when we're starting our rides.  Simply drop your board and push away just like you would on your skateboard or longboard.  All of the curious folks around you won't realize its an electric board until you decide to push the throttle and accelerate out of sight (They'll be scratching their heads wondering how you did that all day)!  

The Push-Function is also GREAT for conserving battery life.  Taking a slow detour through the park where it is mostly flat ground, people-weaving-type skating?  Thats a great place to get some pushes in and find the ole' skate rhythm as you duck and weave curious pedestrians.  The more you push, the longer that battery will last so don't be shy.   And of course, if your battery ever does die, you'll be able to push home :)

 

How exactly does the push-friendly hub-motor work?
First of all, we use a brushless hub-motor design that DOES NOT use belts or gears like most electric boards.  Boards that use gears are belts have a much harder time pushing freely.  Doing so is essentially like winding a huge clock or manually turning the engine in your car.  To make one part move, you must also extend that power through a series of gears and/or belts to make other parts move.  

Within the world of hub-motors, which use no belts or gears, there is a still a range of resistance that exists.  Some hub-motors won't turn at all without a power currency running through them.  Ours, on the other hand, is specially tuned to spin with less resistance whether the board is turned OFF or ON.  Because a hub-motor works using magnets, it is impossible to remove ALL resistance from the wheel, but we've pulled out every stop to create a motor that minimizes this resistance to the point where the board can be easily pushed like a regular skateboard.

One obvious, but notable point here is that the board itself is naturally a bit heavier than a standard longboard because of the battery, motor, circuit board and cover.  We've done our best to make the board one of the lightest electric boards on the market, but it's not realistic to compare it to a board WITHOUT the electric compenents.  In other words, if you have a traditional Bustin Sportster and you're expecting this one to feel exactly the same, you might be disappointed.  Just as if you took a Porsche 911 and compared it to the same 911 towing one of those awesome little pop-up campers things.  It's still a great ride, but remember you're now towing some extra weight to get the power you need.

 

How is the deck itself designed to be more push-friendly?
Bustin Boards designed this modified version of their Sportster Board specifically to compliment Dualomo's push-friendly design.  One of the things that makes the board easier to push is the design of the deck, which offers an ultra low double-dropped platform.  The original Sportster design was created as a pure PUSH/FREERIDE design, meaning that the deck is made to push and carve hard.  To allow for such a low board design we had a to make the battery and circuit boards ultra thin to provide enough clearance for every day skating.  

 

I dig it, how can I order my Dualomo Hybrid now?
Right now only way to get the Dualomo Hybrid is to order through THIS Indiegogo campaign.  People who back this campaign will not only be the first in the world to own the Dualomo, but they'll also save of money off of the future retail price which will land somewhere around $1800 in stores.  To get your Dualomo Hybrid (now delivers in January 2019), here's what to do:
         - Go to the RIGHT side of the project page and click BACK THIS PROJECT.
         - Select the PERK package you want and order through the secure Indiegogo checkout page.
         - And just like that, you have become one of the first people in the world to own the Dualomo Hybrid board.  We'll keep you updated via email and the updates section of the campaign.  For exact dates, please take a look at the Timeline just above this section ^.

 

How much maintenance does the Dualomo Hybrid board, battery and motor require?
Basically none.  We ask that you FULLY CHARGE the battery when you receive the board.  Beyond, just keep it out from under the wheels of dump trucks and try not to drop it out of your helicopter.  Obviously there are more than a few ways to destroy a skateboard, but we've designed the Dualomo Hybrid to stand up to most forms of normal wear and tear without needing much maintainance at all.

 

How can I buy accessories such as extra wheels, replacement controllers, etc?
After the campaign ends we’ll be launching our online store www.dualomo.com where you can buy spare parts and accessories for the Dualomo Hybrid. 

 

Will the charger work with 120V and 220V outlets around the world?
We are creating the board using a variety of a voltage adapters.  You will receive the charger that works in your specific country based on where your board is shipping to.

 

The board is really expensive, but the Indiegogo deal is awesome.  Please explain?
We believe our board exceeds the quality of any other board on the planet, but we know we are a small company building our dream from humble roots.  This Indiegogo campaign is the very first launch of a project we've been working on for more than 2 years.  We NEED community support to fund full-scale production so that we can compete with the big dogs.  To do that, we're offering our supporters our break-even price so that we can cover the cost of the boards and production setup.  After the campaign our normal price will be more in-line with most of the top brands in the industry.  That makes now a good time to help us help you :)

 

Can I order the Dualomo Hybrid even though I do not live in the USA?  
Yes, for sure!  We ship worldwide for a flat-rate price of $75.  Shipping within the USA is $35.

 

Is the Dualomo Hybrid delivered assembled and ready to ride?
Yes, for sure.  Your board will be delivered fully assembled and ready to rip.  All that we ask is that you FULLY charge the battery before riding.  This assures for a long, happy life for your battery.

 

How much weight can the Dualomo Hybrid handle?  
We've tested the board up to 300 lbs with no problems.  However, please bear in mind that the speed and battery range are affected by both rider weight and terrain conditions.  If you are a heavy rider, your speed and range results may be a bit lower than someone who is smaller.  It doesn't make it less fun, but that's something you need to know if you're one of the great danes reading this.

 

I live in the suburbs, is the Dualomo Hybrid a good choice for me?  Or is it only good for hipster city dwellers?
Yes, of course.  Well, let's rephrase that as "probably heck yeah!"  We designed the Dualomo Hybrid to surf the landscape whether you live in a suburban American neighborhood or in a downtown Hong Kong high-rise.  This board WILL change your life and make your car less important in most cases. 

The key question is "how many of the things you do are within ~7 miles of your home?".  With a battery range of ~15 miles, the Dualomo Hybrid-X will get you there and back with no problem.  Throw your charger in your backpack and you can also charge it on the move; like while grabbing a snack at your local coffee shop or in your friend Johnny's mom's kitchen.  She'll definitely think you're Johnny's coolest friend.

 

Does the Dualomo Hybrid come in different sizes?  
Nope, this is one size fits all.  One of the reason's why Bustin Boards suggest that we use a modified version of their Sportster Board is due its accommodating size.  Although the full board comes in at a very stashable 35", the wheelbase is long at almost 30".  That means this a rather compact board that works great for ANY size rider.  Big feet?  Small feet?  No problem, the Dualomo Hybrid will perform great no matter what size you are.

In related news, the compact nature of the 35" Dualomo Hybrid also makes it great for stashing under your desk at school or in the trunk of your car.  It also carries easily in a skateboard-strap-equipped backpack.

 

Is the Dualomo Hybrid waterproof?
A better word would probably be water resistant.  If you ride it in the rain or want to spray it off with a hose, you will be fine.  If you accidentally launch it into the Hudson River and manage to retrieve it, you may need to replace the circuit board.  We salute you for jumping in after it and we'll help get you that new circuit board.

 

Is the battery removeable?
We've designed our battery/circuitry cover to be easily removeable for any repairs or DIY upgrades people want to add (note that any DIY upgrades DO void the warranty, sorry tech nerds,  but you know thats normal :).  However, this board does not include a quick-swap battery design.  This would be a cool update on future versions, but our focus on this initial launch was on the PUSH/PUMP friendly elements.  IF you have any issues with your battery, we will most definitely be here to walk you through removing the casing and replacing it.

 

Can I ride the Dualomo Hybrid if the battery dies?
Yes, yes and yes.  This is one of the coolest benefits of the Push-Friendly design.  No more will you be 'that guy' walking through the crowd because your riding lawnmower excuse for a skateboard died.

 

What kind of warranty do you offer on the Dualomo Hybrid?
All boards come with a 1 year limited manufacturers warranty.  Should you encounter some production related manufacturer’s defect during this time, we will take care of it according to our warranty.  As some elements of a board can be damaged due to certain types of riding and or crashes and accidents, we reserve the right to examine each warranty claim individually.  In other words, if you experience problems with your battery we’ll gladly replace it and get you riding again fast and easy.  If you’re board gets run over by a cross-town bus, the best we can offer you is a 30% off replacement deal.   We're fair and approachable;  and we're committed to supporting all of you who are helping us get this product off the ground.

 

How much does shipping cost?
If you live in the US, shipping is just $25.  Outside of the USA, we're offering worldwide shipping at just $75.  In most cases we will be shipping using FedEx™, but we reserve the right to ship via another carrier if needed based on your specific country.  Also please note that the customer is responsible for any import taxes imposed by your specific country.  

 

I live in New York!  Can I pick it up myself?
Unfortunately the answer is probably no.  We're going to be doing the assembly and shipments outside of the city, but we have not chosen an exact location.  For now we're planning to ship all product directly from our assembly warehouse to customers.  We MAY offer a pickup address in NYC to consolidate and connect all of our New York fam with their new boards, but that is yet to be determined.  Backers will be the first to know!

 

Are you going to have demo rides?
Our designs, tooling and production are taking place all over the country from New York to Pennsylvania to Florida to California.  To get it all done and DONE WELL, we'll be hopping around the country a lot during the next 5 months while we finalize production of the Dualomo™ Hybrid.  

Along the way we'll be connecting with riders and doing Test Rides.   If you live in one of the USA and are jonesin' to ride the Dualomo Hybrid, keep a keen eye on our social media, especially our Instagram Stories.  If you see that we're coming to a town near you, shoot us a DM and we'll do our best to make it happen!

Yesterday we ran into Riley while traveling through Pennsylvania.  Riley is a mostly street skater who didn't have much experience on electric boards.  We explained to him the hybrid idea and, needless to say, he was stoked!  For a minute we thought he was going to power away and disappear with our board.  Good thing we had another one to chase him down with!

 

Our Production Plan

  • Our focus is on delivering a premium product unlike anything else on the market.  The Dualomo team will produce the motors, batteries, circuit boards and controllers;  while the Bustin team will produce the composite boards, component covers, trucks, wheels, bearings and components.  
  • To setup for mass production run we need to sell at-least 50-100 boards, so we're setting our goal at $50,000 for this campaign and offering our break-even price to those willing to help us get this product off the ground.  
  • When we reach our funding goal, we expect to be able to ship all final products in January 2019.

Risks & Challenges

With two years of development and refinement, most of the heavy lifting is behind us.  All materials are sourced and ready to deliver for production of the motors, circuit boards and batteries.  With 17 years of experience producing the boards and components, we also don't expect any delays on the Bustin Boards side (learn more about Bustin Boards' History >>).  

With that said, no project is ever completed without a few hiccups.  With an experienced, qualified team on all sides of this collaboration we will approach all challenges head on and maintain clear, open communication with our backers throughout the process.  We're realistic and we're honest about our approach to this project.  We're committed to being upfront with our backers about any and all updates.

Need to reach us?  No problem, we are on it daily.  Reach out to us using the Indigogo tools or email us directly at support@dualomo.com.

Does the board use a controller like other electric skateboards?Yes it does.  We designed the controller with a familiar feel for all of you e-skaters, but made it small enough to stash in your pocket when you're pushing the board manually.  Most likely you'll keep it in hand as you develop your PUSH/POWER rhythm of your hybrid skate.  The controller has two speed settings and also comes with a nifty wrist strap so you don't drop it.
 
Do I have to be an experienced skateboarder or longboarder to ride it?Absolutely not.  Most people are surprised to hear that its easier to learn on an electric skateboard than on a regular one.  Use the kids/beginner setting to learn how to keep your balance and carve.  As you get more comfortable, start practicing your push and before you know it you'll be ready to hit the skate park (well maybe not that quite yet).  Whether you're a seasoned pro looking to get less sweaty on your long commutes or a brand newbie who's never set foot on a skateboard, we promise that you can learn how to ride this board!
 
What’s the deal with the PUSH feature?  How does that work exactly?Unlike other electric skateboards, the Dualomo Hybrid allows for a more natural manual push (with your legs and feet that is) whether the board is turned OFF or ON.  This makes it 1000% more like a normal skateboard or longboard;  and less like one of those people mover belts at airports. 
We appreciate the Push-Function most when we're starting our rides.  Simply drop your board and push away just like you would on your skateboard or longboard.  All of the curious folks around you won't realize its an electric board until you decide to push the throttle and accelerate out of sight (They'll be scratching their heads wondering how you did that all day)!  
The Push-Function is also GREAT for conserving battery life.  Taking a slow detour through the park where it is mostly flat ground, people-weaving-type skating?  Thats a great place to get some pushes in and find the ole' skate rhythm as you duck and weave curious pedestrians.  The more you push, the longer that battery will last so don't be shy.   And of course, if your battery ever does die, you'll be able to push home :)
 
How exactly does the push-friendly hub-motor work?First of all, we use a brushless hub-motor design that DOES NOT use belts or gears like most electric boards.  Boards that use gears are belts have a much harder time pushing freely.  Doing so is essentially like winding a huge clock or manually turning the engine in your car.  To make one part move, you must also extend that power through a series of gears and/or belts to make other parts move.  
Within the world of hub-motors, which use no belts or gears, there is a still a range of resistance that exists.  Some hub-motors won't turn at all without a power currency running through them.  Ours, on the other hand, is specially tuned to spin with less resistance whether the board is turned OFF or ON.  Because a hub-motor works using magnets, it is impossible to remove ALL resistance from the wheel, but we've pulled out every stop to create a motor that minimizes this resistance to the point where the board can be easily pushed like a regular skateboard.
One obvious, but notable point here is that the board itself is naturally a bit heavier than a standard longboard because of the battery, motor, circuit board and cover.  We've done our best to make the board one of the lightest electric boards on the market, but it's not realistic to compare it to a board WITHOUT the electric compenents.  In other words, if you have a traditional Bustin Sportster and you're expecting this one to feel exactly the same, you might be disappointed.  Just as if you took a Porsche 911 and compared it to the same 911 towing one of those awesome little pop-up campers things.  It's still a great ride, but remember you're now towing some extra weight to get the power you need.
 
How is the deck itself designed to be more push-friendly?Bustin Boards designed this modified version of their Sportster Board specifically to compliment Dualomo's push-friendly design.  One of the things that makes the board easier to push is the design of the deck, which offers an ultra low double-dropped platform.  The original Sportster design was created as a pure PUSH/FREERIDE design, meaning that the deck is made to push and carve hard.  To allow for such a low board design we had a to make the battery and circuit boards ultra thin to provide enough clearance for every day skating.  
 
I dig it, how can I order my Dualomo Hybrid now?Right now only way to get the Dualomo Hybrid is to order through THIS Indiegogo campaign.  People who back this campaign will not only be the first in the world to own the Dualomo, but they'll also save of money off of the future retail price which will land somewhere around $1800 in stores.  To get your Dualomo Hybrid (now delivers in January 2019), here's what to do:         - Go to the RIGHT side of the project page and click BACK THIS PROJECT.         - Select the PERK package you want and order through the secure Indiegogo checkout page.         - And just like that, you have become one of the first people in the world to own the Dualomo Hybrid board.  We'll keep you updated via email and the updates section of the campaign.  For exact dates, please take a look at the Timeline just above this section ^.
 
How much maintenance does the Dualomo Hybrid board, battery and motor require?Basically none.  We ask that you FULLY CHARGE the battery when you receive the board.  Beyond, just keep it out from under the wheels of dump trucks and try not to drop it out of your helicopter.  Obviously there are more than a few ways to destroy a skateboard, but we've designed the Dualomo Hybrid to stand up to most forms of normal wear and tear without needing much maintainance at all.
 
How can I buy accessories such as extra wheels, replacement controllers, etc?After the campaign ends we’ll be launching our online store www.dualomo.com where you can buy spare parts and accessories for the Dualomo Hybrid. 
 
Will the charger work with 120V and 220V outlets around the world?We are creating the board using a variety of a voltage adapters.  You will receive the charger that works in your specific country based on where your board is shipping to.
 
The board is really expensive, but the Indiegogo deal is awesome.  Please explain?We believe our board exceeds the quality of any other board on the planet, but we know we are a small company building our dream from humble roots.  This Indiegogo campaign is the very first launch of a project we've been working on for more than 2 years.  We NEED community support to fund full-scale production so that we can compete with the big dogs.  To do that, we're offering our supporters our break-even price so that we can cover the cost of the boards and production setup.  After the campaign our normal price will be more in-line with most of the top brands in the industry.  That makes now a good time to help us help you :)
 
Can I order the Dualomo Hybrid even though I do not live in the USA?  Yes, for sure!  We ship worldwide for a flat-rate price of $75.  Shipping within the USA is $35.
 
Is the Dualomo Hybrid delivered assembled and ready to ride?Yes, for sure.  Your board will be delivered fully assembled and ready to rip.  All that we ask is that you FULLY charge the battery before riding.  This assures for a long, happy life for your battery.
 
How much weight can the Dualomo Hybrid handle?  We've tested the board up to 300 lbs with no problems.  However, please bear in mind that the speed and battery range are affected by both rider weight and terrain conditions.  If you are a heavy rider, your speed and range results may be a bit lower than someone who is smaller.  It doesn't make it less fun, but that's something you need to know if you're one of the great danes reading this.
 
I live in the suburbs, is the Dualomo Hybrid a good choice for me?  Or is it only good for hipster city dwellers?Yes, of course.  Well, let's rephrase that as "probably heck yeah!"  We designed the Dualomo Hybrid to surf the landscape whether you live in a suburban American neighborhood or in a downtown Hong Kong high-rise.  This board WILL change your life and make your car less important in most cases. 
The key question is "how many of the things you do are within ~7 miles of your home?".  With a battery range of ~15 miles, the Dualomo Hybrid-X will get you there and back with no problem.  Throw your charger in your backpack and you can also charge it on the move; like while grabbing a snack at your local coffee shop or in your friend Johnny's mom's kitchen.  She'll definitely think you're Johnny's coolest friend.
 
Does the Dualomo Hybrid come in different sizes?  Nope, this is one size fits all.  One of the reason's why Bustin Boards suggest that we use a modified version of their Sportster Board is due its accommodating size.  Although the full board comes in at a very stashable 35", the wheelbase is long at almost 30".  That means this a rather compact board that works great for ANY size rider.  Big feet?  Small feet?  No problem, the Dualomo Hybrid will perform great no matter what size you are.
In related news, the compact nature of the 35" Dualomo Hybrid also makes it great for stashing under your desk at school or in the trunk of your car.  It also carries easily in a skateboard-strap-equipped backpack.
 
Is the Dualomo Hybrid waterproof?A better word would probably be water resistant.  If you ride it in the rain or want to spray it off with a hose, you will be fine.  If you accidentally launch it into the Hudson River and manage to retrieve it, you may need to replace the circuit board.  We salute you for jumping in after it and we'll help get you that new circuit board.
 
Is the battery removeable?We've designed our battery/circuitry cover to be easily removeable for any repairs or DIY upgrades people want to add (note that any DIY upgrades DO void the warranty, sorry tech nerds,  but you know thats normal :).  However, this board does not include a quick-swap battery design.  This would be a cool update on future versions, but our focus on this initial launch was on the PUSH/PUMP friendly elements.  IF you have any issues with your battery, we will most definitely be here to walk you through removing the casing and replacing it.
 
Can I ride the Dualomo Hybrid if the battery dies?Yes, yes and yes.  This is one of the coolest benefits of the Push-Friendly design.  No more will you be 'that guy' walking through the crowd because your riding lawnmower excuse for a skateboard died.
 
What kind of warranty do you offer on the Dualomo Hybrid?All boards come with a 1 year limited manufacturers warranty.  Should you encounter some production related manufacturer’s defect during this time, we will take care of it according to our warranty.  As some elements of a board can be damaged due to certain types of riding and or crashes and accidents, we reserve the right to examine each warranty claim individually.  In other words, if you experience problems with your battery we’ll gladly replace it and get you riding again fast and easy.  If you’re board gets run over by a cross-town bus, the best we can offer you is a 30% off replacement deal.   We're fair and approachable;  and we're committed to supporting all of you who are helping us get this product off the ground.
 
How much does shipping cost?If you live in the US, shipping is just $25.  Outside of the USA, we're offering worldwide shipping at just $75.  In most cases we will be shipping using FedEx™, but we reserve the right to ship via another carrier if needed based on your specific country.  Also please note that the customer is responsible for any import taxes imposed by your specific country.  
 
I live in New York!  Can I pick it up myself?Unfortunately the answer is probably no.  We're going to be doing the assembly and shipments outside of the city, but we have not chosen an exact location.  For now we're planning to ship all product directly from our assembly warehouse to customers.  We MAY offer a pickup address in NYC to consolidate and connect all of our New York fam with their new boards, but that is yet to be determined.  Backers will be the first to know!
 
Are you going to have demo rides?Our designs, tooling and production are taking place all over the country from New York to Pennsylvania to Florida to California.  To get it all done and DONE WELL, we'll be hopping around the country a lot during the next 5 months while we finalize production of the Dualomo™ Hybrid.  
Along the way we'll be connecting with riders and doing Test Rides.   If you live in one of the USA and are jonesin' to ride the Dualomo Hybrid, keep a keen eye on our social media, especially our Instagram Stories.  If you see that we're coming to a town near you, shoot us a DM and we'll do our best to make it happen!
Yesterday we ran into Riley while traveling through Pennsylvania.  Riley is a mostly street skater who didn't have much experience on electric boards.  We explained to him the hybrid idea and, needless to say, he was stoked!  For a minute we thought he was going to power away and disappear with our board.  Good thing we had another one to chase him down with!
 Our Production Plan
Our focus is on delivering a premium product unlike anything else on the market.  The Dualomo team will produce the motors, batteries, circuit boards and controllers;  while the Bustin team will produce the composite boards, component covers, trucks, wheels, bearings and components.  
To setup for mass production run we need to sell at-least 50-100 boards, so we're setting our goal at $50,000 for this campaign and offering our break-even price to those willing to help us get this product off the ground.  
When we reach our funding goal, we expect to be able to ship all final products in January 2019.
Risks & ChallengesWith two years of development and refinement, most of the heavy lifting is behind us.  All materials are sourced and ready to deliver for production of the motors, circuit boards and batteries.  With 17 years of experience producing the boards and components, we also don't expect any delays on the Bustin Boards side (learn more about Bustin Boards' History >>).  With that said, no project is ever completed without a few hiccups.  With an experienced, qualified team on all sides of this collaboration we will approach all challenges head on and maintain clear, open communication with our backers throughout the process.  We're realistic and we're honest about our approach to this project.  We're committed to being upfront with our backers about any and all updates.Need to reach us?  No problem, we are on it daily.  Reach out to us using the Indigogo tools or email us directly at support@dualomo.com.

story:
Car Free & Care Free!

Are you looking for a healthy and enjoyable alternative for your car?  Are you in search of a green and clean way to save money everyday?  Do you want to have fun in the rush hour commute and create time in your day?  Join us! 

Average American spend 60 cents per mile owning and operating a car, not including parking fees/tickets and time lost in traffic jam or searching for parking!  You can use public transportation but what about the 2 miles from your house to the station and the walk to your office after you get off the train or bus? Bicycles are fun but too cumbersome to be carried with you on the train.  It is no fun to wait for the next bus because the bike rack is full plus you don't want to arrive sweaty with chain grease on your pant leg.  There is always uncertainty with public shared bikes.  Will one be available when you need it?  Will the shared bike rack be full when you arrive?  Even with other "portable" alternatives, you struggle to handle it in the crowded bus the entire 40 minutes ride in exchange for 10 minutes of riding.   Now look no further, the Glion Dolly Electric Scooter is the perfect last mile solution for urban commuters.

First of its kind, the Glion Dolly Electric Scooter not only carries an average adult at 15 miles per hour quietly up to 15 miles range, it also turns into a roller bag taking only half of square foot floor space.  Vertically standing on its own, the Glion Dolly is smaller than a carry-on suitcase.  With it's quick cover, it is both inconspicuous and stylish

Fun Fun Fun!

Riding a Glion feels like skiing down a gentle slope.  Smooth and fast, you arrive your destination refreshed and relaxed.   Because of the stealth, clean design, a Glion Electric Scooter is many times mistaken for a manual kick scooter.  People you pass think you must have strong legs that can glide the scooter for more than a block at a time!  They don't realize it is electric. 


Bottom Line Savings!

Since we have a vertically integrated business model (factory and US distribution), we are able to offer this practical transportation device at very affordable price while still maintaining high quality and good customer service.    What is more, for an average commuter, the savings from not driving, parking or even owning a car alone will pay the scooter off in 6 months.   At last, saving money can be a lot of fun at the same time!


Change Your Commute -- Change Your Community, and Change the World!

A Glion Electric Scooter can travel 500 miles on $1 of electricity.  Using a Glion, you are leading the way to build a bright green 

future, to reduce carbon emissions, traffic congestion and smog.  We are not just gliding for fun, we are gliding for the planet!


We are proven!

Early this year Glion successfully delivered our model 100 to Kickstarter backers all over the world.  After our delivery, we spared no effort to provide good customer services and to further improve the product quality and practicality.  Now we are coming to Indiegogo to introduce our newest innovation -- the Glion Dolly -- the perfect last mile solution.  Many of our initial Kickstarter backers of model 100 came back to ask for their 2nd, 3rd, or 4th units.  Together, let's change the way the world commutes!


Be One Of The First

Support us now, you can get your Glion Dolly, the world's first Vertically Self Standing Dolly adult electric scooter before Christmas.  You will be the envy of fellow commuters on the train/bus with the Glion Dolly by your side.  You will create more time in the morning, during lunch and after work.  The Glion Dolly will do the work for you.  No sore feet.  No sweat.  More money in your pocket and less money spent on gas and parking.  No worries about getting your bike stolen or where to store your bike in your apartment.   You feel  more connected to your community by taking public transportation instead of locking yourself in a car on highway.  

Technical Specifications:

Battery: Samsung 18650 Lithium ion Battery 1000+ charge cycles, 36v 6.6ah fully charged in 3.25 hours
Range: up to 15 miles/25 kilometers
Speed:  top speed 15mph/25kmh
Weight: 26 lbs
Tires: never flat/maintenance free  honeycomb interior (cushion inside) 
Motor:  250 watt hub motor
Frame: 6061 aircraft aluminum alloy
Brake: electric twist grip brake on left handle
Acceleration: electric twist grip accelerator on right handle
What We Need & What You Get

We need to get as many people to use public transportation as we can in a practical and meaningful way.  Glion Dolly is designed and priced for general public as a daily first/last mile solution.

  • We will ship your reward in December, regardless of funding level
  • We will include a free Glion cover bag - a $35 value 

The Impact

Your support is important to us.  We need to get more people to see other people using this innovative device in their daily commute:

  • Just imagine the difference when even 10% of the cars driving on the streets are gone.
  • Our Kickstarter backers are doing that..

Risks & Challenges

We are currently completing final assembly of the Glion Dolly Electric Scooters.  As we have done it before, the manufacturing risks are minimum for us.  There are other factors out of our control, such as labor union strike or delay by the shipping company.   However,since we have done it before, we have put measures in place:

  • We have built buffer time before Christmas for delivery schedule.
  • We have experienced logistics partners helping us

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't feel you could back a scooter now, that doesn't mean you can't help.  You can support us by getting the word out to your friends and family and sharing us on your social media.  Together, we can change the way the world commutes!

story:
Project

all started 3 years ago after building our first project; Smart-car, which is a simple car driven by two electrical motors. It inspired us to develop a transforming vehicle which we discovered its possibility especially after acquiring the knowledge of control and machinery.

Why aren't applications that use transformers between vehicles (such as cars into UAVs) more widespread?

Starting this project was not easy. We have faced so many challenges such as finance, parts availability, timing between project and university and workshops. We have gone through several phases and changes, we even changed the entire design multiple times. And now, we need your support in order to bring this project into reality. 

The funds raised will be used to build the prototype in a better scale, with smart sensing, intelligent abilities and of course will give us the chance to do more research. After that, the project will be ready to be represented as a product.

The most exciting part about our campaign is the social effect so check the "Will All the Funds Go to the Project?" section.


Perks

We are looking forward for your support, that is why we have a great collection of perks that you can get as a reward for your contribution.

Coffee Mug:


Logo T-shirt:

       



COPT-A-CAR Hoodie:

       

Available in Black and white.


How Will This Robot Make A Change?

There are many applications for this project, because sometimes we need to drive a vehicle through tough terrains and rough environments therefore we cannot rely on UAVs all the time, we cannot also rely on traditional wheel vehicle all the time. That is why we decided to merge between these two technologies by designing a vehicle that can do both jobs and ride through almost everything.

COPT-A-CAR in Car Mode


COPT-A-CAR In Flight Mode

By using certain sensors and image processing the COPT-A-CAR will be able to invade the following fields:

- Security & Surveillance

- Entertainment

- Photography

- Scientific Research

- Rescue Operations 

- Construction

This kind of vehicle is handier than traditional robots, since it can carry a payload up to 2 kg, we can use it to bring orders from and to different places.


Experts' Point of View

The project got attention by the head of Mechatronics Engineering Department Dr. Mohammad Al Janaideh who was named in Elsevier Journal as the author of the second most cited mechatronics article.

Also it got attention in the aviation field, since the flight simulators consultant Mr. Sami Al-Azzeh said:

"I would like to express my most heartfelt gratitude and admiration to you for the impressive innovation of the COPT-A-CAR and the hard work exerted to achieve this project. The invention that you are conveying has proved to be a massive draw for people by making use of technology. Everyone appreciates the way that are conducting yourself is a credit to you and enthusiastic engineers like you. I wish you all success through your study and practice life"


Why We Can't Do it Without you?

Scientific research is an expensive process, especially if you fund it by yourself without getting any support. Unfortunately, here in Jordan scientific research is not getting its fair share whether you were seeking financial or technical support. Around here if you have an amazing idea, mostly you will stop due to the financial burdens.

Our case is not very different, a while back we had to stop because we couldn't buy the parts and also couldn't pay the turnery since most of the mechanical parts are custom made. It was tough until we thought about presenting our idea on Indiegogo so we can finish the prototype and develop it in order to meet our design’s specifications.

200,000$ will sure be enough to complete and present to you a smart vehicle with capabilities you have never seen before. The 200,000$ will be divided into perks delivery, charity program and project pure fund. The pure fund will be put to action in recruiting a team of professional engineers in order to bring the bring the project to a higher level of perfection and alignment, also unfortunately some parts will not be available here in Jordan due to shipment and customs. The plan is to move our workplace to USA or China because its much easier for work and parts delivery not to mention the ability to construct a carbon fiber body and frame since the overall weight is a critical matter

In designing regular remote controlled cards we mostly focus on speed, range and battery durability. While in quad-copters we focus on aerodynamics, payload, flight time, environment, surrounding temperature, etc... Well that will be lots of variables to consider.

The weight has been a big challenge since we are doing lots of merging and mechanical mechanisms aside with electrical and embedded systems. We got over it by choosing a powerful battery along with super brushless motors with high powerendurability, but here we go back to the closed loop of finance. The merging itself is challenging so as the number of parts and how to get them in perfect alignment. The frame and the support mechanisms have to be done using CNC machines to reduce the possible human error, but in Jordan using CNC machines is not affordable at all.

The Hybrid System Challenge - Car & Flight Modes

The COPT-A-CAR has three transfer functions and it transfers between three states, car mode, flight mode and transition mode, when one of them is on the other two are off to avoid overlapping.

The car mode allows the user to drive the vehicle just like a normal remote-controlled car which can go to all directions, but when the toggle switch is switched to the flight mode the vehicle will first raise from the ground the pushes the wheels in the vertical state to be ready for the flight mode. Each mode has its own mechanism and drivers with separate controllers.

The flight mode mechanism will be hidden as you are in the car mode, in fact that is the main idea of the project. In the prototype phase the transformed UAV will be able to carry a payload up to 1 kg additional to the 7 kgs vehicle weight. Easy to use but complex to build!


Other Ways You Can Help

There is another way you can help us other than donating. If you are someone who can get us to a research laboratory or a company which can adopt this project and develop it, then you are more than welcome to contact us.

Of course you are free to share it on social media and we would be very thankful if you did.


Will All the Funds Go to the Project?

After reading "Just Give Money to The Poor" Book by Joseph Hanlon, Armando Barrientos and David Hulme, we thought about doing a campaign here in Jordan in which we choose homeless poor people and grant each one 500$ in order to give them a chance to change their lives. We will dedicate 2.5% of our raised funds for this manner. In London May 2009 a local charity took a decision of giving 3000 pounds to thirteen homeless men, no strings attached.
After a year eleven from the thirteen had roofs on their heads (The Joseph Rowntree Foundation did this experiment).


That's why we thought seriously about changing a few lives and maybe build their future. Our success should move through community, we want this project to have roots in more than one aspect. Think about how many lives will be influenced by your contribution.

About the Founders

Mouath, Ahmad and Eid have been friends for over 7 years, went to the same school and the same university (The University of Jordan). Eid majored in civil engineering while Ahmad and Mouath majored in mechatronics engineering. Since the early years they had interests in mechanics and embedded systems. When that "interest" got motivated by practical experiment and knowledge the project was born. Mouath has the whole idea figured out in sketches and worked on the driving mechanism while Ahmad points of expertise were electrical design and development. Eid is an expert when it comes to calculating mechanical properties needed for shafts, gears and all the mechanical parts. We are really proud to be working with each other in harmony and understanding. 

Last Message:

We believe that a single drop does affect the ocean. How would the ocean exist without billions of single drops?! Your contribution is importing regardless of its amount. Realize that you are making a big difference. Thank you very much!
story_txt:
Project 
all started 3 years ago after building our first project; Smart-car, which is a simple car driven by two electrical motors. It inspired us to develop a transforming vehicle which we discovered its possibility especially after acquiring the knowledge of control and machinery.
Why aren't applications that use transformers between vehicles (such as cars into UAVs) more widespread?


Starting this project was not easy. We have faced so many challenges such as finance, parts availability, timing between project and university and workshops. We have gone through several phases and changes, we even changed the entire design multiple times. And now, we need your support in order to bring this project into reality. 

The funds raised will be used to build the prototype in a better scale, with smart sensing, intelligent abilities and of course will give us the chance to do more research. After that, the project will be ready to be represented as a product.
The most exciting part about our campaign is the social effect so check the "Will All the Funds Go to the Project?" section.


Perks
We are looking forward for your support, that is why we have a great collection of perks that you can get as a reward for your contribution.


Coffee Mug:






Logo T-shirt:
       




COPT-A-CAR Hoodie:


       
Available in Black and white.


How Will This Robot Make A Change?


There are many applications for this project, because sometimes we need to drive a vehicle through tough terrains and rough environments therefore we cannot rely on UAVs all the time, we cannot also rely on traditional wheel vehicle all the time. That is why we decided to merge between these two technologies by designing a vehicle that can do both jobs and ride through almost everything.
COPT-A-CAR in Car Mode


COPT-A-CAR In Flight Mode
By using certain sensors and image processing the COPT-A-CAR will be able to invade the following fields:

- Security & Surveillance
- Entertainment
- Photography
- Scientific Research
- Rescue Operations 
- Construction
This kind of vehicle is handier than traditional robots, since it can carry a payload up to 2 kg, we can use it to bring orders from and to different places.

Experts' Point of View

The project got attention by the head of Mechatronics Engineering Department Dr. Mohammad Al Janaideh who was named in Elsevier Journal as the author of the second most cited mechatronics article.


Also it got attention in the aviation field, since the flight simulators consultant Mr. Sami Al-Azzeh said:

"I would like to express my most heartfelt gratitude and admiration to you for the impressive innovation of the COPT-A-CAR and the hard work exerted to achieve this project. The invention that you are conveying has proved to be a massive draw for people by making use of technology. Everyone appreciates the way that are conducting yourself is a credit to you and enthusiastic engineers like you. I wish you all success through your study and practice life"



Why We Can't Do it Without you?
Scientific research is an expensive process, especially if you fund it by yourself without getting any support. Unfortunately, here in Jordan scientific research is not getting its fair share whether you were seeking financial or technical support. Around here if you have an amazing idea, mostly you will stop due to the financial burdens.Our case is not very different, a while back we had to stop because we couldn't buy the parts and also couldn't pay the turnery since most of the mechanical parts are custom made. It was tough until we thought about presenting our idea on Indiegogo so we can finish the prototype and develop it in order to meet our design’s specifications.200,000$ will sure be enough to complete and present to you a smart vehicle with capabilities you have never seen before. The 200,000$ will be divided into perks delivery, charity program and project pure fund. The pure fund will be put to action in recruiting a team of professional engineers in order to bring the bring the project to a higher level of perfection and alignment, also unfortunately some parts will not be available here in Jordan due to shipment and customs. The plan is to move our workplace to USA or China because its much easier for work and parts delivery not to mention the ability to construct a carbon fiber body and frame since the overall weight is a critical matterIn designing regular remote controlled cards we mostly focus on speed, range and battery durability. While in quad-copters we focus on aerodynamics, payload, flight time, environment, surrounding temperature, etc... Well that will be lots of variables to consider.The weight has been a big challenge since we are doing lots of merging and mechanical mechanisms aside with electrical and embedded systems. We got over it by choosing a powerful battery along with super brushless motors with high powerendurability, but here we go back to the closed loop of finance. The merging itself is challenging so as the number of parts and how to get them in perfect alignment. The frame and the support mechanisms have to be done using CNC machines to reduce the possible human error, but in Jordan using CNC machines is not affordable at all.

The Hybrid System Challenge - Car & Flight Modes
The COPT-A-CAR has three transfer functions and it transfers between three states, car mode, flight mode and transition mode, when one of them is on the other two are off to avoid overlapping.
The car mode allows the user to drive the vehicle just like a normal remote-controlled car which can go to all directions, but when the toggle switch is switched to the flight mode the vehicle will first raise from the ground the pushes the wheels in the vertical state to be ready for the flight mode. Each mode has its own mechanism and drivers with separate controllers.



The flight mode mechanism will be hidden as you are in the car mode, in fact that is the main idea of the project. In the prototype phase the transformed UAV will be able to carry a payload up to 1 kg additional to the 7 kgs vehicle weight. Easy to use but complex to build!




Other Ways You Can Help

There is another way you can help us other than donating. If you are someone who can get us to a research laboratory or a company which can adopt this project and develop it, then you are more than welcome to contact us.Of course you are free to share it on social media and we would be very thankful if you did.Will All the Funds Go to the Project? After reading "Just Give Money to The Poor" Book by Joseph Hanlon, Armando Barrientos and David Hulme, we thought about doing a campaign here in Jordan in which we choose homeless poor people and grant each one 500$ in order to give them a chance to change their lives. We will dedicate 2.5% of our raised funds for this manner. In London May 2009 a local charity took a decision of giving 3000 pounds to thirteen homeless men, no strings attached.After a year eleven from the thirteen had roofs on their heads (The Joseph Rowntree Foundation did this experiment).
That's why we thought seriously about changing a few lives and maybe build their future. Our success should move through community, we want this project to have roots in more than one aspect. Think about how many lives will be influenced by your contribution.


About the Founders
Mouath, Ahmad and Eid have been friends for over 7 years, went to the same school and the same university (The University of Jordan). Eid majored in civil engineering while Ahmad and Mouath majored in mechatronics engineering. Since the early years they had interests in mechanics and embedded systems. When that "interest" got motivated by practical experiment and knowledge the project was born. Mouath has the whole idea figured out in sketches and worked on the driving mechanism while Ahmad points of expertise were electrical design and development. Eid is an expert when it comes to calculating mechanical properties needed for shafts, gears and all the mechanical parts. We are really proud to be working with each other in harmony and understanding.

story:
• Bid A Drive believes the old-fashioned taxi business is highly in need of innovation; it should be more of a pleasurable experience for both the client and the driver. Costs need to go down and the level of service needs to go up. Bid A Drive, unlike other ridesharing apps, is an opportunity for professional drivers, not a threat. The introduction of BId A Drive to work with professional drivers as a new ride share may be applauded, and we truly believe this type of revolution within the business will carry taxi and Limousine services into a new era.

What is Bid A Drive?

As the name generally stands, it is a ride share application that grants an opportunity for all professional drivers that are signed up to "Bid" to drive upon request from various riders across the world. The riders ability to choose the trip cost from any part of the world, compared to an initial comparison to other ride share apps in the location, makes it therefore cheaper and fair to both riders and drivers.

The general objective of Bid A Drive is to provide choices in transportation for both Drivers and Riders globally and not to compete with other ride share apps.

Its features however goes far beyond to protect both the rider (client) and Driver.

Bid A Drive offers On Demand and Pre-Order Online cab Services by aiming to offer transportation convenience to its riders. It is a profit sharing service for all professional drivers that signup. Bid A Drive provides the following features in the application.


– Choice of hiring your own driver.

 – Booking Vehicles in Advance.

 – Planning Trips your own way.

 – Bid, Accept and Execute Trips according to choice.

 – Pre Order and On Demand services in One Application.

 – Repetitive Trip Schedules

 – No Surge Pricing 

 – Economical Pricing 

– Buy and Accumulate Miles as you Ride

– A fan page for Driver and Rider interaction

 About Bid A Drive

 The concept of Bid A Drive started about a year ago upon serious evaluations to lapses in other ride share application. The ideas to make a better ride share that will address the two parties, that is rider and driver involved was scrutinized. It also took into consideration the assistance it could provide various cities in the world, especially with the solution to the number of ride share apps litigations.

Bid A Drive has its own app in iOS and Android  for all smartphone users. This will help both riders and the drivers to easily sign up through the website and bid to drive or ride at their preferred timings.

As a traveler you find it convenient to choose the bid from any part of the world according to your transportation requirements such as the timings and the cost before you even begin the trip. 

 You can thus say that Bid A Drive is not just another transportation facility, but it’s available to support all professional drivers whiles assisting riders.


Bid A Drive is committed in providing entertaining and economical transportation services, which is currently missing in the transportation industry. If professional drivers are giving the chance to drive again under great supervision through technology rating, there will be an excellent service for riders.

The Bid A Drive ride-share app seeks to bring life back into all transportation service providers like Limousine and private owned vehicle operators. It will create an opportunity  for them to get back to work on a fair market standard with all other ride-share apps by registering fleet of their cars to provide services they loved again.

A five star rating to ensure professionalism for both riders and drivers is encouraged in a significant way as most drivers success on bidding will greatly be dependent on it.

Another interesting feature is for all riders to have the opportunity to financially plan by buying and accumulating miles for future use. 

A fan page to always feel a part of Bid A Drive community and a cashless system of payments. 

 The choices provided by Bid A Drive is what is currently needed in the transportation industry.


How it works 

Step 1 Driver signups are activated after a thorough background and city code checks for professional drivers in their various cities and countries. Riders can also signup at anytime.

Step 2 Rider provide pickup and dropoff location to request either an "On Demand" or "Pre Order" service on the app and send it out to all registered drivers . Riders can decide to use Accumulated or Purchased miles for any particular trip.  

Step 3 All drivers begin to bid on trip cost with the quest of providing the most affordable cost to be considered by rider in a limited time frame. There will however be basic minutes spent and toll charges included in the final trip cost as widely accepted all over the world.  

Step 4 All services are cashless transactions and are paid immediately after completion of trip . Your Accumulated or prepaid miles could also be used for any transaction.

Below is a Business Executive and a rideshare driver, interview about Pre Scheduling benefits, Surges Disadvantages and Support for Bid A Drive 



How to back our project:

1. Choose Reward – Select a reward from the options on the right.

2. Stay in Touch – Please feel free to contact us with any questions or comments you have. We will be emailing all participants with regular updates, inside news and more.

3. Relax – After the project ends, we will contact you to collect your shipping information if needed. Until then, login to your social media and begin to share this great news about our campaign!

The wealth of current ride share apps runs into billions of dollars and as such makes it very difficult to compete and give both riders and drivers what they really need.

They however cannot currently boast of all these unique features for riders and drivers. The need for Bid A Drive is now. If Bid A Drive is given the chance in every city and country, not only will all other ride share apps begin to consider the extremism of price surging. They will also consider the riders utmost need of getting the opportunity to choose at anytime when to use a particular driver or vehicle. A fair profit sharing for all professional drivers will grant the hope that, they will not only benefit from their trip service but a sense of ownership in Bid A Drive to make riders feel loved each time they ride along

story:
Hi there! (La définition en français se trouve à la fin)

We are two Junior College students from Montréal. Noémie is studying visual arts and I (Bastien) am studying Mathematic, cinema and management (It's not about where you come from, but about where you're going haha!). We've already done two big trips together and it changed our life forever. We first went to Mexico/California and then we made a big trip across the East side of Europe. Now, we both have been accepted to University, but we felt like we needed to fulfill our tireless desire for adventure. So we we're wondering : how could we join our passion for travelling, our need to learn  and our eagerness to change the world?

----------------------------------------------------------------------

So here's the plan!

We want to buy an old school bus, and convert it into an ecologic and modern happiness RV. Using that brand new ride, we will ride the Americas to help people in their community. We will start our journey in Montreal, driving the entire east coast to Florida, then to Texas, Central America, hop-in hop-out in South America then get back to the West Coast, drive to Alaska and, then, back to Montreal.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

We will use two different really interesting websites to do it. Workaway.org and Couchsurfing.com. With WorkAway we will give a hand to families all over the New World, helping them learning English or French, working on organic farms, preserving wildlife and helping non-profit organisation in rough neighborhood.

Plus, Couchsurfing is a website that connects travelers who need a place to stay in a foreign country. With our new little portable home, we'll help lonely travelers by offering them a warm and safe (small) place to stay.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Here's what we're planning to spend:

3500$ on the old bus,

4000$ on mechanic, fixing brakes, suspension, gearing up the engine and the transmission

3000$ on interior renovation like kitchen, solar panel, Bed, space compartment, electric and plumbing job.

For a grand total of 10 500$. (If we don't meet our goal, don't worry! We'll find a smaller option, like a Camper, to make our dream come true!)

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Plus, depending on how much you can help us with, you will receive different personalize updates of our trip! Check out this portion of the page to know the specifications.

Give us the opportunity to  help others, live the biggest adventure of our life, share love and be truly free.

Don't forget to follow our facebook page called : Trust Happiness Bus Tour!

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Bonjour!
Nous sommes deux étudiants du CEGEP, l’école pré-universitaire, de Montréal. Noémie étudie présentement les arts visuels et j’étudie (Bastien) les mathématiques, le cinéma et la gestion. (Ce n’est pas d’où tu viens qui compte, mais où tu vas haha!) Nous avons déjà fait deux voyages ensemble qui ont changé notre vie à jamais. Nous avons commencé par visiter le Mexique et la Californie, puis nous avons fait un grand tour de l’Europe de l’Ouest! Maintenant, nous sommes acceptés à l’Université, mais nous avons l’impression que nous devons d’abord satisfaire notre infatigable désir d’aventure. Nous nous demandions donc, comment joindre notre passion du voyage, notre besoin d’apprendre et notre avidité de changer le monde?

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Voilà le plan!
On veut acheter un vieil autobus, le transformer en un VR moderne, écologique et, surtout, heureux. Avec ce nouveau véhicule, nous traverserons les Amérique pour aider les gens dans leur communauté. Nous commencerons à Montréal, conduirons jusqu’en Floride, continuerons au Texas, en Louisiane, et en Amérique Centrale, ferons un saut en Amérique du Sud, retournerons sur la côte ouest américaine, conduirons jusqu’en Alaska et reviendrons à la maison.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Nous utiliserons deux sites très intéressants pour réaliser notre projet : workaway.org et couchsurfing.com. Avec Workaway, nous irons donner un coup de main à des communautés partout à travers le Nouveau Monde, afin, par exemple, d’aider des familles à apprendre l’anglais ou le français, de travailler sur des fermes organiques, dans des organisations à but non lucratif dans des régions plus défavorisés ou dans des organisations qui préservent la faune et la flore.

--------------------------------------------------------------------
Voici notre budget : 
3500$ sur le vieil autobus,

4000$ sur la mécanique : réparer les freins, la suspension, ajuster le moteur et la transmission,

3000$ sur la rénovation intérieure : cuisine, panneaux solaires, lits, espaces de rangement, travaux électriques et plomberie,

Pour un grand total de 10 500$ ! (Si on n’atteint pas notre objectif, ne vous inquiétez pas, nous trouverons une option plus petite, comme un campeur, pour réaliser notre rêve!)

--------------------------------------------------------------------

De plus, dépendant d’à quel point vous pouvez nous aider, vous recevrez différentes mises à jours de notre voyage! Regardez la partie de la page qui y est destiné pour plus d’informations!
Donnez nous l’opportunité d’aider les autres, de vivre la plus grande aventure de notre vie, de partager de l’amour et d’être complètement libres! 


N’oubliez pas de suivre notre page Facebook nommée : Trust Happiness Bus Tour!

story:
Deutsche Version weiter unten!

GERMAN TRANSLATION BELOW!


THE WORLD'S FIRST

- ZERO EMISSION ELECTRIC-SPEEDWAY BIKE -

 SAFE 98% OF TRADITIONAL OPERATING COSTS



Speedway Motorcycle Racing is one of the most exciting and oldest motor sports in the world.
4 riders race clockwise for 4 rounds on an oval sand track up to 400m always in drift, without brakes, with an acceleration faster than a Formula 1 racing car.

Robert Lambert, Martin Smolinski





Speedway motorcycles are extremely loud and very expensive to maintain, as usual in fuel-powered motorsports.

The cool roaring of the engines and the smell of burned oil has taken every motor sports fan`s breath away and attracted people for generations.

But That is also a huge problem. 


Racetracks all over the world can only be used with special permits, due to noise pollution of the residents.

Training on racetracks is therefore only partially possible 1-2 times a year. Also the costs of engine repairs per 100 laps @ 400 meters add up to $550-700. This makes the sport almost unaffordable for average entthusiasts, newcomers and young people.



NOW - HERE IS THE SOLUTION




By introducing our nearly noiseless electric speedway bikes, racetracks can now be used 24 hours a, every day of the week, for training and competition. 

This is impossible with fuel-powered machines because of their noise.


For motorsport fans, who can't imagine silent motorcycle racing, we have a special option - a sound module and high-pressure loudspeaker with original the tone of a 500cc speedway machine - coming soon!

This can be used as special equipment with races in which there are no problems with noise.

Another big advantage of the new technology is the 98% decrease of the operation costs for engine maintenance and fuel compared to methanol speedway motorcycles.

Calculation: A speedway rider, who rides roughly 8 hours per month, saves

up to 3500 dollars each month!

SPARE 98% DER BETRIEBSKOSTEN


Speedway Motorradsport ist eine der spannendsten und ältesten Motorsportarten der Welt. 
Gefahren wird mit 4 Fahrern auf ovalen Sandbahnen bis 400m im Uhrzeigersinn, immer im Drift, ohne Bremsen, 4 Runden, mit einer Beschleunigung schneller als ein Formel-1-Rennwagen.

Robert Lambert, Martin Smolinski




Wie es bei jedem Motorsport üblich ist, sind die kraftstoffbetriebenen Speedwaymotorräder extrem laut und im Unterhalt sehr teuer.
Das geile Dröhnen der Motoren und der Geruch von verbranntem Öl lässt jedem Fan den Atem stocken und fesselt seit Generationen viele Menschen an den Sport. 

Und genau das ist, aber auch ein riesiges Problem

Überall auf der Welt können Rennbahnen,

wegen Lärmbelästigung der Anwohner zum Großteil nur noch mit Sondergenehmigungen befahren werden!


 

Das Training auf den Rennstrecken ist so teilweise nur 1-2 mal im Jahr möglich.
Die Kosten für die Motorinstandsetzung pro 100 Runden x 400m 
liegen zwischen 500€ und 700€ und machen diese Motorsportart für Normalverdiener, Neueinsteiger und Jugendliche fast unerschwinglich.


HIERFÜR GIBT ES JETZT DIE LÖSUNG


Durch die Einführung von unseren fast geräuschlosen Electric-Speedwaybikes können wir die Rennstrecken 24 Stunden, jeden Tag in der Woche, wieder für Training und Wettkampf nutzen.  Dies ist mit den kraftstoffbetriebenen Maschinen wegen der Lautstärke nicht möglich.
Für die Motorsportfans, denen nun der Gedanke an ein geräuschloses Motorradrennen, die Fußnägel aufrollt, sei an dieser Stelle gesagt, an ein Geräuschmodul und Hochdrucklautsprecher mit Originalton einer 500ccm Speedwaymaschine haben wir natürlich gedacht. Dies kann bei Rennen als Sonderausstattung zum Einsatz kommen, bei denen es wegen der Lautstärke keine Probleme gibt.
Ein weiterer großer Vorteil der neuen Technologie ist die Betriebskostensenkung um 98% für Motorwartung und Kraftstoff im Vergleich zum Verbrenner-Speedwaymotorrad.
Das bedeutet für einen Speedwayfahrer, der im Monat ca. 8 Stunden fährt, 

bis zu 3000 Euro Ersparnis - jeden Monat.

Mit diesem riesigen Kostenvorteil, könnte diese Trendsportart für jeden Jugendlichen, so günstig wie viele andere Breitensportarten sein. 
Das Training für den Nachwuchs würde damit kostengünstig realisierbar werden.
