Say Hello to Stark Drive Mini

 

The most affordable, full featured, folding electric urban commuter bike ever manufactured.

 

 

 Above you can see the various options and what is included with each of our models of Stark Drive mini.  You can also see the 'Real-World Range' of Stark drive mini based on a 100kg rider in the city. 

 

Stark Drive Mini is fully adjustable, the handlebars, and seat can be fully adjusted to fit any size rider.

The world is talking about Stark Drive:


Stark Drive creates folding e-bike you can take on flights - New Atlas 

stark drive has come up with an ultra-affordable e-bike you can sling over your shoulder - designboom

New $299 electric bicycle is ultra-affordable and even airline compliant - elektrek

STARK DRIVE MINI ELECTRIC BICYCLE’S ‘LAST MILE’ INCLUDES AFTER FLYING - Mikeshouts

'Stark Drive Affordable Folding Electric Bike From $299 - Geeky Gadgets

Stark Drive Mini Electric Bike - The only eBike designed to fly! - Mynewsdesk

Stark Drive Mini is ultra compact, designed to be your companion when traveling whether on a boat, RV'ing across the globe or even  flying anywhere in the world.  

 

Tested to fit anyone up to 6'4'' (194cm), 120kg.

Stark Drive Mini is the ultimate amalgamation of state of the art battery technology, aircraft grade aluminum, optional smart location tracking and your fitness partner all rolled into one well-built transportation tool. 

We have designed Stark Drive Mini to work perfectly to help you commute to work, and to enjoy exploring your surroundings over the weekend. Our company motto is to fuse the most advanced technology at a price that everyone can afford.

Configure Your Perfect Bike

When backing us be sure to configure Stark Drive Mini to your perfect bike by following the instructions for add ons under rewards. You can select various battery options, motor power and accessories for Stark Drive Mini.

 

Removable & Lockable Battery

 

Stark Drive Mini includes a high capacity Lithium Ion Battery based on the most advanced cells.  The same batteries are used by companies such as Tesla for their electric cars.  All of our cells are sourced from Japan and assembled in China with our manufacturing partners. 

The battery can be charged within the bike or unlocked from the frame and removed to charge at your home or office.  Our included charger will charge an empty battery in approximately 3-4 hours.  

Locking the battery within the frame guarantees that no one can remove the battery from the bike and while within the frame its well hidden to not even look as if Stark Drive is the ultimate electric bike

Stark Drive Mini is everyones solution to the 'Last Mile Problem'

 

We've designed Stark Drive Mini with convenience, and comfort in mind.  Weighing at approximately 13kg, its easy to carry up to the office or on public transportation.   

Stark Drive MIni even includes a version that you can take with you to the airport and board a plane, batteries and all.  

You can fly with Stark Drive Mini

You will still get the same range as the base Stark Drive Mini that we offer with the convenience of commuting from the airport by bike.
 

 Stark Drive Mini is your ultimate city commuter which takes you from point A to B, with unlimited stops in between if you wish in style and comfort with our long life battery. 

Stark Drive Mini is designed for convenience. 

We Use Shimano components and you have the option to upgrade to 350w geared hub motor as well as a host of other upgrades depending on your usage case scenario. 

The Stark Drive Hub Motor has been worked on by our engineers to be an energy saver while still outperforming any standard comparably powered hub motor on the market. This ensures that you can travel fast for longer. Breeze through the city at 20 mph(35kph) without peddling (36V 250W) and travel up to 25 miles / 40 km on just a single charge! 

Stark Drive Mini is specialty engineered to take you further, longer. For European customers the max speed can be adjusted to 25kph in order to comply with your countries regulations. 

 For those that want to get around just a little bit faster and are have a larger frame we offer a 350W Stark Drive Motor which will get you there faster and with a higher weight capacity then our 250W. The PAS will by default limit the speeds to the same as the 250W but with a much faster acceleration. 

Master Plan: Phase One Was Stark Drive

We launched crowdfunding for Stark Drive at the end of April 2017 through our own website.  Deliveries for our backers started September 2017 and continued through to the conclusion of crowdfunding at the beginning of July 2018.   Thank you to all of our backers of Stark Drive.

All Stark Drive Electric Bicycles included a fast charging 5V outlet to charge anything USB powered conveniently wherever you might find yourself. You can even use it while you are riding.

The Best Tech Comes with Stark Drive Mini

We have sourced the best PAS, LCD, USB Charging and Throttle for Stark Drive. Everything is waterproof and dust-proof and the system works to show your distance travelled, speed, power levels, and assist. The USB Sports fast charging at 5V compatible with any USB based device.

 We have also included a comfortable, stylish and exclusive branded saddle. Our electric bike is full the perfect balance of compact yet utilitarian with 14'' inch tires and can fold compact enough to fit even the smallest of Swedish elevators at the flip of a switch. You can take Stark Drive ANYWHERE including on any train, bus, trunk of your car, or airplane. It fits in the smallest of spaces. 

 

 USB Charging On Every Stark Drive Mini

Stark Drive mini is built for convenience, that being said USB is a global standard charging system rivaling even the common electrical outlet and much more convenient as you don't need any adapters.  We have included a high voltage USB port on every Stark Drive Mini to charge your phone, portable speaker or any other USB based device with ease.

How can we do it for only $299?

The simple answer is that we have been working with our factory building our relationship for over 2 years now and we have built a level of cooperation that ensures complete transparency both from our side but more importantly from our factory's side ensuring that the saving we achieve by cutting out all middle men and distributors can be passed onto you our new Stark Drive family.

At first glance it seems impossible, but let me assure you this is real and just as we were called a 'scam' when launching Stark Drive back in 2017 but yet delivered thousands of bikes worldwide, Stark Drive Mini is our next paradigm shifting electric bike shattering the market prices for electric bikes.

Your Perfectly Configurable Companion

At Stark Drive we believe that you should get the exact bike you want with the features and options that are best for you and when we launched Stark Drive in 2017 we reaffirmed our dedication to customization enabling any of our backers then to add whatever features they felt they needed most.  Compared to other electric bikes on the market, this make the assembly process considerably more challenging and we worked hard to improve our processes to ensure that every single feature, color and specification that our backers wanted were delivered to them.

With Stark Drive Mini we continue this with the ability to select multiple features and even to configure Mini with the perfect bike computer, simply select from one of the bike computers below which offer different features and form factors. 

Choose your Display (Basic to Advanced Options):

Standard Features 

 

Recommended Upgrades:

 

Carbon Belt Drive or Regular Chain System

 

 

As a backer of Stark Drive Mini we are offering you the opportunity to configure Mini with either a standard metal chain system (one that requires regular lubrication or you can choose a Carbon Belt Drive system that wares more evenly, requires no lubrication, is non dirty and lasts significantly longer then a standard chain based system.

GPS Tracking Optional

Our GPS Tracking solution works with your mobile phone or any laptop anywhere in the world through both the cellular network and GPS combined.  Track your bike to within a few meters or even get SMS alerts when your bike moves without you being near it.  Stolen bikes will be a thing of the past.  Of course we hide the hardware on the bike so no one will even know its there.

 

 

   

   

   

   

   

 

 

 

Biking is our Passion  

 

We love biking throughout the year, rain or shine. Its healthy, keeps you active, excellent for the cardiovascular system, builds muscles and is environmentally friendly. Most of us in the world live close by to public transit and by solving the last mile problem with a folding electric bike we can help to remove more cars of the road and do our part for a cleaner greener world. We wanted to create a product that had all the benefits of cycling with none of the drawbacks and electric bikes are the ultimate solution to this issue.

Why are we going through Crowdfunding?

The first time i tried an electric bike, I fell in love. Unfortunately for me this trial was at a local Bicycle shop and my trial was limited to 15 min.

Although I fell in love with the bike, the price was a huge barrier for me. The particular bike i tried was about 40,000 Kr (4500 USD). It had everything hidden in the frame as well as GPS tracking. Being an engineer I set out to work with a few friends of mine that had the same passion as I did and after we completed a first principles cost analysis of what every single component on an electric bike should cost and the results really surprised us.

The price was nowhere near 4500 USD in fact it was about a tenth of that price all in. We immediately set to work to find a manufacturer that could build us the bike of our dreams for the price of our dreams. 

The Trifecta is what Stark Drive Electric Bikes has achieved and seemingly its contradictory in its entire nature: A High Quality, Super Affordable, Full Featured electric bike at a price that you cant even find through distributors in Asian markets. We are now ready to go into production on Stark Drive but the one variable that has us seeking funds through crowdfunding is our manufacturing partners demand of minimum order quantities. 

We are passing these incredible savings onto you our backers for helping us launch the future of biking for everyone.

Stark Drive will always be the most affordable electric bike in the world. 

As better motors are developed, they will be installed on Stark Drive, As higher capacity batteries are produced, they will be the default on Stark Drive.  

Prediction: All Bicycles in the future will be Electric

It has taken us 4 years to get to this point to launch Stark Drive Mini, all contracts are signed, we are ready to unleash Stark Drive Mini to the world. 

My team is emphatically anticipating the first shipments in December  2018. We are constantly improving Stark Drive and with more backers we will be offering better and higher overall quality as our campaign progresses so get your friends/parents/strangers involved and tell them about Stark Drive.

Confide in Us, We are here for you

The Stark Drive Team is based out of New Jersey, California, Stockholm, and China. We are engineers, and specialists in finance, sourcing, logistics, and manufacturing working hard in preparation to launch Stark Drive to the world in 2017. 

We are working hard to improve our customer service while keeping our fixed costs unbelievably low in order to ensure we pass all the savings onto you.

We are also working hard to ensure that in the near future we will have components stocked throughout the world so that if anything happens and you need replacement components they will be just a day away.  Right now we are shipping components such as the high capacity lithium batteries at considerable expense directly from our manufacturers which does require us to abide by their warranty terms. 

Our CEO and Founder Oscar Stark has been working with supply chain management and sourcing through the Asian Marketplace for the last 15 years Most recently he has been working in the manufacturing industry to build sustainable and energy efficient dwellings that are affordable in an increasingly unaffordable marketplace.

He also has 8 years of experience within the renewable energy industry and in addition to that years of electrical engineering experience. His goal will be and has always been to get the best price and highest quality components and deliver the savings to the world.

TEST RIDE STARK DRIVE 

Anyone in the Stockholm (Sweden) area that wants to test drive Stark Drive is welcome to contact us to arrange a time (hello@starkdrive.com) at our showroom at Wargentingsgatan 5, Stockholm.

We launched crowdfunding for Stark Drive at the end of April 2017 through our own website.  Deliveries for our backers started September 2017 and continued through to the conclusion of crowdfunding at the beginning of July 2018.   Thank you to all of our backers of Stark Drive.All Stark Drive Electric Bicycles included a fast charging 5V outlet to charge anything USB powered conveniently wherever you might find yourself. You can even use it while you are riding.The Best Tech Comes with Stark Drive MiniWe have sourced the best PAS, LCD, USB Charging and Throttle for Stark Drive. Everything is waterproof and dust-proof and the system works to show your distance travelled, speed, power levels, and assist. The USB Sports fast charging at 5V compatible with any USB based device. We have also included a comfortable, stylish and exclusive branded saddle. Our electric bike is full the perfect balance of compact yet utilitarian with 14'' inch tires and can fold compact enough to fit even the smallest of Swedish elevators at the flip of a switch. You can take Stark Drive ANYWHERE including on any train, bus, trunk of your car, or airplane. It fits in the smallest of spaces.   USB Charging On Every Stark Drive MiniStark Drive mini is built for convenience, that being said USB is a global standard charging system rivaling even the common electrical outlet and much more convenient as you don't need any adapters.  We have included a high voltage USB port on every Stark Drive Mini to charge your phone, portable speaker or any other USB based device with ease.How can we do it for only $299?The simple answer is that we have been working with our factory building our relationship for over 2 years now and we have built a level of cooperation that ensures complete transparency both from our side but more importantly from our factory's side ensuring that the saving we achieve by cutting out all middle men and distributors can be passed onto you our new Stark Drive family.At first glance it seems impossible, but let me assure you this is real and just as we were called a 'scam' when launching Stark Drive back in 2017 but yet delivered thousands of bikes worldwide, Stark Drive Mini is our next paradigm shifting electric bike shattering the market prices for electric bikes.Your Perfectly Configurable CompanionAt Stark Drive we believe that you should get the exact bike you want with the features and options that are best for you and when we launched Stark Drive in 2017 we reaffirmed our dedication to customization enabling any of our backers then to add whatever features they felt they needed most.  Compared to other electric bikes on the market, this make the assembly process considerably more challenging and we worked hard to improve our processes to ensure that every single feature, color and specification that our backers wanted were delivered to them.With Stark Drive Mini we continue this with the ability to select multiple features and even to configure Mini with the perfect bike computer, simply select from one of the bike computers below which offer different features and form factors. Choose your Display (Basic to Advanced Options):Standard Features  Recommended Upgrades: Carbon Belt Drive or Regular Chain System  As a backer of Stark Drive Mini we are offering you the opportunity to configure Mini with either a standard metal chain system (one that requires regular lubrication or you can choose a Carbon Belt Drive system that wares more evenly, requires no lubrication, is non dirty and lasts significantly longer then a standard chain based system.GPS Tracking OptionalOur GPS Tracking solution works with your mobile phone or any laptop anywhere in the world through both the cellular network and GPS combined.  Track your bike to within a few meters or even get SMS alerts when your bike moves without you being near it.  Stolen bikes will be a thing of the past.  Of course we hide the hardware on the bike so no one will even know its there. 
 
               
    Biking is our Passion    We love biking throughout the year, rain or shine. Its healthy, keeps you active, excellent for the cardiovascular system, builds muscles and is environmentally friendly. Most of us in the world live close by to public transit and by solving the last mile problem with a folding electric bike we can help to remove more cars of the road and do our part for a cleaner greener world. We wanted to create a product that had all the benefits of cycling with none of the drawbacks and electric bikes are the ultimate solution to this issue.Why are we going through Crowdfunding?The first time i tried an electric bike, I fell in love. Unfortunately for me this trial was at a local Bicycle shop and my trial was limited to 15 min.Although I fell in love with the bike, the price was a huge barrier for me. The particular bike i tried was about 40,000 Kr (4500 USD). It had everything hidden in the frame as well as GPS tracking. Being an engineer I set out to work with a few friends of mine that had the same passion as I did and after we completed a first principles cost analysis of what every single component on an electric bike should cost and the results really surprised us.The price was nowhere near 4500 USD in fact it was about a tenth of that price all in. We immediately set to work to find a manufacturer that could build us the bike of our dreams for the price of our dreams. The Trifecta is what Stark Drive Electric Bikes has achieved and seemingly its contradictory in its entire nature: A High Quality, Super Affordable, Full Featured electric bike at a price that you cant even find through distributors in Asian markets. We are now ready to go into production on Stark Drive but the one variable that has us seeking funds through crowdfunding is our manufacturing partners demand of minimum order quantities. We are passing these incredible savings onto you our backers for helping us launch the future of biking for everyone.Stark Drive will always be the most affordable electric bike in the world. As better motors are developed, they will be installed on Stark Drive, As higher capacity batteries are produced, they will be the default on Stark Drive.  Prediction: All Bicycles in the future will be ElectricIt has taken us 4 years to get to this point to launch Stark Drive Mini, all contracts are signed, we are ready to unleash Stark Drive Mini to the world. My team is emphatically anticipating the first shipments in December  2018. We are constantly improving Stark Drive and with more backers we will be offering better and higher overall quality as our campaign progresses so get your friends/parents/strangers involved and tell them about Stark Drive.Confide in Us, We are here for youThe Stark Drive Team is based out of New Jersey, California, Stockholm, and China. We are engineers, and specialists in finance, sourcing, logistics, and manufacturing working hard in preparation to launch Stark Drive to the world in 2017. We are working hard to improve our customer service while keeping our fixed costs unbelievably low in order to ensure we pass all the savings onto you.We are also working hard to ensure that in the near future we will have components stocked throughout the world so that if anything happens and you need replacement components they will be just a day away.  Right now we are shipping components such as the high capacity lithium batteries at considerable expense directly from our manufacturers which does require us to abide by their warranty terms. Our CEO and Founder Oscar Stark has been working with supply chain management and sourcing through the Asian Marketplace for the last 15 years Most recently he has been working in the manufacturing industry to build sustainable and energy efficient dwellings that are affordable in an increasingly unaffordable marketplace.He also has 8 years of experience within the renewable energy industry and in addition to that years of electrical engineering experience. His goal will be and has always been to get the best price and highest quality components and deliver the savings to the world.TEST RIDE STARK DRIVE Anyone in the Stockholm (Sweden) area that wants to test drive Stark Drive is welcome to contact us to arrange a time (hello@starkdrive.com) at our showroom at Wargentingsgatan 5, Stockholm.

story:
Welcome to the World of KOnnect! 

 

What is KOnnect?

KOnnect is an AV transportation service for Hospital scheduling (Hospital Visits, Medical supply logistics)

 

Here are the Problems we face today:

1) “One study found that no-shows cost the U.S. health care system more than $150 billion a year and individual physicians an average of $200 per unused time slot.”

 

2) “Transportation barriers are often cited as barriers to healthcare access. Transportation barriers lead to rescheduled or missed appointments, delayed care, and missed or delayed medication use. These consequences may lead to poorer management of chronic illness and thus poorer health outcomes.”

 

3) Lack of Medical supply automation for emergency purposes ( ie: a Pandemic)

 

4) Virus spread due to Human to Human contact.

 

Solution:

With KOnnect, we leverage AV technology as a means to improve transparency as it relates to scheduling logistics.

For patient transportation, Hospitals/Clinics will be able to receive real time alerts when patients miss their AV rideshare. This allows hospital staff to plan effectively, reduce wasted time/cost, and possibly fulfill the otherwise “open slot” with another patient.

Having real time updates also allows Hospitals/Clinics to be able to confirm that a patient was picked up and track ETA from the AV to the destination. Ultimately, Giving the hospital staff transparency in confirming the upcoming appointment.

 

Why go the Autonomous Vehicle route?

 

KOnnect utilizes AV technology to reduce human to human contact, especially during a pandemic. Using AV’s will allow us to improve the safety and cleanliness for riders. Being that AV’s are coming sooner than you think, KOnnect is built to sustain through pandemics in the future!

 

Who will keep the AV’s clean in-between pick ups?

 

KOnnect will have a dedicated disinfectant crew that will be responsible for charging and cleaning each vehicle in between pickups.

 

Are there any benefits for the rider?

 

Yes, along with not having to drive and hassle with parking at the hospital/clinic, patients enjoy the satisfaction of a reduced wait time (if any), as the Hospital staff will be expecting them.

 

Okay, so.. no driver?! What kind of car will pick me up?

 

No driver, but the test vehicle will be a 2021 Chrysler Pacifica EV. KOnnect is open to partnering with Tesla, and other car manufacturers in the near future. More to come.

 

But wait, who’s paying for this? How will you run the business?

 

Healthcare/Government organizations will be our primary target customers. We offer our insured KOnnect AV fleets through annual service contracts with Healthcare/Government organizations.

 

What do you need to bring this to life? What’s the timeline?

First thing on the list, Funding to prove MVP (Minimum Viable Product) See below cost breakout.

Second thing on the list, a Healthcare organization contract to demo/deploy.

 

Cost of MVP - KOnnect AV

$517,000 AV Engineering Team (5)

(Includes Vehicle)

$215,000- KOnnect iOS/Android/Fleet Dashboard Development Team (3)

Cost for MVP -> $732,000

+ IndieGoGo fees - 10% 

Total Cost: $813,335

 

Cost of 100 KOnnect AV's - Year 1

$900,000 - AV Software Engineers team salary (10)

$900,000 - KOnnect App Support team salary (10)

$50,000 - Marketing Contract

$100,000 - CEO/COO salary

$55,000 - Accountant salary

$100,000 - Legal

$4,000,000 - Chrysler Pacifica EV (100)($40,000/vehicle)

$600,000 - Vehicle Cleaning Crew salary (10)

$540,000 -  Fleets Storage (100) ($450/mo/per vehicle, 12 months)

$70,000 - Chrysler EV Chargers (100)($700/ea)

$170,400- Vehicle Insurance ($1,704/yr/per vehicle)

Year 1 Total Cost: $7.5m

 

Cost of 1,000 KOnnect AV's - Year 2

$2,700,000 - AV Software Engineer team salary (30)

$900,000 - KOnnect App Support team salary (10)

$100,000 - Marketing Team Contract

$300,000 - CEO/COO/CFO salary

$55,000 - Accountant salary

$100,000 - Legal

$40,000,000 -Chrysler Pacifica EV (1000)

$3,000,000 - Vehicle Cleaning Crew salary (50)

$5,400,000 -  Fleets Storage (1000)

$700,000 - 1000 Chrysler EV Chargers

$1,704,000 - Vehicle Insurance (1000)

Year 2 Total Cost: $54.9m

 

Cost of 10,000 KOnnect AV's - Year 3

$9,000,000 - AV Software Engineer team salary (100)

$1,800,000 - KOnnect App Support team salary (20)

$100,000 - Marketing Team Contract

$300,000 - CEO/COO/CFO salary

$55,000 - Accountant salary

$100,000 - Legal

$400,000,000 -Chrysler Pacifica EV (10,000)

$6,000,000 - Vehicle Cleaning Crew salary (100)

$54,000,000 -  Fleets Storage (10,000)

$7,000,000 - Chrysler EV Chargers

$1,704,000 - Vehicle Insurance (10,000)

Year 3 Total Cost: $480m

 

Risk & Challenges:

1. Healthcare scheduling software integration/partnership

2. Government AV regulation for deployment - DMV-AV Permit. Before obtaining this permit through the DMV, the KOnnect team will have to meet the CA/AZ DMV standards and requirements through development/testing.

3. Obtaining the full cost of MVP for development/testing.

 

Established in 2013, KOnnect was founded by Greg Ray, a USC-MSEI Graduate ‘20.

Fight On ✌

 

 

*KOnnect does NOT claim to cure, treat, or prevent an illness or serious medical condition.* 

 

 Works Cited:

Jain, Sachin H. “Missed Appointments, Missed Opportunities: Tackling The Patient No-Show Problem.” Forbes, Forbes Magazine, 7 Oct. 2019, www.forbes.com/sites/sachinjain/2019/10/06/miss...

 

Syed, S., Gerber, B. and Sharp, L., 2013. Traveling Towards Disease: Transportation Barriers to Health Care Access.

story:
Enjoy breezing through the streets with the quiet and electric CruZer Scooter e2000. Its 2000-Watt, DC Brushless motor will have you cruising at speeds of 30 mph for a scooter range of up to 40 miles.  With absolutely ZERO emissions, riding your scooter is as good for the environment as it is good your spirit! Equipped with Bluetooth, USB port, FM radio and speakers, this sleek design comes in colors of silver, black, and blue in a matte finish. Red available in gloss only. Your order will ship in September.

Park easily in crowded cities, charge the battery while you’re at work, and feel good about your commute. Be one of the first to own this affordable and electric scooter, the only kind in its class of scooters made available in America.

Ted Fuller began thinking about designing a scooter for the electric 21st century. With gas prices on the rise and America becoming more eco-conscious, Ted had a vision to make environmentally-friendly and affordable transportation available to people of all ages. Ted dreamt up the CruZer Scooter e2000 which includes digital age features, such as Bluetooth, USB Port, and LCD lighting. He also designed his scooter to have more leg room, space for a passenger, and seat storage so you can cruise comfortably in style with everything you need.

Ted was then off to build his company and traveled to China to find a manufacturer to build the only electric scooter in its class made available for America. Within 3 years, he had his first prototype. Ted then worked to perfect this model and three additional prototypes later, the CruZer Scooter e2000 was born. Though the whole process took 5 years, it was certainly worth it. The CruZer Scooter e2000 meets all the Department of Transportation and Environment Protection Agency standards and is reasonable priced to boot.

Features:

  • Founder, Ted Fuller wanted a scooter for the 21st century, and has equipped the CruZer Scooter with exciting features, such as an LCD Digital Dashboard
  • LCD Panel Lights and LED Headlights and Driving Lights
  • Bluetooth, USB port, FM radio and speakers
  • 2000-Watt Motor
  • Disc Brakes
  • 12” Tires
  • Longer-than-average moped seating to seat two people comfortably.
  • Under-seat Storage
  • LED Brake Light
  • 72V30Ah Battery

Risk & Challenges:

While he had hoped the scooters could be made in the US, Ted found the costs were prohibitive. He knew that China was the largest manufacturing center in the world, and it proved to be the place to build his scooter with a manufacturer who agreed to take on the task.

Ted’s challenge has been getting the word out and making people aware the CruZer Scooter is in production and available to own.

Warranty
Manufacture warrants to the original retail purchaser that the CruZer Scooter for which this warranty has been issued is free from defects in material and workmanship as follows:

  • 12 months warranty
  • Frame
  • Electric Motor
  • Controller and electric circuits
  • Charger

This warranty is not transferable to a subsequent purchaser. The manufacture's sole obligation under this warranty is to repair or replace the product at manufacture’s option. Manufacture must be notified in writing of any claim under this warranty within 15 days of any claimed lack of conformity of the product. Immediate report to CruZer Scooter is required.

story:
Compétitrice depuis plus de 10 ans en vélo caréné, je suis actuellement "la femme la plus rapide au monde" à vélo. En 2010 J’ai atteint la vitesse de 122km/h sur 200 m lancé et sur route plate dans le Nevada, USA. Ce record est Homologué par L'IHPVA et le Guinness des Records. 

Durant la semaine du 11 au 16 septembre 2017, je vais tenter d'améliorer ce record, avec un tout nouveau vélo :
200m Sprint (Battle Mountain, Nevada, USA - Sept 2017)

Les vélos carénés, outre la rapidité inégalée qu’ils permettent, offrent des sensations très fortes. Ce sont des « véhicules à propulsion humaine » en évolution constante. Une grande créativité est mobilisée pour obtenir la combinaison parfaite entre la cycliste et la machine.

 

 

Please Visit my Facebook page for all the Racing and fully faired cycling info !

 

The builder: Georgi Georgiev with the Varna camera bike (not named yet). Gabriola july 2017

-------------
I am a competitor for over 10 years with a fully faired bike. I am currently the fastest woman in the world propelled by my own power. I reached a speed of 75.5 miles/h  on a flat and straight road in Nevada, USA. This record was certified by the Guinness Book of World Records and the IHPVA.

I will also try the following records during the 2017 season :
Battle Mountain, Nevada, USA September 11-16 for 200-meter Sprint

- 200-meter Speed Sprint 
-1000meter Sprint


Faired bikes, in addition to unmatched speed they provide, offer strong benefits. They are "human-powered vehicles" in constant evolution. Great creativity is needed to get the perfect combination of the rider and machine.

 

My Facebook page, where you can get all the latest racing info !

 

Varna Battle Mountain, Road 305, 75mph!

 

 

 

The Varna Team and friends, RAAM (Race across America)

 

Facebook page !

story:
The bicycle was our first taste of freedom as kids. We wanted to achieve a design that reflects and reminisce us of the same freedom, the same love whilst making it easier, fun and pleasurable to ride for any age group.

Feature packed and affordable, The Alpha eBike is our first contribution to electric mobility. 


We’ve worked hard to offer The Alpha eBike at an extremely low price to our early backers.

The Alpha is a thoroughly designed eBike with the best components and features all included as standard.

 

 

Our 36 V brush less hub motor provides 250 W of power on tap with an incredible 32 nm of torque. Forget breaking a sweat on inclines anymore, the motor is all you require for a pleasant riding experience. 

Running out of power is a thing of the past. Unlimited range with fast charging in 60 minutes. Just plug in the charger to any outlet. An easy swap battery extends the range further and beyond. 


 

Handmade seat layered with foam and gel core, to give you the most comfortable ride. Finished with a faux leather cover and hand stitched. Color choices available, with contrasting stitching.

 

A front and rear disc brake setup ensures safety in any situation. The Alpha stops in a blink when you want it to.

Custom designed, built from aircraft grade aluminium tubes that have been precision bent using CNC and then TIG welded to precision. Weighs less than 5 kilograms and is tested to take up to 140 kilograms of weight. 

LED Headlights to illuminate your path wherever you go. Forget hand signals, motorcycle style LED indicators up front to keep others around you informed of your direction. Rear strip style LED tail light with 260 degree visibility and integrated turn signals for your safety.All controlled with an easy access combination switch mounted on the handlebar. The Alpha also has a horn to warn people and vehicles around you. 

Full LCD Display that works well in day and night with trip time, total trip time, maximum speed, average speed, odometer, 6 level pedal assist control, temperature control 6 km/h cruise mode, walk with me mode and more programmable features. 

Also includes  USB port to charge up your phone!

(Alpha will ship with the above LCD display)

Below, 6 Level Pedal Assist Function on the Prototype. (0:No Assist, 1-5: Pedal Assist Levels)

We have worked tirelessly to bring alpha to market at such an affordable price, India being the largest two wheeler and second largest cycle manufacturing market we are able to source and manufacture components at a lower costs and are able to pass on these benefits directly to you. We have put countless of hours to make electric mobility accessible to the world.

Ideal for riders 5' to 6'5'', The Alpha is comfortable to ride for all age groups and genders. 

     

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT


We believe Indiegogo is a perfect platform for our product launch because of the vast majority of people passionate about great products here.

By being a part of our campaign, you will help us bring this eBike to streets near you. We have spent countless hours on designing, testing, iterating and prototyping to make a perfect bike for your everyday commute, and we are ready to start production. 

Join us on this exciting journey and be a part of our goal to redefine personal mobility. 

 

If you could not find what you were looking for, Click here to visit our website, or leave us a comment here. We will get back to you ASAP! You can also contact us on info@virtusmotors.in

Q:  When can I expect the Alpha eBike to be delivered?

Our Indiegogo campaign starts July 16th,  and we are already in process to go into production for an October delivery for early backers. Shipping and production times may change based on volume of orders and all backer will be updated via email and our social media and blog updates.

Q: Will you the eBike arrive as per the features and description?

Everything we’ve advertised in features is ready for production, we may upgrade the specifications if there is an opportunity to do so. 

Q: Does Alpha come in a variety of different sizes? 

No. The Alpha is built in one frame size to fit all riders 5' feet and above. The seating position allow for a comfortable leisure riding position and the long seat gives you plenty room to find your ideal comfortable riding position.

Q: What is the top speed of Alpha?

The Alpha without motor upgrade can reach a top speed of 25 kmph using throttle and pedal assist modes.

Q: Is Alpha street legal?

Alpha is street legal in practically all countries since it has a 250W motor and top speed limited to 25 kmph. You will need to refer to your local laws for more detailed information. If you need help, contact us on info@virtusmotors.in and well will be more than happy to clarify. 

Q: Do I need a license to ride Alpha?

No. Alpha requires no license or registration in a majority of countries. You will however need to refer to your local laws for full details. If you need help to find out your country regulations, contact us on info@virtusmotors.in and well will be more than happy to clarify. 

Q: What happens when the battery dies, can I ride the bike with out the motor?

Yes, you can pedal the Alpha just like any other bike.

Q: Can I lock the battery? Is the battery removable?

Yes, our batteries are protected by a locking mechanism and securely located under the seat. You can remove it or charge on the bike. 

Q: Does the bike come with a charger?

Yes.  The bikes ship with our standard fast charger.

 Q: Does pedalling the Alpha charge the battery?

 No.

Q: How much does shipping cost?

Shipping is FREE within India. $99 for the rest of the world. Additional costs may apply to a select few countries and will be communicated to backers prior to shipping. Excess shipping fee if collected will be donated to charity. The bikes will be shipped from India. 

Q: How is Alpha delivered and is it easy to assemble?

Alpha comes delivered with a detailed instructions booklet and requires minimal assembly. If you don't have much experience with bikes, we recommend that you visit your local bike shop to ensure your safety. DIY guides will be made available on our website and youtube channel, you can contact us if you are unsure or need additional help and we will arrange a video call.  

Q: What about spare parts?

The Alpha battery and electronics is custom built by us and available to buy only from us. The rest of the components are standard, and you are free to customise the bike how you like. However, if you are unable to source parts, we will be launching an online store with all spare parts and DIY guides to help you. 

Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes and duties?

The backer is responsible for any additional taxes and duties.

Q: Can I get a refund?

That would be a bummer! Please refer to Indiegogo's refund policy.

 

Follow Us

 

                                                               

 

 

*Please note, the battery case and display shown in the prototype pictures are not the final production version. 

**The suggested top-speed refers to speed achieved via the highest level of electric assistance. You can achieve a faster speed by pedalling, although it’s not recommended in heavy urban areas. Electric bicycle speed regulations vary by country. Alpha meets European regulations, some of the most stringent worldwide. We advise you consult your local authority for information or contact us on info@virtusmotors.in.


***This product has been tested with a maximum weight of 300lbs (140kg). We recommended weight limit of 220lbs (100kg) for optimum performance.

story:
-STOCK AVAILABLE TO FULFILL ALL PERKS-

______________________________________________________________________

Firstly, a BIG HELLO from the beautiful city of Cape Town, South Africa!!

Myself (Michael) and Stacey are business partners and we have a few major things in common, namely our outgoing personalities and absolute passion for life!...but more importantly a major concern for CYCLE SAFETY!


When out cycling a number of years ago, I felt extremely vulnerable on the roads, so I decided to design a bicycle mirror that would help me to not have to look over my shoulder all the time, helping me to feel safer and more in control on the road. In the early days I created a mirror for my arm, and then one on for my handle bars, but I was not able to get a static clear rear view.

After 3 years and many adjustments I created a rear view mirror that was able to give me exactly what I needed : A static rear view from a mirror that mounts onto the frame of the bicycle, so that one's line of sight is not interrupted like is the case with most conventional mirrors                     

Stacey then came on board with her business and entrepreneurial skills and together we joined forces, to tweak the Bicycle mirror until we were happy that the product was as close to perfect as possible. 

And here we are today, proud to present this evolution in cycle safety:                                                                 The Bicycle Mirror®


THE REALITY

Most cycling deaths and injuries are caused by cyclists being hit from behind. Having a clear, rear view is not only a good idea.....It's a necessity! 

We think it is just crazy that every vehicle on the road relies on a rear view mirror for safe passage and that almost all cyclists, who ride the most vulnerable vehicles on the road (bicycles) have no mirrors on their bikes!?    

The Bicycle Mirror® aims to  put  more  power  into the  hands  of  the  cyclists by allowing them to have a wider field of vision, which  will  help  to  create  safer cycling environments for both motorists and the cyclists as they often share the same space. This product has the potential to save many lives and prevent countless debilitating injuries!!!


FEATURES 

- The Bicycle Mirror has a swivel function ensuring a perfect line of sight, so        that nothing takes you by surprise!


- It has a re-usable attachment, so it can be used for many different types of bicycles. 



-A flexible stem that adjusts to suit your view.



- It takes seconds to put on and take off, so minimal time is used! 



-The mirror is shorter than the handle bars so it doesn't get in the way.

 


-The convex lens allows an even wider angle of vision, so that you're able to    clearly see everything that’s going on around you!



INSTALLATION 

STEP ONE: 

Find the flattest non-moving part on the upright post of the frame (near the bottom if possible) that your handle bars are connected to. Without attaching The Bicycle Mirror®, position it onto the frame so that when you look down onto it from a seated position, you can see what is directly behind you. Care should be taken when bending the black arm at the bike side, and it is best to bend the black tube with both hands and swiveling the mirror as shown in the video above. This is just to give you an idea of where it needs to be. Remember that the cable tie is removable so getting the position wrong on your first try is not serious. Fine adjustments can be made after full installation.

STEP TWO:

When closing the cable tie, thread the cable tie and pull it closed until it cannot go any tighter. Once The Bicycle Mirror® is stable and secure on the bicycle, either cut off the excess cable tie or tuck it in if the mirror will need to be removed regularly.

STEP THREE: 

Adjust the The Bicycle Mirror® so that your body parts or handlebars do not obstruct your view, or touch the mirror … normally only very gentle tweaks are all that will be necessary once on the road to get the final position. Finally feel safer and enjoy the experience! Please note that the attachment fits on most bicycle frames, but may not fit all.


MAKING THE WORLD A BETTER PLACE 

We are an energetic, purpose driven team who strive to make a difference in the lives of people around us, one Bicycle Mirror and one child at a time! One amazing organization that will benefit from a large percentage of The Bicycle Mirror's proceeds once we are up and running is“ Newkidz on the Block”.

Newkidz on the Block is an organisation in South Africa that creates awareness of the close to 4 Million orphans in their country. Newkidz promotes hosting, fostering and adoption of orphan children, and they get large groups of volunteers to do extreme makeovers at Children's Homes, Shelters for abused women and children and other places of safety for children.


         OUR JOURNEY TO INFINITY AND BEYOND


MEET THE TEAM

Michael De Beer: Innovator, founder of The Bicycle Mirror. He is a 'BIG PICTURE THINKER' and able to apply more than 20 years experience in sales and marketing.

Stacey Quinton: Entrepreneur and social activist 

Jason Rinquest: Digital engagement officer(DEO) & social media guru

Mark Thomas: web design & developer 

Sarah Butler: graphic design 

Naomi Ncube: graphic designer - packaging

Alex Rinquest: Video Editor 

Reagan Bovan: Product technician 

Ashlin Marcus: Product technician 

THANK YOU! In addition to our amazing crew, we would like to say a big thank you to Gavin and his team at clear solutions and to our phenomenal family and friends for supporting us on this journey - your love and support is very much appreciated.


SOCIAL MEDIA

Be the change you want to see in the world and make some noise for this amazing product and initiative!

 

     FACEBOOK          TWITTER          INSTAGRAM        PINTEREST       


PRESS

          


Interested in featuring The Bicycle Mirror in your media? Our press kit is available for download HERE. Also, please feel free to email us directly at info@thebicyclemirror.com or leave a message if you have any questions.

story:
We created the X-series to take cycling and commuting to a whole new level and radically transform the way people see electric bikes.

After a lot of hard work and extensive research and development, we came up with the SX and the FX. They are strong, lightweight, sleek and simply REALLY COOL ebikes. Both the SX and FX offer great power and range for the ultimate riding experience.

The FX is the first full carbon fibre folding ebike. It is extremely light and practical with no compromise to power, range or fun. It is the perfect commuter.

The SX is a full carbon fibre mountain ebike. It is a robust, high performance bike, built to the highest standard with a sleek design. The SX can offer the greatest riding experience to anyone, on any terrain.

 

 

 

 

"Ideal for commuters or those with an itch to explore, the X-Series E-Bikes take you wherever you want to go in total style." - GadgetFlow

 

"Building for strength and light weight with full carbon, here’s a design for what appears to be the first full carbon folding e-bike, as well as a full carbon, fully integrated MTB." - SpyCycle 

 

Experience a Ride Akin to a Glide!

 

The X-Series will make you feel as light as a feather. The high-performance motor allows you to ride through city streets and take on steep hills effortlessly.

 

Have Your FURO X-Series Everywhere You Go!

Both the FX and SX are extremely light, making them very easy to handle and transport. The FX can fold in such a tight space that you can literally carry it around in your luggage or car trunk. Never ask yourself again if you can take your ride on your business trip or holiday. Just do it!

 

Cruise in Style

Extensive work and design was put into seamlessly integrating our electrical system into the X-Series. Our bikes retain sleek and beautiful shapes while eliminating awkward wiring and misplaced components.

 

Keep Going Further

The SX and FX both use high quality lithium ion battery technology. They utilise the same cells you would find in a Tesla car, to provide the longest battery life and range, and ensure you never run out of steam.

 

Make Your Commute Yours

Go to and from work without breaking a sweat, or get your dose of fitness by choosing any of the 5 power levels on your FURO X-Series ebike.

 

Control Through Technology

The onboard computer on the FX and the SX lets you monitor your activity to optimise your ride. Monitor your distances, current and average speeds, battery capacity, motor power assist levels and more!

 


 

 

 

 

 

 


We spent a year developing the FX and the SX. We put all our efforts into integrating outstanding design with world class performance. We designed two bikes to ensure that your needs and envies can always be met, wherever you are, however you plan to use them, and at an affordable price.

As the founders of FuroSystems, we completely self-funded this project. The technology is now complete, we have built and tested several prototypes and are very happy with the result, and we are sure that you will be too! The X-Series is now ready for production! We need your help and support to bring these incredible bikes to life.

 

 

 

 

 

We now need your support to:

  • Launch production
  • Develop new accessories

We will ensure the highest quality of production and strive to exceed your expectations on timing and delivery.

 

 

Support us to:

  • be the first to receive a FURO X-Series ebike and at a significant discount
  • drive a new vehicle that will seriously enhance your commuting experience
  • make a personal contribution to a sustainable future
  • allow us to continue working to deliver ever improving electric vehicles

Help us bring the X-series to the world!

 

 

As engineers, we worked on advanced research projects immersed in space science and autonomous drone vehicles. While evolving in these fields, we experienced first-hand the implications that sustainable technology has for the future of humanity.

An increasing population and the widespread use of heavy and bulky combustion engine vehicles is making transportation slower and very cumbersome. Some of the tech we used and developed could solve these issues, but not at the expense of elegance and style.

That’s why we founded FuroSystems: to accelerate society’s transition to electric means of transportation through beautiful, practical and highly performant vehicles.

The X-Series is our first contribution to this goal, and will help us develop and bring to you new types of vehicles, such as the L1. We want to make your journeys a lot faster, a lot more fun and a lot cleaner, while making sure you look the coolest.

 

We are two engineers and entrepreneurs, Eliott Wertheimer and Albert Nassar, who founded FuroSystems over a year ago, to develop our vision of what the future of transportation should be.

We both met at the University of Bristol where Eliott studied aerospace engineering, specialising in advanced space systems. Albert studied mechanical engineering, specialising in robotics and autonomous drone systems. We worked on complex engineering projects, such as proof of concept radioisotope thermoelectric generators for nanosatellites and drones for autonomous wind turbine inspection.

We both went on to study innovation and management at Imperial College London, completing our technical background with the business knowledge necessary to quickly and reliably bring your bikes to you. You can trust us to give you the best we’ve got and make your life a lot easier thanks to our X-Series ebikes.

All of this to say, that we shared a lot of professional and personal experiences together and have accumulated deep and hands on know-how to provide you with the best of what is possible today.

Iman is a young and successful content creator and marketing wizard who impressed us with his talent. He is responsible for our media content and is of tremendous help with our marketing. You can check him out on Youtube and Instagram!

 

 

 

FAQ

General
Technical
Legal
Payments and Shipping

 

General

Will the production bikes be exactly like the ones pictured?

Yes and probably even better! We might make a few changes and improve certain details but rest assured that we will only make such modifications if it makes your bikes better.

Are there multiple colors available?

For now the only colors available are the ones displayed in our campaign. This is to focus all our design and manufacturing efforts on other essential components and bring to you bikes with the highest production quality possible.

What range can you get from the 14Ah SX battery?

We used the most energy dense battery cells on the market to make our upgraded batteries. This allowed us to pack more than 500Wh in a compact battery that still perfectly fits into the SX’s frame. This capacity combined with our very efficient BOFEILI mid-motor and the SX’s 18 Shimano gears, will get you more than 75km of pedal assist range.

What about the 10.4Ah and 10.5Ah Batteries?

The FX’s 10.5Ah packs the same LG cells as our SX’s 14Ah battery. The SX’s standard 10.4Ah battery is also made with high performance, extremely reliable and cost efficient SAMSUNG cells. Both batteries will get you more than 55km of pedal assist riding.

What about the 8.7Ah?

The FX’s standard 8.7Ah battery is assembled with high performance, reliable and cost efficient SAMSUNG cells. This battery will already offer you more than 45km of pedal assist range.

Can I upgrade to an FX 10.5Ah or SX 14Ah battery?

Yes, we will offer our upgraded batteries a bit later in the campaign. Lock in your super early bird price on the X-Series and we'll email you when the battery perks are available. 

What height do I need to be to enjoy the X-Series?

We've tested both the FX and the SX with riders from 158cm to 195cm with no issues. People taller or shorter than this should also be fine!

Are test rides possible?

Sorry, we are not able to offer test rides for now as we are super busy building these bikes and getting everything ready for you to get delivered faster than you expect it! However, we’ll keep posting usage videos and photos so that you get as much of the experience as possible.

Is there a warranty?

We offer a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty with all our ebikes which covers any potential production related fault. Should you encounter an issue, simply contact us and we will take care of it. The warranty does not cover elements that may get damaged by the rider or due to normal wear and tear such as tires, disc brakes, chain etc.

How do I get replacement parts?

We are planning to open an online store at http://furosystems.com where parts, accessories and bikes will be available for purchase. We are putting a lot of effort into making sure this is done in the most efficient way possible.

Where can the FURO X-Series be serviced?

The FX and SX are designed to be easy to maintain. Your local bike shop will have all they need to make changes and replace parts of the X-Series ebikes. We will provide all the documentation necessary to ensure the quality of the maintenance process. 

 

Technical

How heavy are the X-Series ebikes?

The FURO X-Series ebikes are some of the lightest on the market thanks to their advanced electric technology and state-of-the-art carbon frames. Their weights with battery are as follows:

FX (all models): 14kgs

SX (all models): 19kgs

How do you charge the battery and how long does it take?

The FX’s battery can be charged either on or off the bike. With our standard 2A charger, the 8.7Ah takes around 4.5hrs to charge while the 10.5Ah battery takes 5.5hrs. Our fast 5A charger will charge the 8.7Ah battery in less than 2hrs and the 10.5Ah battery in less than 2.5hrs.

The SX’s battery charging port can only be accessed by removing the battery compartment’s cover. It can then either be removed or left on the bike to be charged. With our standard 2A charger, the 10.4Ah takes around 5.5hrs to charge while the 14Ah battery takes approximately 7hrs. Our fast 5A charger will charge the 10.4Ah battery in 2.5hrs and the 14Ah battery in about 3hrs.

Will the charger work with 120V and 220V outlets around the world?

Yes, our chargers are rated 100-240V. They work in every country. 

Can you charge the bike by pedalling to increase range?

No, to put it simply, if you still want to move while recharging and not just pedal in the air like on an indoor spinning machine, some of your pedalling power will go to moving the wheels on the ground while another part will go to recharging the battery through the motor which becomes a generator. In that case, pedalling is firstly much harder than if you just were pedalling to go somewhere because a big chunk of the power you apply on the wheels goes to the battery. Even worse, due to the laws of thermodynamics, only 80% of the power diverted to the battery is actually converted to electricity. This means that if you had applied that power towards cycling in the first place you would have gotten home much faster and more easily. In the end, it just makes much more sense to use your pedalling for moving than for charging!

Can you remove the wheels if you need to put it in a car?

Yes, all four wheels on the X-Series can be easily removed with tools we provide in our packaging. However, the FX's back wheel will have to be kept close to the bike in order not to rip the BAFANG hub motor's cables.

What happens if I get a Puncture?

Punctures can happen when going off road or riding long distances in the city. Changing the tires of the SX is as easy as changing those on a normal bike. The FX’s front wheel is standard as well, however the back wheel will require a bit more attention as to not rip the cables of the hub motor. However, with care it is as straightforward as any bicycle wheel.

How much maintenance does the motor require?

Our BAFANG rear motor and BOFEILI mid motor are brushless DC motors which fundamentally require very low maintenance. Add to that the fact that their manufacturers have been doing them for years, testing them with thousands of customers, and even more thousands of kilometres, they require VERY low maintenance. If they were to fail, replacing them through your local shop or at home with our documentation will be quick and easy.

 

Legal

Do I need a license or registration for the FX or SX?

No you do not need any of that. Simply get on your bike and go! We offer two versions of each bike, a 250W version which is completely road legal all over the world and a 350W one for the United States. The FX and SX boast the highest possible power whilst remaining road legal. It is also important to note that these powers are nominal average powers. The motors powering the X-Series can actually peak at 500W (250W nominal) or 600W (350W nominal) for short amounts of time.

Make sure you get the right bike for your jurisdiction!

What’s the top speed of the Bike?

The FX 250 and SX 250 are electronically limited to 25km/h while the FX 350 and SX 350 are limited to 32km/h. For legal reasons, respectively above 25km/h or 32km/h the motor cuts out and the rider's pedaling power becomes the only thing that can increase velocity. Our bikes all have a speedometer in their display, so you can see exactly how fast you are going.  

Do I need to wear a helmet?

They are required by law in some places and optional in other places.

 

Payments and Shipping

How much is shipping?

Our bikes are delivered straight from our factory in Asia, to your door, anywhere in the world, at a fixed rate of €300.

Can I pick the bike up in London and avoid the shipping charge?

Sorry, obviously it would be a pleasure to meet you face to face but our bikes are shipped straight to your door from our factory by land and sea. Hence, each bike requires shipping to be paid, whatever the final destination.

When will you ship?

We expect our first backers to receive their bikes in May 2018. We will then progressively deliver at maximum manufacturing capacity while working hard on increasing our production rate and minimising delivery time. 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It is 0% in the US and varies internationally.

Can I get a refund?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.

They are strong, lightweight, sleek and simply REALLY COOL ebikes. Both the SX and FX offer great power and range for the ultimate riding experience.The FX is the first full carbon fibre folding ebike. It is extremely light and practical with no compromise to power, range or fun. It is the perfect commuter.The SX is a full carbon fibre mountain ebike. It is a robust, high performance bike, built to the highest standard with a sleek design. The SX can offer the greatest riding experience to anyone, on any terrain.    "Ideal for commuters or those with an itch to explore, the X-Series E-Bikes take you wherever you want to go in total style." - GadgetFlow "Building for strength and light weight with full carbon, here’s a design for what appears to be the first full carbon folding e-bike, as well as a full carbon, fully integrated MTB." - SpyCycle  Experience a Ride Akin to a Glide! The X-Series will make you feel as light as a feather. The high-performance motor allows you to ride through city streets and take on steep hills effortlessly. Have Your FURO X-Series Everywhere You Go!Both the FX and SX are extremely light, making them very easy to handle and transport. Launch production
Develop new accessories

be the first to receive a FURO X-Series ebike and at a significant discount
drive a new vehicle that will seriously enhance your commuting experience
make a personal contribution to a sustainable future
allow us to continue working to deliver ever improving electric vehicles

story:
G-Ride is moving at a higher vibration! That's why G-Ride is B-Corp, which means we are for the triple bottom line. Planet, People then Profit. We want our drivers to have a voice in the company, that's why we are giving them a seat on the board, tip options and can ear equity in G-Ride.

 

G-Ride feels people want to make an positive impact on our environment but find it hard to do so in the current system. We are creating a platform to make it easy for people to vote with their dollar and make the world a better place by just a click of a button. We are Shifting the collective Eco-conscious one ride at a time by making it fun, rewarding and easy to go green and make a change. Come be a G-Rider today and move with purpose!

 

G-Ride has the app ready and needs $2,000,000 to launch!!!!

Here is what your pledge will be influencing

  • Marketing = 500k
  • Insurance Premiums = 400k
  • Salary+Great Team = 300k
  • Green Programs = 200k
  • Driver/Rider Acquisition = 200k
  • System/App Development = 100k
  • Customer/Tech Service = 100k
  • Legal Fees = 100k
  • Building/Equipment/Supplies = 100k

Total Expenses

$2,000,000


 

Rider Benefits - Why be a G-Rider?

  • No Surge pricing
  • First Ride $20 off in a Tesla
  • Raffles off a Bicycle for every 1000 downloads
  • Safety features that give peace of mind
  • Driver customer service training
  • Green bonus programs - Planet focused company

 

Driver Benefits - Why Drive G-Ride?

  • Higher commission
  • Drivers can earn equity and have tip options
  • Vehicle payment program for drivers
  • Residual income opportunities
  • Driver will have a seat on the board.
  • The Impact

Your contribution will allow G-Ride to successfully launch in Chicago and start our green mission!

G-Ride will IMPACT the communities we serve to have a more sustainable lifestyle simply by taking a ride!

We also have 3 ways G-Ride is a safer rides. Studies show Eco-Friendly drivers get in 15-20% less accidents than traditional vehicles. Also G-Ride has a push button service to alert authorities to your GPS location, additionally we limit texting while driving and rewards the drivers for doing so.

G-Ride has been developing green partnerships and cross promotional campaigns with other companies that have the same Ethics we do.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our main challenge is penetrating the market with two Goliath's such as Uber/Lyft. We feel people are tired of the typical capitalistic system and want to use products and services that focus on creating impact not just money.

We are counting on the power of the people to stand up and make a change. No one person, company or technology can save the world, its the collective good deeds of millions of people who can make the change.

They say if you want to start the next big business you need do two things. Add value and solve the worlds biggest problems. G-Ride is adding value by ease of access to go green and is helping solve the biggest problem by taking care of Mother Earth!

You can help in many ways,

  • Pledge your support and vote with your dollar!
  • Share this with your friends and family and be the change you want to see in the world.
  • Lets use the social media machines for good and spread the positive vibes!

Peace be the journey,

G-Ride team

story: Beit Emanuel is a vibrant community of faith, tolerance, progress, learning and compassion that has been around for the past 61 years. We have understood that a living community is greater that its members. Its permanence gives perspective, and offers a place for debate and for the alleviation of the many social and spiritual ills that ravage our city. We need your contribution to consolidate and guarantee the sustainability of our place and action in the future. We need you to B.E.lieve, to plant a seed so that we keep fostering progressive thought and standing tall in the pillars of peace, freedom and loving kindness.

story:
TAKE A WILD RIDE WITH «HIGH TORQUE»

Horsepower is a time of the past. The future of eMobility lies in torque, efficiency and range. This is what makes driving so much fun! We want to be able to mass produce this powerful electric motor by the year 2019. With its 350-400 Nm per wheel, this «HIGH TORQUE DRIVE SYSTEM» is more efficient than any other system on the market. «HTDS extreme» will radically change eMobility and open doors to new designs and opportunities in construction.



NEWS

29/11/2015     the High Torque Drive Systems Polska S.A. is founded

22/12/2015    Yeeeessss !!! we can drive. We have the contract with EVC Motors. Together we will push the market with new e-Drive solutions. From 20 kW up to 50 kW per motor with controller, battery and carging system -  we can produse a complete solution for your vehicles. If you need an E-Drive ... ask for an offer. Now it's powerfull - and tomorrow it will comes with the HTDS extreme.


WHAT WE WILL DO IN THE FUTURE

The fundamental concept of our engine is based on a new flux system and the system was distinguished by the «Network of Automotive Excellence» in 2009 as drive of the future. The compactness of the «HTDS extreme» drive give it the potential of being used as an inside single wheel drive. In the previous years, the base concept of this engine has been developed rigorously and its function has been proven by experts. In the next phase, the engine will be designed for cars, optimized, measured and the Proof of Concept will be produced which is essential for the automotive mass production.

   N0W central e-drive             "HTDS" as plug in hybrid        "HTDS" as full electric car

OUR BENCHMARK IS THE ENGINE OF TESLA S 

PMSM motor – same torque – smaller size – improved efficiency  (no gear)


THE HEART OF «HTDS extreme» – A NEW FLUX SYSTEM 

All existing electric motors in automobiles are designed and constructed as conventional asynchronous machines or permanent magnet synchronous machines. This means that the motor size is mostly applied as a central drive in the drive or clutch unit. However the «HTDS extreme» is a high pole transflux machine and due to its compact design this motor can be used as a single wheel drive without an additional gear (direct drive). Therefore gears, axles and differentials can be omitted for power transmission. This in turn saves costs along with weight reduction, a better efficiency and makes room for battery and electronics.

«HTDS extreme» – extreme MOTOR-TORQUE, extreme EFFICIENCY, extreme SMALL SIZE and extremely SIMPLE

The transverse flux machine (TFM) yields double the torque with the same dimensions. In other words - if you hit the accelerator by four HTDS-motors, you’re in for the ride of your life! 

 M. Geissler – Institute of Mobile Machines – TU Dresden

TFM-Technology along with «HTDS extreme» has many advantages and endless opportunities in automobile construction and in road safety: 

  • The compact synchronous motor steers each wheel individually and accurately, including limited slip differential. This can be used for traction control (individual modulation of power distribution to the wheels, prevents spinning), parking and lane keeping assistance, and collision avoidance systems. 
  • During braking, the braking energy is used to charge the battery changing «HTDS extreme» into a generator. Togehter with the direct drive - can it get any more efficient than this? We are convinced there is no better drive system in existence!


 Aston Martin, concept by Samir Sadikhov

We’re sure you’re asking yourself, why hasn’t this transflux motor been built yet? Unfortunately some factors have influenced this.


THE CHALLENGES

Transverse flux motors have a number of recalcitrant characteristics: A large number of parts, flux losses, torque ripples, vibration, noise, and due to the ability to overload the motor by 150 %, it becomes difficult to control the temperature. We have already solved some of these problems, and we will need to systematically approach and improve on others.

          Torque requirement from a OEM                         Calculated values by HTDS


We have succeeded in reducing the number of parts drastically meaning simplified production and diminished costs! 

«HTDS extreme» does not have more parts than a cooled PSM motor. Construction has become easier and production costs are sinking. For full power, «HTDS extreme» requires only half the magnet mass of a PSM motor! When considering that magnets are the biggest cost driver for PSM, «HTDS extreme» has made great progress in regard to mass production costs.

But we have one much greater challenge: the range. We do not need these motors to have 300 kW of power in a car. That much power simply drains the battery too quickly. The real challenge is starting a car on a slope (high starting torque) and to consume as little power as possible at 130 km/h. This is where we see the biggest challenges. It is precisely because of this that we need to build this motor, analyze it, and drive with it. All the theory in the world is useless if we are unable to prove it.


FROM THE DEVELOPMENT PROJECT TO MASS PRODUCTION – WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT! 

We have been working on the development of «HTDS extreme» since 2009 and have now found a realistic way for implementation. We have already invested a lot, but for its realization we cannot do it alone. We are a small powerful team without financial resources. We will need to raise 20% of the whole project costs (US$ 9 Mil.) ourselves for promotion funding despite our own personal contributions.  

We must prove to the automobile companies that the drive works and that it will pass all driving tests.  We will need to be able to show the exceptional power of the «HTDS extreme power» in a real car so that we can convince investors and costumers to invest in mass production. So – we need your support!


EACH PROJECT NEEDS A PLAN 

At this time we are in the development process at the working level – meaning the actual motor development. During this working level, individual prototypes will be installed in vehicles and the tremendous power of «HTDS extreme» can be experienced. During this phase we are looking for partners for implementing the mass production.  Our goal – or target level – is to integrate «HTDS extreme» in new hybrid or electric vehicles in order to prepare for mass production.  




YOUR PERKS 

As soon as we have the core financing, we will prepare some very special rewards in return. We are planning some events for test drives, of course with «HTDS extreme» vehicles and also factory tours and other fun activities regarding eMobility, energy and sustainability. We will keep you up-to-date here. 

For a donation receipt - please fill in the adress or send us an e-mail.


A VISIONARY TEAM STANDS FOR «HTDS extreme» 

Thomas Bütschi (CH) , 10 years of experience in the development of TFM motors: «The knots are what count in a network – not the loops. When we network our skills, experience and creativity intelligently, we can solve even the most complex problems».

Marlies Eggen (CH), PR-Manager with 20 years of experience in communication and corporate management: «I believe in people's creativity and their innovative expertise to use technology for the benefit of humanity and nature – and I believe in this project:  'HTDS extreme' is an important step along the path that we must take to save our planet».

Claus Habermann (DE), former plant architect of a big electric motor producer (worldwide): «Tomorrow will be different if we change today. That's why we all want to contribute towards the 'HTdS extreme' project».

Marek Marciniak (PL), former plant manager of a large electric motor factory in Poland: «Walk the talk – professionalism demonstrated every day – and working on solutions with conviction and diligence. This is what we do in the 'HTDS extreme'  project, and it's the only way to produce forward-looking results».

Walter Scheufele (DE), 20 years of experience in selling innovations in the automotive world: «My motto, by Mahatma Gandhi: 'Be the change that you wish to see in the world.' The 'HTDS extreme' project combines ideals for a better world – engineering expertise, innovation and sustainability. This is the way I want the world to change».

Udo Vorbeck (DE), former purchasing manager at ContiTech & Daimler Hamburg: «The goal is: Future mobility in the context of ecology, resource availability and demographics. Proactive thinking and action instead of reaction to catastrophes and bottlenecks: 'HTDS extreme' is a platform upon which we intend to unite experience, visions and paradigm change.


BECOME A PART OF THE REVOLUTION!

Our project «HTDS extreme» needs core funding of US$2 million, so that we can realize our development project (together with the public incentives form the EU).

And this is how we will use the Money:

  • Worldwide patents  (expensive and the process requires support by lawyers)
  • Motor development (A- and B-samples)
  • Magnetic flux simulation
  • Motor-Teststand and Tests
  • Test drives
  • PLM and quality system

We must prove to the automobile companies that the «HTDS extreme» works and that it will pass all driving tests. We have to show the exceptional power of the «HTDS extreme» in a real car – that is how we will be able to convince investors and companies to invest into the mass production. 


MORE INFORMATIONS

We ask you to understand, that at this stage of the project we won't publish technical details until worldwide patents will protect our innovations. As an investor, you might have further questions about the project, the future market or about business potential. We kindly ask you to contact us. 


SPREAD THE NEWS and help this project running all over the internet! Like our facebook-page, e-mail this site to your friends and talk about the future of eMobility with your community.


To design the future of eMobility we need your support

TAKE A WILD RIDE WITH «HIGH TORQUE»
Horsepower is a time of
the past. The future of eMobility lies in torque, efficiency and range. This is what makes driving so much
fun! We want to be able to mass produce
this powerful electric motor by the year 2019. With its 350-400 Nm per wheel, this «HIGH
TORQUE DRIVE SYSTEM» is more efficient than any other system on the
market. «HTDS
extreme» will radically change eMobility and open doors to new designs and opportunities in construction.

NEWS29/11/2015      the High Torque Drive Systems Polska S.A. is founded22/12/2015    Yeeeessss !!! we can drive. We have the contract with EVC Motors. Together we will push the market with new e-Drive solutions. From 20 kW up to 50 kW per motor with controller, battery and carging system -  we can produse a complete solution for your vehicles. If you need an E-Drive ... ask for an offer. Now it's powerfull - and tomorrow it will comes with the HTDS extreme.

WHAT WE WILL DO IN THE FUTURE

The fundamental concept
of our engine is based on a new flux system and the system was distinguished
by the «Network of Automotive Excellence» in 2009 as drive of the future. The compactness of the «HTDS extreme» drive give it
the potential of being used as an inside single wheel drive. In the previous years, the
base concept of this engine has been developed rigorously and its
function has been proven by experts. In the next phase, the engine will be designed for cars,
optimized, measured and the Proof of Concept will be produced
which is essential for the automotive mass production.



   N0W central e-drive             "HTDS" as plug in hybrid        "HTDS" as full electric car





OUR BENCHMARK IS THE ENGINE OF TESLA S PMSM motor – same torque – smaller size – improved efficiency  (no gear)THE HEART OF «HTDS extreme» – A NEW FLUX SYSTEM 
All existing electric motors in automobiles are designed and constructed as conventional asynchronous machines or permanent magnet synchronous machines. This means that the motor size is mostly applied as a central drive in the drive or clutch unit. However the «HTDS extreme» is a high pole transflux machine and due to its compact design this motor can be used as a single wheel drive without an additional gear (direct drive). Therefore gears, axles and differentials can be omitted for power transmission. This in turn saves costs along with weight reduction, a better efficiency and makes room for battery and electronics.
«HTDS extreme» – extreme MOTOR-TORQUE, extreme EFFICIENCY, extreme SMALL SIZE and extremely SIMPLE

The transverse flux machine (TFM) yields double the torque with the same dimensions. In other words - if you hit the accelerator by four HTDS-motors, you’re in for the ride of your life! 


 M. Geissler – Institute of Mobile Machines –
TU Dresden

TFM-Technology
along with «HTDS extreme» has many advantages and endless opportunities
in automobile construction and in road safety: 

The compact synchronous motor steers
each wheel individually and accurately, including limited slip differential. This
can be used for traction control (individual modulation of power distribution
to the wheels, prevents spinning), parking and lane keeping assistance, and
collision avoidance systems. 
During braking, the braking energy is
used to charge the battery changing «HTDS extreme» into a generator. Togehter with the direct drive - can
it get any more efficient than this? We are convinced there is no better drive
system in existence!




 Aston Martin, concept by Samir Sadikhov


We’re sure
you’re asking yourself, why hasn’t this transflux motor been built yet? Unfortunately
some factors have influenced this.
THE CHALLENGES

Transverse flux motors have a number of
recalcitrant characteristics: A
large number of parts, flux losses, torque
ripples, vibration, noise, and due to the ability to overload the motor by 150
%, it becomes difficult to control the temperature. We have already solved some
of these problems, and we will need to systematically approach and improve on
others.
