story:
About ECR

DENZEL ECR V1-one of the most stylish, powerful and affordable electric motorcycles ever offered on the market. ECR aka Electric Cafe Racer is designed as a perfect daily commuter or weekend cruiser. From teenager to veteran. For women and for men. From cruising to racing.

As seen on:

Equipped with a mind-blowing array of features, it comes complete with cruise control, on-board fast charger, Safety lights and Fully-Adjustable Suspension. DENZEL ECR is a serious performer driven by a powerful 7.5Kw mid-drive motor,reaching a top speed 100kph/62mph  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

DENZEL MOTORS a well-known name amongst enthusiasts, creating and developing electric vehicles and spare parts from 2013. Since then we have mainly focused on the manufacturing of carbon fibre bikes and their associated parts. Our company has invested heavily in our own testing laboratory where a team of specialists put bikes and components through exacting tests. This enables us to make durable, low-maintenance electric bikes.  

Our mission is to bring to the world an eco-friendly truly affordable electric cafe racer with impressive specs.  We have spent weeks and months in our workshop creating a number of prototypes and testing them heavily. When we designed the ECR V1  we had two things in mind: style & quality.   

To us, design is everything, because everything we own is an extension of ourselves. Retro motorcycle designs always stood out to us as sleek and elegant and we used that as inspiration to build an electric motorcycle that is truly unique. We are passionate about adventure and aesthetics, and that is why we do what we do to share our passion with others. We are DENZEL Electric Cycles and we build Bold electric bikes.  

 

ECR features

New generation High Power 3.7V 50Ah Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePo4) cell.

Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4)

Phosphate based technology possesses superior thermal and chemical stability which provides better safety characteristics than those of Lithium-ion technology made with other cathode materials. Lithium phosphate cells are incombustible in the event of mishandling during charge or discharge, they are more stable under overcharge or short circuit conditions and they can withstand high temperatures without decomposing. When abuse does occur, the phosphate based cathode material will not burn and is not prone to thermal runaway. Phosphate chemistry also offers a longer cycle life. A LiFePO4 battery is expected to last twice as many life cycles as a Lithium-ion battery. Charging time is twice as less if compared to Li-Ion batteries.

Intelligent BMS

ECR is powered by advanced 72 volts LiFePo4  battery pack equipped with intelligent wireless Denzel BMS.  One important feature of the  battery management system is to provide the user with the overall  health of the battery.  Denzel BMS monitors the internal resistance of each cell and tracks the capacity of the weakest cell. It uses this information to calculate a cell health percentage value from 0 to 100%. Denzel BMS then compares the calculated cell health information against preprogrammed thresholds and if any cells (or the entire pack) fall short of the threshold, a trouble code is set and freeze frame data is stored for later analysis.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Denzel BMS implements an extensive list of features designed to protect the battery pack.

These features include:

  • Turn  bike on/off from your phone
  • Control over 80 parameters of the battery from mobile phone
  • Real-time range monitor
  • Real-time discharge monitor
  • State of charge calculations
  • Cell over-voltage and under-voltage protection
  • Intelligent battery balancing
  • Battery charger control
  • Pack temperature monitoring
  • Monitors health of each cell in real-time
  • Charges/discharges history log
  • Health state and cycles log

Cells are protected from over-voltage, under-voltage, over-current, over-temperature, and under-temperature based on the programmed minimum and maximum values in the battery profile.

Intelligent, efficient cell by cell balancing is provided to maximize the usable range of the battery. Denzel BMS also monitors the health of both individual cells and the total pack and will trigger error trouble codes if either the pack or individual cells are in poor health.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Denzel BMS controls over 80 different battery parameters

 

Cafe racers were popular 50-plus years ago, and they are currently enjoying a resurgence with all the major motorcycle manufacturers producing some sort of cafe racer model to capitalize on this uptick. It’s no surprise at all that founders Alex Guliyants and Igor Tarkh blessed the ECR V1 with the same DNA  

 

 

ECR V1 stands out because of its design that recalls the form of a 1960’s cafe racer motorcycle. The result is a bike that boldly brings together the newest battery and motor technology with a stylish motif of the past.  

Spanish and Russian designers Pablo Baranoff Dorn and Alex Guliyants have envisioned the future of Honda motorcycles with this futuristic concept.

Dubbed the “Electric Café Racer V1,” this idea is a re-modeling of a Honda Café Racer 125cc, transforming it from its traditional engine oil system to a more sustainable electric battery system. Designed from scratch the frame, seat, rims, hubs, lights and front and rear suspension.  

We have given ECR our own, laboratory-developed, proven, hi-torque DENZEL 7.5Kw – direct mid-drive motor. This incredibly efficient system channels the power directly from the motor to the rear wheel via a strong , constant tension chain. Not only does direct drive minimize friction loss by eliminating clutches and gears, but it also helps eliminate the need for routine  power-train maintenance whilst  reducing the weight of the motorcycle. In cooperation with  KELLY we have developed DNZ KLS7218SW controller incorporating our custom firmware that improves cruise control and  analogue brake features. 

Heart of the ECR V1 - DNZ D7500

One of the first prototypes to be built

First prototype is half assembled

DENZEL motor delivers 7.5Kw of silent, smooth power, minimizing wheel spin and improving traction.

Controller is attached and connected  to motor

First ECR without battery is almost ready

Compared to the traditional petrol motorcycles sold over the last few decades, using neither a clutch nor any gears in its transmission and, with no exhaust pipe, radiator, petrol tank or hanging hoses, ECR V1 is a leap forward in performance, reliability and usability.  

This is an outstanding bike that will surpass your riding dreams.​

Our principle: add nothing to the machine unless it enhances the experience. ECR's motor features a single moving part, no messy fluids, no clutch, and no transmission. We made it to be a simple, durable, low-maintenance machine that is built to last.  

Second prototype is going to be built

Improved design applied

3D printed tank fitted

Final tweaks have been done

LED old school headlight is perfectly fit the cafe racer style

Adjustable air rear cushions

Our starting point when developing a new model is always to produce the very best product for passionate (and demanding) riders. We dedicate a lot of attention to the finish, and carefully select an optimum set of components. If that isn’t possible with existing components, we develop our own.  All our bikes are hand-built and meticulously checked before shipping to our backers. Each individual bike is thoroughly tested and put through a comprehensive inspection, so we can guarantee they meet the highest standards of quality.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

• No need to change fuel filter • No need to check oil • No need to change oil or oil filters • No need to replace spark plugs • No need to replace clutch • No need to adjust clutch cables • No need to check clutch fluid levels • No need to replace timing belt • No need to sync throttle and idle speed • No need to fill up on gas • No need to replace timing belt • No need to sync throttle and idle speed •

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The ride experience is at the heart of our design process.  As passionate motorcycle riders, we set out to make a motorbike that we were excited to ride.  

Full "tank" every day. No expensive charge station required. A simple 220/110 V household outlet satisfies all the needs of the ECR's  2200W on-board charger. Every outlet is now a “fueling” station.  

When slowing down or stopping, you can use the Regenerative Braking System which converts kinetic energy into electrical energy – feeding it back into the battery pack, enhancing both the range and the ride time.   

Denzel ECR is also equipped with an analogue brake that helps to extend the brake pad’s life-span on long downhill runs.

A few advantages of the DENZEL ECR V1 compared to petroleum motorcycles: 

• Zero pollution • Lightweight • No smell • Virtually no maintenance • No kick-starting • 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We've worked day and night for the past two years to build what fans are calling the coolest and most affordable electric motorcycle in the world.

As motorcycle enthusiasts, we wanted the best and simply could not accept to hear the words it's not possible.  Many people have told us we couldn’t make a powerful electric motorcycle for under $5000. So – there you have it: we’re bringing our challenge to YOU for even less. They all said that the power will be too weak, the battery life would be too short and in the end it will look also ugly. All that negativity simply  motivated us to prove to all the ‘Doubters’ that it CAN be done, that we can build a stylish electric motorcycle at an incredible price. We began to brainstorm on how to achieve this. We needed ECR to be lightweight, modular, strong, streamlined and – most importantly – affordable.…And we finally found a way! 

 

We've built a number of prototypes that all turned out to be too expensive, so we started pondering how to reduce the cost of manufacturing without sacrificing the quality. The most effective way we found to be able to do this was to resource all the parts in bulk.

Why We Need Your Support

Electric motorbikes presently retail from between $7,500 – to $15,000+. We wanted retail a final product for under $5,000 and we are offering even better deals for our early supporters. 

 We're offering to build you electric motorcycle at the cost of production, so we aren't making money out of it. In return we need your support to raise money for certification and homologation to make ECR street legal. After certification is done ECR V1 will be retailed $5000 at the dealer shops.Crowd-funding enables us to keep the costs down as we can work together with factories  to produce the right amount of units, without dealing with high storage costs and other related overheads

… This is where we need your help as – with your support – when we reach our goal, DENZEL ECR V1 will become a reality – with you as a contributor being able to support the electric cafe racer  for the best possible price.

We want to raise the standard and give everyone the opportunity to enjoy the finer things. Don’t settle for second best. Go for more. Help us make this happen by being an early supporter.

We've self funded and thoroughly tested 4 fully functioning prototypes and are now focused on:  

  • Making final tweaks to designs
  • Finalizing quality control systems
  • Developing accessories 

The funds raised will be used for:

  • Mass production
  •  Homologation
  • Certification
  • Creating an international network of distributors and service stores

We've been working on ECR for over a year. Unlike many of the larger technology projects on Indiegogo, Igor and Alex have completely funded the project themselves. It's been a long road and they've given up everything to bring their dreams to the world. Your support will allow us to offer you a better electric motorcycle and prove that affordable electric transportation is a reality.

So why support us?

  • You'll be the first to ride the Electric Cafe Racer. 
  • You want to contribute to a greener future.
  • It's cool after all :)                          

ECR ACE 21  limited edition is made with polished carbon parts, designer stitched comfortable seat and signature 21 badge on the side. 

Stylish full carbon open face helmet perfectly matches the ACE 21  limited edition

Built-in bluetooth speaker

Boring ride and listen wind gust?No worries!We've integrated a stereo system into the bike. Just hook your mobile phone via bluetooth or use sd-card to enjoy fun ride with your favorite beats.

Cruise control

The ECR V1 has unique feature that other motorcycles don't have, cruise control that helps you to ride for long distances without any discomfort for your right wrist. This bike's range vary from 65 to 80 miles so cruise control is the most desired option for the long trips.

Bluetooth controller

​You can control and adjust up to 50 parameters of your bike from your mobile phone. Need more torque or you looking for high millage?No problem, all settings can be apply in a few seconds

​On-board Fast Charging

With ECR’s on-board fast charger, it only takes 2 hours to charge 80% and a full charge gets you up to 150km in range. Charging is supported by standard household outlets, allowing ECR owners a convenient way to charge up without access to a charging station.The ECR V1 has an impressive range which can keep you commuting for days without having to charge

Regenerative Braking

Recovering lost energy and charging directly back to your battery for boosted efficiency and range, making braking safer. Regen braking activates smoothly and seamlessly, similar to lightly feathering the brakes, offering an additional stopping system that give you more control of your bike.

Specification 

Performance

Top speed  100km/h

Max peak power 10kW/13HP

Mid-drive high torque DC motor 7.5kW

Max torque 92.6 Nm

Sine wave controller KLS7218SW

Maintenance-free single gear direct drive

Battery&Range

High capacity LiFePo4  battery 72v with smart BMS

Max battery capacity 3.6Kwh

Charging time (0-80%) in 2 hours

City range 130km@45km/h

Battery cycle life >2000 cycles or 100000km

Brakes&Suspension

Front disc brake 240mm , 4 piston caliper

Rear drum brake 

Front oil fork 720mm 

Rear twin air shock absorbers 320mm 

Dimension&Weight

Front  tire 140/70-17"

Rear  tire 140/70-17"

Weight 78kg

Load capacity 150kg

Seat height 750mm

 

Referral Contest

When you refer your friends and help spread the word about our campaign, we reward you with special offers and perks. Just ask your friend to mention your email with code word "referral" during process of placing the order, then we will contact you regarding your award.

CARBON PARTS UPGRADE

Standard ECR V1 supplied with plastic parts such as a tank, battery cover etc., while limited version ACE 21 comes with exclusive polished real carbon parts. For those who oredered ECR V1 there is a great chance to get carbon parts upgrade for free if $100K goal is reached. If unlocked we will upgrade all ECR V1 with the real carbon parts painted in original colours.

INDUCTION MOTOR DA-90

We equipped ECR V1 and ACE21 with proven BLDC DNZ D7500 which is one of the best motors on the market. While ECR was in development we started secretely developing of asynchronous motor without permanent magnets. We have succesfully built and tested  motor prototypes on our motorcycles, and results were awesome. If our goal $200K will be unlocked we will supply all the ECR V1 and ACE 21 with all new DENZEL DA-90.

 

 

DA-90 vs D7500 size comparison

 

FAQ

Q:Will the production bikes be exactly like the one pictured?

A:We have a few tweaks to make and reserve the right to make modifications in the interest of making your ECR V1 even better if we rise more funds. Since the photos were taken, we've already added a USB charging port, changed wheels, and plan to make a couple other upgrades before your bike is ready!

Q:The price is very low for the motorbike. Why is that?

A: Our dream is to make electric transportation accessible to everyone. We have worked long and hard to create the ECR that is not only affordable, but also made of quality components; a quality motorcycle that is made to last you through the years. To help bring ECR V1 to life, we are offering an exclusive 40% discount off MSRP to those early bird supporters

Q: How can you ensure such a low price?

A: We have extensive experience in sourcing and manufacturing products and components. This is a key factor that enables us to maintain a low units cost based on volume. With increased sales and production volume, we are confident that we can ensure a low price, even after the campaign has ended.

Q: How is ECR V1 manufactured?

A:ECR will be produced by our team at our assembly plant in the high-tech city of Weihai, China. Weihai is also known as the cleanest region in China. For the past 3 years we've invested heavily in our own factory, molds, laboratory etc., to ensure we've built durable and quality bikes.

We have spent lots of time finding the right suppliers and manufacturers for ECR. Our many years experience dealing directly with sourcing companies, factories and shipping companies have helped us a great deal to be able to offer high quality product for the lowest price possible.

Q: How much weight can ECR handle? 

A: ECR is built strong and can handle riders up to 150 kg with ease. 

Q: How much does ECR weight?

A: ECR weighs approximately 78 kg with battery.

Q: How long does the ECR battery last?

A: The range depends on how fast ECR is riding, thus average range vary from 70km to 150km 

Q: Can the battery be removed?

A: Yes. The battery is designed in such a way that you can change it or replace with 2 easy steps that takes just a few minutes. 

Q: How is ECR delivered and is it easy to assemble?

A: ECR comes delivered with instructions in safely packed box and requires minimal assembly. You can also find help on our extensive help desk

However, if you don't have much experience with bikes, we recommend that you visit your local bike shop to get all parts tightened and thoroughly checked.  

Q: How much does shipping cost?

A: We offer free shipping to our early supporters

Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?  

A: All ECRs and batteries come with a 1 year manufacturer's warranty.  As many elements of a bike may get damaged due to normal riding use, we do not offer warranty on parts such as tires, disc brakes, chain etc.

Q: Do I need a license to ride the ECR V1?

A: Yes, you need a license to ride the ECR. In June-July 2018 ECR will be street in the USA and Australia, and we will do our best to get ECR homologated in EU by August 2018. Without registration ECR is not street legal. Most part of the  raised funds will be used for certification. 

Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?

A: The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing. It is varies internationally.

Risks & Challenges

We are able to deliver what we promise. We have been manufacturing electric bikes for three years now and delivering them all over the world. ECR V1 has been properly tested and is just before the stage of serial production. We are manufacturing most of the bike parts ourselves in our own factory with our own people. We cooperate with verified suppliers and all the parts we purchase from them are carefully checked by our people during assembly. 
The very late stage of the project with our ready infrastructure and experience give you very good level of confidence that we will successfully overcome any potential unexpected challenges.
story_txt:
About ECR
DENZEL ECR V1-one of the most stylish, powerful and affordable electric motorcycles ever offered on the market. ECR aka Electric Cafe Racer is designed as a perfect daily commuter or weekend cruiser. From teenager to veteran. For women and for men. From cruising to racing.

As seen on:






Equipped with a mind-blowing array of features, it comes complete with cruise control, on-board fast charger, Safety lights and Fully-Adjustable Suspension. DENZEL ECR is a serious performer driven by a powerful 7.5Kw mid-drive motor,reaching a top speed 100kph/62mph  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
DENZEL MOTORS a well-known name amongst enthusiasts, creating and developing electric vehicles and spare parts from 2013. Since then we have mainly focused on the manufacturing of carbon fibre bikes and their associated parts. Our company has invested heavily in our own testing laboratory where a team of specialists put bikes and components through exacting tests. This enables us to make durable, low-maintenance electric bikes.  

Our mission is to bring to the world an eco-friendly truly affordable electric cafe racer with impressive specs.  We have spent weeks and months in our workshop creating a number of prototypes and testing them heavily. When we designed the ECR V1  we had two things in mind: style & quality.   

To us, design is everything, because everything we own is an extension of ourselves. Retro motorcycle designs always stood out to us as sleek and elegant and we used that as inspiration to build an electric motorcycle that is truly unique. We are passionate about adventure and aesthetics, and that is why we do what we do to share our passion with others. We are DENZEL Electric Cycles and we build Bold electric bikes.  

 
ECR features

New generation High Power 3.7V 50Ah Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePo4) cell.
Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4)
Phosphate based technology possesses superior thermal and chemical stability which provides better safety characteristics than those of Lithium-ion technology made with other cathode materials. Lithium phosphate cells are incombustible in the event of mishandling during charge or discharge, they are more stable under overcharge or short circuit conditions and they can withstand high temperatures without decomposing. When abuse does occur, the phosphate based cathode material will not burn and is not prone to thermal runaway. Phosphate chemistry also offers a longer cycle life. A LiFePO4 battery is expected to last twice as many life cycles as a Lithium-ion battery. Charging time is twice as less if compared to Li-Ion batteries.
Intelligent BMS
ECR is powered by advanced 72 volts LiFePo4  battery pack equipped with intelligent wireless Denzel BMS.  One important feature of the  battery management system is to provide the user with the overall  health of the battery.  Denzel BMS monitors the internal resistance of each cell and tracks the capacity of the weakest cell. It uses this information to calculate a cell health percentage value from 0 to 100%. Denzel BMS then compares the calculated cell health information against preprogrammed thresholds and if any cells (or the entire pack) fall short of the threshold, a trouble code is set and freeze frame data is stored for later analysis.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
The Denzel BMS implements an extensive list of features designed to protect the battery pack.
These features include:

Turn  bike on/off from your phone
Control over 80 parameters of the battery from mobile phone
Real-time range monitor
Real-time discharge monitor
State of charge calculations
Cell over-voltage and under-voltage protection
Intelligent battery balancing
Battery charger control
Pack temperature monitoring
Monitors health of each cell in real-time
Charges/discharges history log
Health state and cycles log

Cells are protected from over-voltage, under-voltage, over-current, over-temperature, and under-temperature based on the programmed minimum and maximum values in the battery profile.
Intelligent, efficient cell by cell balancing is provided to maximize the usable range of the battery. Denzel BMS also monitors the health of both individual cells and the total pack and will trigger error trouble codes if either the pack or individual cells are in poor health.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Denzel BMS controls over 80 different battery parameters
 

Cafe racers were popular 50-plus years ago, and they are currently enjoying a resurgence with all the major motorcycle manufacturers producing some sort of cafe racer model to capitalize on this uptick. It’s no surprise at all that founders Alex Guliyants and Igor Tarkh blessed the ECR V1 with the same DNA  
 
 
ECR V1 stands out because of its design that recalls the form of a 1960’s cafe racer motorcycle. The result is a bike that boldly brings together the newest battery and motor technology with a stylish motif of the past.  
Spanish and Russian designers Pablo Baranoff Dorn and Alex Guliyants have envisioned the future of Honda motorcycles with this futuristic concept.

Dubbed the “Electric Café Racer V1,” this idea is a re-modeling of a Honda Café Racer 125cc, transforming it from its traditional engine oil system to a more sustainable electric battery system. Designed from scratch the frame, seat, rims, hubs, lights and front and rear suspension.  

We have given ECR our own, laboratory-developed, proven, hi-torque DENZEL 7.5Kw – direct mid-drive motor. This incredibly efficient system channels the power directly from the motor to the rear wheel via a strong , constant tension chain. Not only does direct drive minimize friction loss by eliminating clutches and gears, but it also helps eliminate the need for routine  power-train maintenance whilst  reducing the weight of the motorcycle. In cooperation with  KELLY we have developed DNZ KLS7218SW controller incorporating our custom firmware that improves cruise control and  analogue brake features. 

Heart of the ECR V1 - DNZ D7500

One of the first prototypes to be built

First prototype is half assembled

DENZEL motor delivers 7.5Kw of silent, smooth power, minimizing wheel spin and improving traction.

Controller is attached and connected  to motor

First ECR without battery is almost ready
Compared to the traditional petrol motorcycles sold over the last few decades, using neither a clutch nor any gears in its transmission and, with no exhaust pipe, radiator, petrol tank or hanging hoses, ECR V1 is a leap forward in performance, reliability and usability.  

This is an outstanding bike that will surpass your riding dreams.​
Our principle: add nothing to the machine unless it enhances the experience. ECR's motor features a single moving part, no messy fluids, no clutch, and no transmission. We made it to be a simple, durable, low-maintenance machine that is built to last.  

Second prototype is going to be built

Improved design applied



3D printed tank fitted

Final tweaks have been done

LED old school headlight is perfectly fit the cafe racer style

Adjustable air rear cushions



Our starting point when developing a new model is always to produce the very best product for passionate (and demanding) riders. We dedicate a lot of attention to the finish, and carefully select an optimum set of components. If that isn’t possible with existing components, we develop our own.  All our bikes are hand-built and meticulously checked before shipping to our backers. Each individual bike is thoroughly tested and put through a comprehensive inspection, so we can guarantee they meet the highest standards of quality.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
• No need to change fuel filter • No need to check oil • No need to change oil or oil filters • No need to replace spark plugs • No need to replace clutch • No need to adjust clutch cables • No need to check clutch fluid levels • No need to replace timing belt • No need to sync throttle and idle speed • No need to fill up on gas • No need to replace timing belt • No need to sync throttle and idle speed •

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
The ride experience is at the heart of our design process.  As passionate motorcycle riders, we set out to make a motorbike that we were excited to ride.  

Full "tank" every day. No expensive charge station required. A simple 220/110 V household outlet satisfies all the needs of the ECR's  2200W on-board charger. Every outlet is now a “fueling” station.  
When slowing down or stopping, you can use the Regenerative Braking System which converts kinetic energy into electrical energy – feeding it back into the battery pack, enhancing both the range and the ride time.   
Denzel ECR is also equipped with an analogue brake that helps to extend the brake pad’s life-span on long downhill runs.
A few advantages of the DENZEL ECR V1 compared to petroleum motorcycles: 
• Zero pollution • Lightweight • No smell • Virtually no maintenance • No kick-starting • 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
We've worked day and night for the past two years to build what fans are calling the coolest and most affordable electric motorcycle in the world.

As motorcycle enthusiasts, we wanted the best and simply could not accept to hear the words it's not possible.  Many people have told us we couldn’t make a powerful electric motorcycle for under $5000. So – there you have it: we’re bringing our challenge to YOU for even less. They all said that the power will be too weak, the battery life would be too short and in the end it will look also ugly. All that negativity simply  motivated us to prove to all the ‘Doubters’ that it CAN be done, that we can build a stylish electric motorcycle at an incredible price. We began to brainstorm on how to achieve this. We needed ECR to be lightweight, modular, strong, streamlined and – most importantly – affordable.…And we finally found a way! 
 
We've built a number of prototypes that all turned out to be too expensive, so we started pondering how to reduce the cost of manufacturing without sacrificing the quality. The most effective way we found to be able to do this was to resource all the parts in bulk.
Why We Need Your Support
Electric motorbikes presently retail from between $7,500 – to $15,000+. We wanted retail a final product for under $5,000 and we are offering even better deals for our early supporters. 
 We're offering to build you electric motorcycle at the cost of production, so we aren't making money out of it. In return we need your support to raise money for certification and homologation to make ECR street legal. After certification is done ECR V1 will be retailed $5000 at the dealer shops.Crowd-funding enables us to keep the costs down as we can work together with factories  to produce the right amount of units, without dealing with high storage costs and other related overheads
… This is where we need your help as – with your support – when we reach our goal, DENZEL ECR V1 will become a reality – with you as a contributor being able to support the electric cafe racer  for the best possible price.
We want to raise the standard and give everyone the opportunity to enjoy the finer things. Don’t settle for second best. Go for more. Help us make this happen by being an early supporter.

We've self funded and thoroughly tested 4 fully functioning prototypes and are now focused on:  

Making final tweaks to designs
Finalizing quality control systems
Developing accessories 

The funds raised will be used for:

Mass production
 Homologation
Certification
Creating an international network of distributors and service stores

We've been working on ECR for over a year. Unlike many of the larger technology projects on Indiegogo, Igor and Alex have completely funded the project themselves. It's been a long road and they've given up everything to bring their dreams to the world. Your support will allow us to offer you a better electric motorcycle and prove that affordable electric transportation is a reality.
So why support us?

You'll be the first to ride the Electric Cafe Racer. 
You want to contribute to a greener future.

It's cool after all :)                          


ECR ACE 21  limited edition is made with polished carbon parts, designer stitched comfortable seat and signature 21 badge on the side. 

Stylish full carbon open face helmet perfectly matches the ACE 21  limited edition

Built-in bluetooth speaker
Boring ride and listen wind gust?No worries!We've integrated a stereo system into the bike. Just hook your mobile phone via bluetooth or use sd-card to enjoy fun ride with your favorite beats.
Cruise control
The ECR V1 has unique feature that other motorcycles don't have, cruise control that helps you to ride for long distances without any discomfort for your right wrist. This bike's range vary from 65 to 80 miles so cruise control is the most desired option for the long trips.
Bluetooth controller
​You can control and adjust up to 50 parameters of your bike from your mobile phone. Need more torque or you looking for high millage?No problem, all settings can be apply in a few seconds
​On-board Fast Charging
With ECR’s on-board fast charger, it only takes 2 hours to charge 80% and a full charge gets you up to 150km in range. Charging is supported by standard household outlets, allowing ECR owners a convenient way to charge up without access to a charging station.The ECR V1 has an impressive range which can keep you commuting for days without having to charge
Regenerative Braking
Recovering lost energy and charging directly back to your battery for boosted efficiency and range, making braking safer. Regen braking activates smoothly and seamlessly, similar to lightly feathering the brakes, offering an additional stopping system that give you more control of your bike.

Referral Contest
When you refer your friends and help spread the word about our campaign, we reward you with special offers and perks. Just ask your friend to mention your email with code word "referral" during process of placing the order, then we will contact you regarding your award.



CARBON PARTS UPGRADE
Standard ECR V1 supplied with plastic parts such as a tank, battery cover etc., while limited version ACE 21 comes with exclusive polished real carbon parts. For those who oredered ECR V1 there is a great chance to get carbon parts upgrade for free if $100K goal is reached. If unlocked we will upgrade all ECR V1 with the real carbon parts painted in original colours.
INDUCTION MOTOR DA-90
We equipped ECR V1 and ACE21 with proven BLDC DNZ D7500 which is one of the best motors on the market. While ECR was in development we started secretely developing of asynchronous motor without permanent magnets. We have succesfully built and tested  motor prototypes on our motorcycles, and results were awesome. If our goal $200K will be unlocked we will supply all the ECR V1 and ACE 21 with all new DENZEL DA-90.
 
 

DA-90 vs D7500 size comparison

story:
Our electric commuter vehicle breaks the boundaries of functionality, affordability, and fun. Our Gyro-Force V2 technology is now smarter and more responsive to our lithium ion smart battery. The improvements we’ve made in the design of the Gyro-Force V2 has made it easier to swap batteries on the fly without wasting any of your precious time. Destined to be a massive game changer in the electric commuter industry, this is the Uno Bolt MINI. 

 

The MINI was designed to go beyond its predecessor. Whether you're a student roaming around campus, an employee working in the city, or a tourist enjoying the scenic activities in the area, the MINI provides a fun, convenient and green way to travel.   

 

 

 

We designed the grips to endure long-term use so we applied the best type of rubber grips the industry has to offer.  

 

The footrest is strong enough to hold a tremendous load, yet foldable and light making storage of the MINI convenient and compact.   

 

The Gyro-Force V2 Chip technology is our mainboard built in-house. The V2 is more responsive and can be calibrated for Cruising or Bolting modes.  

 

The lower frame is made of solid steel and houses the Gyro-Force V2 chip. When activated, Night Riding mode lights up the frame with an array of shifting colors that glow through the Uno Bolt logo. The battery is located in the upper frame, which is made of a strong aluminum alloy.  

 
 
 

The Cree LED headlight is bright enough to safely navigate any hour of the night.    

 

We designed the rear taillight to serve two primary functions: Most importantly, the LED lights are more than bright enough to be seen by other drivers, but taillight also serves as a secondary battery display.   

 

The LED screen displays your current speed, the battery life percentage, and a trip odometer. The speedometer will display either mph or km/h depending on the country to which is it being shipped.  

 

We all know the toll a long ride can have on our backside, so we implemented a comfortable gel-foam seat, sure to make long trips more comfortable. Sleek and functional the underside of the seat has a handle making it easy to pick up and transport your MINI.  

 

Our seat-post will accommodate nearly any bike seat fitting. So if you decide that our seat is not right for you, you will easily be able to swap it out for another.  

 

The specific treading we chose for the tire aids in dispersing rain on pavement. Yes, the MINI can still be operated in rainy conditions!  

 

 Our tire lock system does away with any bulky stands to prevent the MINI from moving. Hidden right underneath the footrest, our tire lock system makes it easy to lock or unlock the tire in seconds.  

 

Both our standard and long-range batteries are equipped with LG lithium-ion cells. The standard battery can get up to 15 miles per charge while the long-range battery can get up to 23 miles per charge. Furthermore, our smart batteries can be charged without the hassle of removing them from the MINI.  

The MINI's top frame is secured with a built-in lock system. The only way to remove the battery is with a designated key. Each MINI will include two keys.    

 

 

Cruise mode is designed for the casual rider, while Bolt mode is better suited for fast-paced riding.  

  

 

 

 

 

 

The success of our first electric unicycle put the Uno Bolt into hands of people all over the world. The feedback we have received praising its portability and convenience has motivated us to go even further. We wanted to use what we learned on our first project to design a smaller, lighter, and more efficient Uno Bolt that could be used for individuals looking for a compact commuter vehicle. It was from this ambition that the MINI was born.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What IS the charger rated at?

The MINI charger has an operating range of 100-240VAC, 50/60Hz, and covers most countries.

 

Does the LED interface change from mph to km/h?

The screen is dedicated so it will not change. We will ship the correct speedometer according to your country.

 

What exactly is the universal seatpost?

With the universal seatpost, you can swap out the seat that is included with the MINI. So if you already own or plan to purchase another saddle you can swap it out. The seat post bracket will accommodate any type of saddle.

 

What kind of warranty is included?

Each MINI is covered by a limited 1-year warranty. That includes the motor, frame, and battery.  Please note: this does not include damages incurred by rider usage. Any alteration, tampering or modification of the electronics, battery, controller, throttle, motor, circuitry or related electrical wiring will not be serviced or supported by Uno Bolt and will void the warranty.

 

Will I be able to purchase replacement parts?

After our first batch of shipments is sent out in December, we will be offering replacement parts through our website where you can purchase components, accessories, and another MINI.

 

If I lose the keys can I reorder them from you?

No two Uno Bolt keys are alike and we do not store back up keys. We strongly advise making spare ones in case you lose the two.

 

Can I get a refund on my order once it's placed?

Please read Inidiegogo's policy located here.

 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

We are not responsible for the additional taxes, fees, etc. Please contact your local authorities for any additional fees that could occur during shipment to your location.

 

How do I become a dealer?

We are open to retailers worldwide. If you have a retail store where the MINI would be a good addition to your stock, inquire by emailing us at theunobolt@gmail.com

 

We will be adding more questions and answers in the days to come. If you would like a quicker reply to your questions please contact us through our Facebook,  our website comment section or email at theunobolt@gmail.com
 

 

We have crowdfunded our first Uno Bolt in the past and we reached delivery time earlier than expected. We expect to do the same this time around and we have our team ready to go. We do not expect any big risk or challenge affecting our production or delivery time. 
In the unlikely event that something should delay the delivery time, we will notify our backers.

We strongly advise making spare ones in case you lose the two. Can I get a refund on my order once it's placed?Please read Inidiegogo's policy located here. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?We are not responsible for the additional taxes, fees, etc. Please contact your local authorities for any additional fees that could occur during shipment to your location. How do I become a dealer?We are open to retailers worldwide. If you have a retail store where the MINI would be a good addition to your stock, inquire by emailing us at theunobolt@gmail.com We will be adding more questions and answers in the days to come. If you would like a quicker reply to your questions please contact us through our Facebook,  our website comment section or email at theunobolt@gmail.com  We have crowdfunded our first Uno Bolt in the past and we reached delivery time earlier than expected. We expect to do the same this time around and we have our team ready to go. We do not expect any big risk or challenge affecting our production or delivery time. In the unlikely event that something should delay the delivery time, we will notify our backers.

story:
autoBcon is a low-cost patented device with no monthly or subscription fees created in two versions that are complementary to each other. 

Keychain version is a smart personal panic button that sends emergency GPS notification to your contact during dangerous situations and help track your things.  In addition, you carry with you a programmable smart button with  technology that allow you to set it up for various usage and control other IOT smart devices.

Dashboard version affixed to your vehicle is able to detect vehicle crashes and send an SOS notification to your emergency contacts, which will save precious time that can make the difference between life and death.  Dashboard autoBcon also helps find your parked vehicle, discover available parking lots and recover your stolen vehicle with true crowdsourced information. As a hardware device, it is more accurate than applications that work by software only.

Working seamlessly, automatically and anonymously, autoBcon can turn any vehicle into a connected vehicle and let you to have a panic button by your side at all times.  It is equipped with technology to be a programmable smart button that  controls other connected devices and systems.

 

autoBcon utilizes Bluetooth Low Energy technology and is powered by a CR2032 coin cell battery for two years. The NXP 3-axis accelerometer in dashboard autoBcon is capable of detecting sharp acceleration or deceleration, orientation, shake, tap, double tap, fall, tilt, motion, positioning, shock or vibration, all of which allow it to detect accidents.

The algorithm design by the team behind autoBcon works with data with to avoid false positives. The algorithm is coded inside autoBcon's accelerometer chip, which enables faster response time.  In key chain configuration, autoBcon has a programmable button that can be set up for various functions. 

autoBcon uses a 3-axis accelerometer capable of detecting collision and allow us notify your assigned contacts by sending them your location information via application notification when the accident algorithm is triggered.  However, if the trigger is a false positive, like the device dropping on the floor, you can deactivate it within 10 seconds and the notification will not be sent. 

The dashboard version also comes with a 3M double sided adhesive strip for you to affix autoBcon onto your vehicle.

When the Panic Button is pressed for a continuous 2 seconds on the key chain version of autoBcon, we send an automatic notification to your assigned contacts you set up in the application to warn them about a risky situation you may be in with your GPS Location.  Your assigned contacts who must also download the autoBcon application will know where you are and can take action immediately.

This function can be used independently as you can carry the device along with you, which can be attached to a key chain.  All you need is to have it set up and connected to your autoBcon application on your mobile phone which you carry with you at all times.  More than one device can be paired with your application so that you can have both portable and in vehicle units.

What is IFTTT?

IFTTT derives its name from the programming conditional statement “if this, then that”. What the technology does is to provide a software platform that connects with devices like autoBcon and allow it to work with services from different developers in order to trigger one or more automation events involving those applications, devices and systems.

We highlight three examples on what autoBcon Key Chain with IFTTT is able to enable:-

Activate your autoBcon mobile application when you are looking for a parking lot.  You will receive geo-positioning information through anonymous crowdsourcing about potential available parking places near you automatically, amplifying your probability of getting an available parking lot.

Finding your your vehicle has never been easier. Once you have parked at your destination, autoBcon will detect when you leave your vehicle, logging your car’s GPS position automatically.  All these will happen without having to activate the application.

Subsequently, if you cannot remember where you parked, you can activate and use the application to find your vehicle and guide you back to it.

All these will happen in the background and activate your application only when you need to find your vehicle.

 

As an added function, autoBcon can help locate your stolen vehicle through crowdsourcing. In the unfortunate event where your car is stolen, you can report this incident through the application. 

Once reported, other autoBcon users can help in an anonymous, automatic and seamless way to track your car.  As such, other application users may be able to detect the device in your car and transmit its possible location to you.  This is why you should have your in vehicle unit hidden away from plain sight.  You may even have a decoy unit to throw potential thieves off guard.

We designed autoBcon to be brilliant inside and out. There is a smart programmable button on the key chain unit and a sophisticated algorithm in the dashboard unit. This is coupled with an amazing battery life to keep it going.  Under standard usage, autoBcon will last around two years.

And yes, our software and hardware is about 70% completed. As you can see in the video above, there are hundreds of beta users helping us test our product.  We are entering crowdfunding to raise funds to complete development which we estimate will take a couple of months after crowdfunding ends.

story:
This is Paul Humphrey

For clarification, Paul Humphrey is the pirate. The parrot is Quentin.

Paul Humphrey isn't a hipster or anything. He is just a bloke from Hull with a giant beard. Don't let that put you off. He might even let you stroke it if you're lucky.

So, what's all this about?

  • Paul Humphrey would like a bicycle
  • It is Paul Humphrey's birthday soon
  • We should buy Paul Humphrey a bicycle

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need money to buy a bicycle for Paul Humphrey
  • You will get very little in return other than the joy of having bought Paul Humphrey a bicycle, but you will get some sort of pleasant physical contact with Paul Humphrey. 

The Impact

  • Paul Humphrey will have a bicycle
  • Paul Humphrey will have a cheaper commute to work
  • Paul Humphrey will hang out with us more

Risks & Challenges

  • If we don't raise much money, and we buy Paul Humphrey a second hand bicycle, it might potentially have been stolen. You should contribute more so this isn't on your (or Paul Humphrey's) conscience.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Don't post this somewhere Paul humphrey will see it.

We don't need £500, it's just the minimum IndieGoGo campaign size. £200 would be okay, £500+ would be super great. We'll definitely manage to do something great with any excess cash.

Funding is flexible, so we will get whatever people contribute. The money will arrive after Paul Humphrey's birthday, so I'll just put the bike on my credit card.

PAUL HUMPHREY.

story:
Δείτε την καμπάνια μας στα ελληνικά


-The stylish, fun and enviromentally respectful commute

-An affordable and smart e-vehicle

-Offering the convenience of a car with the economy and ecology of a bicycle

-No need to recharge, unlike other energy consumimg vehicles

-Transport  your family and friends in a gratifying, exuberant, totally green way

-For all of your daily commuting needs



Drive smart - Go solar!



Autoevolution: Looking at vehicles like the Sunnyclist here, you get the feeling humanity isn’t done yet with finding new ways of combining sources of power to provide that all-important forward thrust.

Engadget: You can leave this electric vehicle under the sun or use it as your gym to harness energy

Gizmag: At first glance the Sunnyclist looks like a typical electric tricycle, yet the combination of a solar panel on the roof with pedals for the passengers ensures that its battery can go a long way without requiring an external power supply.


Be bright - Green your city!

Sunnyclist represents an attractive and affordable solution of modern people for green mobility, with minimal costs, autonomy, no environmental pollution and without infrastructure commitments. Αn electrο-solar vehicle (category L5e) that uses a large rotating photovoltaic generator and powerful motors, to carry three passengers and their luggage with an extended driving range. It moves with electricity, which is stored in a lithium battery that can charge from the sun, the grid or from passengers, when they pedal. In normal conditions, the three energy sources, solar, battery and muscle power, contribute symmetrically. This synergy makes SUNNYCLIST the most economic, environmental and autonomous vehicle ever built.

We envisioned an autonomous vehicle that produces its energy consumption. By exploiting the sun and making passengers active in its motion, we reinvent automobility and propose  an alternative commute mode. Humanity has to face tough challenges in the field of air quality, environmental protection and job preservation. We work tirelessly to make our world a little better. 

We are young entrepreneurs striving to make a difference in sunny  Greece, seeking alternative ways to evolve and create new jobs. We are inspired by the environment, nature, sun and man. We discover practical and functional solutions. We think out of the box, respect people and focus on environmental and economic sustainability.

Our Impact Together... By supporting us you give us the opportunity to put our product into mass production and let more people discover our solution. Since we already have a well tested working prototype, we need your support, to make Sunnyclist truly great, to scale up and offer a new opportunity for all people to live greener and smarter. You will also help humanity reach its goals of climate control and at the same time you become a part of our effort to uphold the productive side of Greece, in the most creative way.


How Sunnyclist was born

At the beginning there were only thoughts…   

The environmental and energy problems have increased so much in our days, that we have come to a dead end and the technological solutions are no longer enough. A change in the consumer’s lifestyle is required.

Since 2011 we have been working continuously in order to constantly improve the quality of our solution.

.......with many reproductions of the prototype being built and market tested. 



Working for an uncompromised design!

We are working on an uncompromised state-of-the-art design for the final production vehicle, which is going to be based on the existing thoroughly tested chassis. We keep working on further development in terms of optimal engineering and design aesthetics and human factors, a process that will be finalized before final production and will be incorporated into the final vehicles to be delivered.

On Sunnyclist the function dictates the design

One of the big challenges we are facing while designing Sunnyclist, is to harmonically incorporate the large solar roof to a light vehicle body underneath. We decided to keep the photovoltaic area as large as possible for maximum efficiency and range and this is also the main reason for choosing a flat solar panel surface. We deliberately created Sunnyclist to be a three wheeler for lower friction, weight, complexity and cost.


Testimonials



Features

The Sunnyclist App is being developed for both IOS and ANDROID, and will monitor battery charge, solar power, solar share, estimated driving range per sun exposure time, passengers wourkout informations, callories, pedal share, eco driving,  speed and many other interesting informations.  



Our Bright Ideas! 

  • Synergy 

We break through the technological barriers by synergy and redefining automotive by new function.


The synergy of the sun, battery and human power gives way to a superior and layered result in a positive economic technological and social footprint.

  • Large rotatable solar roof on two parallel axes


  • Individual portable pedal generators for each passenger

Sunnyclist features individual portable pedals. Each passenger can contribute to energy balance producing electric power by the pedal generator. This solution offers superior advantages like flexibility, simplicity, reliability, easy power monitoring and resistance adjustment  




Personalize your Sunnyclist!

The Sunnyclist will be available in three basic editions but you can furthermore customise it. You have multiple choices on the type and number of pedal generators, the size of the battery and the photovoltaic generator, the type of seats (sport or comfortable) and many others. You can also choose your own color combination.  Color choices are Cloud White, black, blue, grey, yellow, orange


The basic versions   

The "City" edition is an affordable solution, oriented for urban use. The City version, equipped with a 540W photovoltaic generator can provide an average of 35 free kilometers per day, that are sufficient for the daily commute in the city. Pedals can be placed optional  

The "Traveler" edition is the most advanced version, equiped   with a 680Wp photovoltaic generator offers an annual solar share of  18000Km. Equipped with pedals for each passenger, an energy analyzer and a 100Ah 48V lithium battery, it can travel up to 190km on a sunny day without the need to get charged. The "Traveler" can be the ultimate recreational vehicle, used for vacation, sightseeing tours and exploring nature.

The "Standard" edition is an economical solution and is intended for transport of visitors, staff and cargo on private roads in hotels, golf yards, large indoor facilities, showrooms etc. The "Standard" edition is not legal for street use.

By tracking the sun, the maximum efficiency increases to 30% **** This is the max width of the solar generator, The width at the wheels is 1,4m  

Perks

Wear it proud! 
Keep going the conversation on sustainable mobility showing the alternative transport mode that Sunnylist represents





The Sunnyclist portable pedal generator Pedal Power Pack Pro and Pedal Power Pack Standart can be perfectly used as indoor trainer to ride inside.

Why not convert your workout into useful power by using a pedal-powered generator? Your workout can a useful role in your home. You can use the electricity immediately to power a television, computer, stereo or other electronics — or store it in batteries to use it later. 

Οne hour workout can power the lighting of your home for one day!

You can upgrade to Pedal Power Pack Pro, the most advanced pedal excerciser, with 150€ more. The Pedal Power Pack Pro is equipped with  Shimano crankset and it is compatible with spd pedals.

Transform the pedal power pack into a home exercise bike with the special frame we have designed for you. You can put your own saddle or handlebar.

Select Perk

Warranty

We are so confident in our Sunnyclist that we provide to a full ONE YEAR! This means that if any parts break due to non-human error during your first year of ownership, we will happily send you brand new replacement parts at no cost to you! Αdditional warranty applies to parts of the vehicle. 10 years for the solar generator. 2 years for battery. Lifetime warranty against oxidation for the frame and the body panels

Meet our Team

The project success is based on the sum of the experiences, skills, professional networks and academic knowledge that the team possesses collectively. The team has accepted love and confidence from the public and is committed to reinvent automobility for general interest.


Use of funds

Since its inception, Sunnyclist is a self funded project with many reproductions of the prototype being built and market tested.  Your contribution to this campaign will allow us to finalize the design and make Sunnyclist the best vehicle possible. We will also purchase raw materials, source components, open molds, develop the App, begin production and legally certify the vehicle for street use.We need your support to scale up the production and achieve the best quality at the lowest price. We have initiated a low scale pilot scheme on where we make our prototypes, so we do not need to invest so much on the facilities. For production we will be able to to scale up to the capacity of 1000 vehicles/year and all methods of production will be handmade. Owner of our manufacturing facility is Andreas Pitsoulis, a high-end machine craftsman. 

Use of funds will differe according to the available amount. This depends also from the kind of Perks that you choose, but here is an estimation of how we will use them. If we meet our goal we will be able to procceed to the licencing of the Sunnyclist for street usage for all the E.U. If we surpass our target and can raise more money we will be able to further develop the Sunnyclist and the production line. We will offer optional upgrades to the Sunnyclist that may include additional color options, front led lights, an edition of the Sunnyclist with steering wheel, different seat options, an alternative exterior styling and much more. So, The more we raise, the more fun and exciting the brand new Sunnyclist becomes! 

If we do not meet the goal we will initiate the production of the Sunnyclist, but not for street usage. 

Risks and challenges

Manufacturing: We have been preparing this project for about four years. We realize your contribution to pre-purchase a Sunnyclist through this campaign is a significant investment, and we do not take that lightly.  We are confident that we can bring the Sunnyclist to life, and have made the necessary accommodations to ensure this product will be delivered, but we need your help to get it there. We don't anticipate running into any major engineering challenges, as we've already addressed them developing our current prototype. We are sure we will encounter some bumps on the road, but we feel confident that we can overcome them. All that remains is tidying up a few rough edges to make a finished product. We already have the designers and engineers on board to take care of that, and it's almost ready to go!

Then we will hire some employees for the actual fabrication and manufacturing.

Fulfillment: We have teamed up with an organized logistics company that will secure accurate and fast delivery to our backers.

Financial management: Due to the instability of the Greek banking system and in order to ensure the uninterrupted financial management of this project, all transactions will be carried out through a Swedish bank and pay pal.


Manufacturing & Timeline

Our goal is to deliver the best product possible.  We are working on stress and durability testing, as also on crash test simulation,  to ensure a quality product. Initial Sunnyclist production will be made and assembled at our production facility located in Crete.  This allows us to personally inspect each component and test before delivering. However the capacity is not suited for mass quantity and we will be able to produce 10 vehicles per month. Should we receive a large volume of orders, we do have a contingency plan in place with strategic production connections in Europe.  

We are working hard to deliver product for Summer 2016.  



What's next?

Since the conception of Sunnyclist, we feel that we are opening a new field to create enormous opportunities. We are creating a fertile field for creative development, to try new ideas, new designs, new materials and innovative technologies. It is also a new field to try as people live differently and adopt new sustainable habits. But all that will only happen through your support and then we will have a bright future!

Technology

The whole concept is based on simple yet fundamental scientific principles. Through simplicity but also extensive study, the Sunnyclist exceedingly exploits both solar and human energy thus opening new horizons in sustainable mobility.

  • Light and firm aluminum frame
  • Low center of gravity near the rear axis providing maximum safety.
  • Use of the most efficient photovoltaic cells of hybrid technology in the market    ( 22,5% performance).
  • Solar charger with MPPT technology (maximum power point tracking)
  • High quality, light and efficient powertrain
  • Rotatable solar roof to face the sun while in parking position.
  • Regenerative Brake
  • Brushless in wheel DC motor of high efficiency (90%).
  • Lithium Batteries
  • Pedal generators whith electronic adjustable cadence
  • Energy managment system


Did you know?

  • The Sunnyclist has been running challenges with great success, as the round of Crete covering 800km in 5 days
  • The Sunnyclist is an award-wining project on cleantech European competitions 
  • The Energy produced by solar and human power is more valuable from the energy stored in the battery
  • The sunnyclist has higher power density than a common electric vehicle: The power density of a solar generator, for most populated places globally, can reach up to 125wh/kg while a LiFePO4 battery pack used in most electric vehicles has a power density of 80 wh/kg and a lead battery pack used in golf carts has a power density of 30wh/kg.
  • The Sunnyclist features longer life time: Lithium batteries which are used in BEV have a life expectancy of about 10 years, while solar cells last more than 20 years.  In addition the solar generator ensures smaller charging cycles of the vehicle’s battery, thus extending its lifetime.

How You Can Help Us Further ...

Not everybody has the financial resources to support us, but even the smallest bit of contribution does actually count. Spread the word by driving our message on Facebook following us on Twitter and asking friends and family to back us. 

Imagine a world where people are commuting freely, without polluting the environment  and only we together can make it happen!


FAQ

The Sunnyclist is just for sunny places or for summertime, right? 

Absolutely not!
Indeed, the Sunnyclist is very much at home in sunny environments, but it functions just as well with less sunshine. The only difference will be the reduced, costless, effortless energy, collected for use. The performance will be the same, whilst still maintaining a significant advantage against conventional electric vehicles. The efficiency shown in this presentation is based on places like southern Europe, with typical direct irradiation of about 1600 kWh/m2. In your area the solar performance may be higher or lower.
This map helps you estimate the solar driving range in your area.

So how do I use it, should I have a sunny parking?

As stated previously the more sun you have the increase in performance and fun. Nevertheless you can use the Sunnyclist like a common electric vehicle and charge it from a simple household outlet in less than three hours. 

How does the Sunnyclist performs during the year?

The next diagram shows the monthly distribution of the daily solar driving range. The data refers to places like south Europe (normal direct irradiation about 1600 kWh/m2). In more sunny places the monthly distribution is even, the opposite happens in less sunny places. 

Is the Sunnyclist safe?

Absolutely! That's one of our main goals with this vehicle. Tree-wheelers need extra care to avoid a roll-over. The Sunnyclist with a low center of gravity, near the rear axle and an evenly distributed load on the wheels, it has excellent traction and cornering stability

The Sunnyclist is also equipped with three-point seatbelts for all passengers.

Do I need a special license to operate a Sunnyclist ?

 Sunnyclist is an “Electric Three Wheeler”. For the EU (classified as Le5) you need a car or a motorbike driving license. For the rest of the world each country, state and city has its own laws and restrictions. Please review your local motor vehicle rules and laws. Please note that we will be able to release  Sunnyclist for street use, only if we achieve our goal.

I want to pledge for a Sunnyclist for street use. What if you do not achieve your goal? 

If we do not meet the goal we will initiate the production of the Sunnyclist, but not for street usage. So you can request a refund before the camapaign ends. However even after the campaign ends we will refund the 85% of the amount.

I really want Sunnyclist! Can I by one anyway?

Yes, if you don't need it for street use there is no problem. The vehicle will be CE marked. However we can't guarantee it will be street-legal in your country. Each country has a different set of regulations concerning motorcycles and three wheelers. Unfortunately, it's not within our resources right now to research and comply with every regulation in every country, or offer different models for each region. However, if such regulations are simple, like "cannot exceed 50 kph", then we can definitely customize your Sunnyclist to comply. 

What If the battery runs out ? Does it go only by the sun or the pedals.

The traction of the Sunnyclist is based on the battery that stores electricity from wherever it comes, the sun, the pedal or the network and feeds  the motors with as much power as they need. If the battery runs out then the vehicle will only move with the power that can provide that moment as the PV generator (max 680W) and the passengers (about 700W). This means around 1,4 kW maximum power with the sun and passengers together. This power is only enough to propel the vehicle on an even road at a speed of 20km/h. If uphill,  his power is not enough. Therefore, in practice, it is difficult to move the vehicle with an exhausted battery and is strongly not recommended, except for emergency, to move to the nearest outlet or a sunnier place. Therefore if the battery runs out you should wait for the vehicle to charge from the sun were it will gather enough energy or to charge from an outlet.

What about vehicle maintenance?

The Sunnyclist requires minimal maintenance. There is no need for water or oil. The materials that wear down are tyres, brake pads and shock absorbers which are common in the market place and their replacement can be done by the technician of the neighborhood. Similarly bicycle parts can be found in a common bike store. If you need replacement or maintenance of a specialised component you can contact us to send it to you and give you technical support for repair.

Why solar roof is flat, would it be more beautiful if it was curved?

Two of the key design principles of Sunnyclist is the efficiency and the economy. Photovoltaic cells have maximum performance when all have the same orientation ie when the solar roof is flat. If the solar roof was curved it would dramatically lower performance and increase manufacturing cost. This is why the Sunnyclist has a much better performance than other solar vehicles were unable to escape from the stereotypes of automotive design.

How long does it take to charge the battery?

We are offering 120V, 220V, and 240V charging adapters. We will be sending an email to all our backers at the end of the campaign with a survey to gather you shipping address, desired eBike color, and charger preference. 

Do I need to pedal it to operate it?

No, on the Sunnyclist the pedals are optional and portable. 

Does the Sunnyclist have a line of accessories?

We are planning to launch along with the Sunnyclist, a line of accessories that add to the users experience which include, LED lighting, speakers, case/cover, seats, Luggage rack, etc.



Thanks to all of our supporters, funs and friends standing by our side!

Special thanks to:

Steve papadakis, Ruth Patricia Jenkinson, Spyros Andriotis, Michael Kapsalis, Tasos Anastasakis, Kostas Dimakis,  Olga Marmaridi, Irene Prifti, Elisabeth Rosette, Nikos Viglas, Eleni Nikoloudaki, Vaggelis, Miachael Manioudis, Manolis Armoutakis, John and Myrsini, Kostas Tsourakakis, Andreas Pitsoulis, Manolis Papadakis, Stelios papadogiannakis, Aggelis Giannis, Marios Christodoulakis, George Christodoulakis, Vasilis Tritsaris, Miltos Choumerianos, Artemis Saitakis, Georgia Tavantzopoulou, Athina oikonomidou, Dimitris Koutsoupakis, Kostas Lafkas

Δείτε την καμπάνια μας στα ελληνικά

-The stylish,
fun and enviromentally respectful commute
-An
affordable and smart e-vehicle
-Offering the
convenience of a car with the economy and ecology of a bicycle
-No need to
recharge, unlike other energy consumimg vehicles
-Transport  your family and friends in a gratifying,
exuberant, totally green way
-For all of
your daily commuting needs





Drive smart - Go solar!






Autoevolution:  Looking at vehicles like the Sunnyclist here, you get the feeling humanity isn’t done yet with finding new ways of combining sources of power to provide that all-important forward thrust.
Engadget: You can leave this electric vehicle under the sun or use it as your gym to harness energy
Gizmag: At first glance the Sunnyclist looks like a typical electric tricycle, yet the combination of a solar panel on the roof with pedals for the passengers ensures that its battery can go a long way without requiring an external power supply.

Be bright - Green your city!

Sunnyclist represents an attractive and affordable solution of modern people for green mobility, with minimal costs, autonomy, no environmental pollution and without infrastructure commitments. Αn electrο-solar vehicle (category L5e) that uses a large rotating photovoltaic generator and powerful motors, to carry three passengers and their luggage with an extended driving range. It moves with electricity, which is stored in a lithium battery that can charge from the sun, the grid or from passengers, when they pedal. In normal conditions, the three energy sources, solar, battery and muscle power, contribute symmetrically. This synergy makes SUNNYCLIST the most economic, environmental and autonomous vehicle ever built.


We envisioned an autonomous vehicle that produces its energy consumption. By exploiting the sun and making passengers active in its motion, we reinvent automobility and propose  an alternative commute mode. Humanity has to face tough challenges in the field of air quality, environmental protection and job preservation. We work tirelessly to make our world a little better. 
We are young entrepreneurs striving to make a difference in sunny  Greece, seeking alternative ways to evolve and create new jobs. We are inspired by the environment, nature, sun and man. We discover practical and functional solutions. We think out of the box, respect people and focus on environmental and economic sustainability.
Our Impact Together... By supporting us you give us the opportunity to put our product into mass production and let more people discover our solution. Since we already have a well tested working prototype, we need your support, to make Sunnyclist truly great, to scale up and offer a new opportunity for all people to live greener and smarter. You will also help humanity reach its goals of climate control and at the same time you become a part of our effort to uphold the productive side of Greece, in the most creative way.






How Sunnyclist was born
At the beginning there were only thoughts…   
The environmental and energy problems have increased so much in our days, that we have come to a dead end and the technological solutions are no longer enough. A change in the consumer’s lifestyle is required.
Since 2011 we have been working continuously in order to constantly improve the quality of our solution.

.......with many reproductions of the prototype being built and market tested. 





Working for an uncompromised design!
We are working on an uncompromised state-of-the-art design for the final production vehicle, which is going to be based on the existing thoroughly tested chassis. We keep working on further development in terms of optimal engineering and design aesthetics and human factors, a process that will be finalized before final production and will be incorporated into the final vehicles to be delivered.
On Sunnyclist the function dictates the design
One of the big challenges we are facing while designing Sunnyclist, is to harmonically incorporate the large solar roof to a light vehicle body underneath. We decided to keep the photovoltaic area as large as possible for maximum efficiency and range and this is also the main reason for choosing a flat solar panel surface. We deliberately created Sunnyclist to be a three wheeler for lower friction, weight, complexity and cost.




Testimonials




Features









The Sunnyclist App is being developed for both IOS and ANDROID, and will monitor battery charge, solar power, solar share, estimated driving range per sun exposure time, passengers wourkout informations, callories, pedal share, eco driving,  speed and many other interesting informations.  





Our Bright Ideas! 



Synergy 




We break through the technological barriers by synergy
and redefining automotive by new function.



The synergy of the sun, battery and human power gives way to a superior
and layered result in a positive economic technological and social
footprint.


Large rotatable solar roof on two parallel axes



Individual portable pedal generators for each passenger


Sunnyclist features individual
portable pedals. Each passenger can contribute to energy balance producing
electric power by the pedal generator. This solution offers superior advantages
like flexibility, simplicity, reliability, easy power monitoring and
resistance adjustment  




Personalize your Sunnyclist!


The Sunnyclist will be available in three basic editions but you can
furthermore customise it. You have multiple choices on the type and number of
pedal generators, the size of the battery and the photovoltaic generator, the
type of seats (sport or comfortable) and many others. You can also choose
your own color combination.  Color choices are Cloud White, black, blue, grey,
yellow, orange



The basic versions   

The "City" edition is an affordable solution, oriented for urban use. The City version, equipped with a 540W photovoltaic generator can provide an average of 35 free kilometers per day, that are sufficient for the daily commute in the city. Pedals can be placed optional  
The "Traveler" edition is the most advanced version, equiped   with a 680Wp photovoltaic generator offers an annual solar share of  18000Km. Equipped with pedals for each passenger, an energy analyzer and a 100Ah 48V lithium battery, it can travel up to 190km on a sunny day without the need to get charged. The "Traveler" can be the ultimate recreational vehicle, used for vacation, sightseeing tours and exploring nature.
The "Standard" edition is an economical solution and is intended for transport of visitors, staff and cargo on private roads in hotels, golf yards, large indoor facilities, showrooms etc. The "Standard" edition is not legal for street use.
