Perks



Wear it proud! Keep going the conversation on sustainable mobility showing the alternative transport mode that Sunnylist represents











The Sunnyclist portable pedal generator Pedal Power Pack Pro and Pedal Power Pack Standart can be perfectly used as indoor trainer to ride inside.
Why not convert your workout into useful power by using a pedal-powered generator? Your workout can a useful role in your home. You can use the electricity immediately to power a television, computer, stereo or other electronics — or store it in batteries to use it later. 
Οne hour workout can power the lighting of your home for one day!
You can upgrade to Pedal Power Pack Pro, the most advanced pedal excerciser, with 150€ more. The Pedal Power Pack Pro is equipped with  Shimano crankset and it is compatible with spd pedals.
Transform the pedal power pack into a home exercise bike with the special frame we have designed for you. You can put your own saddle or handlebar.

Select Perk

Warranty

We are so confident in our Sunnyclist that we provide to a full ONE YEAR! This means that if any parts break due to non-human error during your first year of ownership, we will happily send you brand new replacement parts at no cost to you! Αdditional warranty applies to parts of the vehicle. 10 years for the solar generator. 2 years for battery. Lifetime warranty against oxidation for the frame and the body panels

Meet our Team

The project success is
based on the sum of the experiences, skills, professional networks and academic
knowledge that the team possesses collectively. The team has
accepted love and confidence from the public and is committed to reinvent automobility for general interest.






Use of funds

Since its inception, Sunnyclist is a self funded project with many reproductions of the prototype being built and market tested. 
Your contribution to this campaign will allow us to finalize the design and make Sunnyclist the best vehicle possible. We will also purchase raw materials, source components, open molds, develop the App, begin production and legally certify the vehicle for street use.We need your support to scale up the production and achieve the best quality at the lowest price. We have initiated a low scale pilot scheme on where we make our prototypes, so we do not need to invest so much on the facilities. For production we will be able to to scale up to the capacity of 1000 vehicles/year and all methods of production will be handmade. Owner of our manufacturing facility is Andreas Pitsoulis, a high-end machine craftsman. 
Use of funds will differe according to the available amount. This depends also from the kind of Perks that you choose, but here is an estimation of how we will use them. If we meet our goal we will be able to procceed to the licencing of the Sunnyclist for street usage for all the E.U. If we surpass our target and can raise more money we will be able to further develop the Sunnyclist and the production line. We will offer optional upgrades to the Sunnyclist that may include additional color options, front led lights, an edition of the Sunnyclist with steering wheel, different seat options, an alternative exterior styling and much more. So, The more we raise, the more fun and exciting the brand new Sunnyclist becomes! 


If we do not meet the goal we will initiate the production of the Sunnyclist, but not for street usage. 
Risks and challenges
Manufacturing: We have been preparing this project for about four years. We realize your contribution to pre-purchase a Sunnyclist through this campaign is a significant investment, and we do not take that lightly.  We are confident that we can bring the Sunnyclist to life, and have made the necessary accommodations to ensure this product will be delivered, but we need your help to get it there. We don't anticipate running into any major engineering challenges, as we've already addressed them developing our current prototype. We are sure we will encounter some bumps on the road, but we feel confident that we can overcome them. All that remains is tidying up a few rough edges to make a finished product. We already have the designers and engineers on board to take care of that, and it's almost ready to go!
Then we will hire some employees for the actual fabrication and manufacturing.
Fulfillment: We have teamed up with an organized logistics company that will secure accurate and fast delivery to our backers.
Financial management: Due to the instability of the Greek banking system and in order to ensure the uninterrupted financial management of this project, all transactions will be carried out through a Swedish bank and pay pal.
Manufacturing & Timeline
Our goal is to deliver the best product possible.  We are working on stress and durability testing, as also on crash test simulation,  to ensure a quality product. Initial Sunnyclist production will be made and assembled at our production facility located in Crete.  This allows us to personally inspect each component and test before delivering. However the capacity is not suited for mass quantity and we will be able to produce 10 vehicles per month. Should we receive a large volume of orders, we do have a contingency plan in place with strategic production connections in Europe.  
We are working hard to deliver product for Summer 2016.  






What's next?



Since the conception of Sunnyclist, we feel that we are opening a new field to create enormous opportunities. We are creating a fertile field for creative development, to try new ideas, new designs, new materials and innovative technologies. It is also a new field to try as people live differently and adopt new sustainable habits. But all that will only happen through your support and then we will have a bright future!

Technology
The whole concept is based on simple yet fundamental scientific principles. Through simplicity but also extensive study, the Sunnyclist exceedingly exploits both solar and human energy thus opening new horizons in sustainable mobility.


Light and firm aluminum frame
Low center of gravity near the rear axis providing maximum safety.
Use of the most efficient photovoltaic cells of hybrid technology in the market    ( 22,5% performance).

Solar charger with MPPT technology (maximum power point tracking)
High quality, light and efficient powertrain
Rotatable solar roof to face the sun while in parking position.
Regenerative Brake
Brushless in wheel DC motor of high efficiency (90%).
Lithium Batteries
Pedal generators whith electronic adjustable cadence
Energy managment system


Did you know?


The Sunnyclist has been running challenges with great success, as the round of Crete covering 800km in 5 days


The Sunnyclist is an award-wining project on cleantech European competitions 

The Energy produced by solar and human power is more valuable from the energy stored in the battery
The sunnyclist has higher power density than a common electric vehicle: The power density of a solar generator, for most populated places globally, can reach up to 125wh/kg while a LiFePO4 battery pack used in most electric vehicles has a power density of 80 wh/kg and a lead battery pack used in golf carts has a power density of 30wh/kg.
The Sunnyclist features longer life time: Lithium batteries which are used in BEV have a life expectancy of about 10 years, while solar cells last more than 20 years.  In addition the solar generator ensures smaller charging cycles of the vehicle’s battery, thus extending its lifetime.

Not everybody has the financial resources to support us, but even the smallest bit of contribution does actually count. Spread the word by driving our message on Facebook following us on Twitter and asking friends and family to back us. 
Imagine a world where people are commuting freely, without polluting the environment  and only we together can make it happen!

The Sunnyclist is also equipped with three-point seatbelts for all passengers.

Each country has a different set of regulations concerning motorcycles and three wheelers. Unfortunately, it's not within our resources right now to research and comply with every regulation in every country, or offer different models for each region. Some principal tasks of our mission:

1 - Transform Gas cars to electric

2- Tuning cars and make them Super attractive and powerful with less money than expected

3 – Make cars accessible to disabled people

Details

1 - Transform Gas cars to electric

Embarrassed about your old car's bad breath and environmental unfriendliness? Or you care about Mother Nature because it’s so damaged by CO2? Worry no more, because WE ARE HERE to make your car 100% electric .

­A majority of the electric cars on the road today are "home brew" conversion vehicles. People with an interest in electric cars convert existing gasoline-powered car­s to electric in their backyards and garages. There are many Web sites that talk about the phenomenon and show you how to do it, where to get parts, but you cant make a Perfect and powerful Electric car .

Gasoline-powered cars. They are perhaps the most inefficient device that many of us use daily. We really should all be driving electric vehicles The internal combustion engine is inefficient in term of pollution, gas costs and maintenance costs. But, as you may have heard, there are no electric vehicles available today that resemble conventional cars or trucks. Companies like Phoenix Motorcars, Tesla Motors, Commuter Cars and Miles Automotive Group and ZAP are coming close, but you still can't plunk down some cash and buy an electric car from them today. The only type of electric cars that can be purchased are NEVs (Neighbor Electric Vehicles), which usually have a top speed of about 25 MPH. But wait – NOW WE ARE HERE. We studied All The Best Electric cars and we make connection to get the best people to Make Your cars Electric and Super Powerful Like a Tesla or a BMW i8

There are a lot of good reasons to convert your car from petrol to electric power. Some of these include:

1. Reduce emissions

The EV (electric vehicle) produces no emissions, so no toxic fumes which are especially hazardous to human health in places like tunnels, enclosed car parks, around schools, shopping centres, busy intersections, and so on.

When you charge your EV from the mains power grid, you will create emissions at the power station, depending on the generation technology in use, but greenhouse gases will generally be lower than if petrol (or diesel) is burnt in the vehicle itself. Charging EVs overnight from off-peak power can significantly reduce their impact on the environment, and bringing renewable energy sources, such as wind or solar power, on-line improves the EV's environmental impact.

2. Low Running Costs

An EV is much cheaper to run than its petrol counterpart. Typically in Australia we would expect an electricity cost of 1 to 2 cents per kilometre to run an EV. Compare that to the fuel cost of your current car. Furthermore, since there is very little to service and maintain in the electric system, the cost of servicing and maintenance is negligible.

3. Economic Benefits

Cheaper motoring is nice for the individual, but reducing our dependence on imported fuels is a benefit for the national economy as a whole. Our expenditure on imported oil mostly creates offshore profits for foreign or multinational corporations, rather than circulating through our own economy and benefiting our community.

4. Excellent Performance

Contrary to some misguided reports, electric cars have excellent performance, and can be great fun to drive. They deliver power where you need it - at low RPM, so you get great acceleration, and excellent top speed as well.

2-TUNING

We will be one of the big names among the refiners of exclusive cars. Equipped with intelligent functionality, convincing technology, and captivating aesthetics, they trigger admiration wherever they appear: on race tracks, streets, or car parks. Worldwide.

today and in the future. We will put our know-how into the product development and car aesthetics. Thus, we create values that do not obey uniformity, but are characterized by individuality.

Geared towards the needs of our customers, we have worked out a concept that will make us even more stronger and more perceptible. With new ideas and convincing products. Always with the highest standards of quality, design and lifestyle. And always striving for fulfilling our customers’ special desires. Also yours. Continue to look forward to exclusive highlights and unique cars. Today. Tomorrow. And the days after tomorrow.

Everyone who dreams of an exclusive car can let us turn it into a unique item. We realise your wishes. For you to experience your dream of the perfect car. From very close up. In every moment. Whenever you open the door, get into your car, and start the engine. Pure ecstasy. An unrivalled feeling. Made us

3 – Make cars accessible to disabled people :

help them live an easy life we will do it for free or have a Big discount

How Much we Must Have and how you could Help us :

We are requesting you to complete our ambitious financing plan that needed: $ 500,000 to create our project

Why we chose Indiagogo: thou our journey to raise capital for our project we visit all the banks and none of them Give capital to startup entrepreneurs (unsecured credit) .  More than that if your business is rolling more than 6 month and you want to rise capital to grow it, they charge you with Large interest.

In Two words: This is Your Project. But to give life to this project, we need you! We count on you to start our project .

Be generous and consider this as a donation. we will never forget your favor to our project .

In counterparties you will have A lot of good stuff and Products.

TEAM

Sonia Vin ‘’ Partner One “ : Expert at cars and auto parts . been in this industry for more than 7 Years and she learned from the best

Ayoub Mh ‘’ partner two ‘’ : he studied math and business and have 3 mentors in business

Finely

Thank You so Much And share this project with your friends family and close ones .
Step by step we can change the world, be with us . Donate Now.
PS : if you have any advice or feedback or any idea how to improve this project .

 Share it with us .
THANK YOU

story:
C|net - "It could become an intriguing option for urban commutes."

Engadget - "a curious piece of hardware, and we can't wait to see it in the flesh when it arrives"

BGR - "electric bike that can be easily folded and packed into a regular backpack, and carried around alongside your laptop and books."

Who Are We?

     Impossible Technology is an eclectic mix of professionals, hobbyists, and specialists based in the United States and China. Impossible Technology started as a team of engineers and software designers in a dorm room and has only grown from there. Our current team has come together from all parts of the globe in pursuit of one goal: the creation of the world’s most compact foldable electric bike. When we first began to design Impossible, we felt that Impossible needed to be more than just a folding bicycle. It needed to be compact enough to fit inside a backpack and lightweight enough to be easily transported anywhere. Creating a bike designed to be both incredibly light and yet durable has been no easy task.

"The first smart e-bike that can fit in your backpack"

     Impossible Bike: the world’s first foldable e-bike combining portability with ingenuity. Using groundbreaking technology to fold the bike into a smaller portable unit while maintaining structural integrity, Impossible bike transforms the typical function of an electric bike into the most advanced vehicle of multimodal transportation.Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

     When we began to design the Impossible bike, we felt it needed to be more than just a folding bicycle. It needed to be compact enough to fit inside a backpack and light enough to carry anywhere. Creating a bike designed to be both incredibly light and incredibly durable has been no easy task.

     Impossible Bike technology evolves from the fundamental physics of transportation, the wheel, through combining a circular carbon fiber frame, with a circular retractable wheel, to a circular ultra-thin motor. With its futuristic frame and wheels, powered by the thinnest motor and lightest battery, Impossible Bike is designed to be agile and fully adaptable to your lifestyle and can travel up to 30 km on a single charge.

     We developed a frame built to last: a frame built around circles instead of a single horizontal girder. The circular design helps to ensure that the bike spreads the weight equally across the frame. We placed the seat and handle bars at similar heights so that the front and rear wheels bear the weight of the rider equally. We use carbon fiber as the primary material in the frame, making it both extremely light and very durable. The “connecting box” in the middle of the frame is one of the handfuls of pieces made of heavier steel. This steel box can easily hold the rider and withstand the shocks associated with everyday use. In its current incarnation, Impossible can carry up to 100 kilograms/220pounds.

     Protected from rust by ultra-weather resistant carbon fiber, Impossible Bike can accompany you anyway, anywhere, anytime.  We went further to protect and save space, we have combined the function of riding saddle and carrying case. While folded, the NeverWet-coated carrying case keeps Impossible and its charger clean and ready for use no matter where you store it. Even on rainy days, backers can enjoy a safe and comfortable ride.

     An innovative take on bike technology, Impossible Bike portability focus does not mean compromising on durability: the frame boasts thick high-strength steel grade attachments and bearings inspired by automotive engineering.

     One of our main challenges was choosing an electric motor that would fit our parameters in terms of both power and weight. The Impossible bike when fully funded will feature a brushless DC motor completely designed by Impossible Technology. 

     The microcontroller chip is small, lightweight, and powerful. The chip connects the battery, the disc motor, and wireless receiver to the Impossible bike. The microcontroller chip is the primary component integrating the hardware and software. With the Bluetooth connectivity powered by the microcontroller, the Impossible bike can connect to any device. With ten 2900mah 10A 3.6V 44.5g batteries powered by the microcontroller, the Impossible bike can cruise at up to 12.5 mph for 60 minutes, or at normal speed for up to 15.6 miles.

     Have al the data you need in the palm of your hand and all the security on your back: Impossible Backpack will automatically sync to your Impossible Bike's Bluetooth enabled microcontroller which is automatically synced to your smartphone. 

     Impossible Bike features a set of ultra-durable mechanical wheels that support daily use on even the most uneven terrain.

     Riding Impossible is a breeze. Navigate throughout the city easily, simply: unfold, pull, lock, and go. point the front wheel in the direction of travel and off you go — no pedaling necessary. You can choose any mode of transportation other than the Impossible Bike by simply collapsing the bike. 

     With enough support, we will also offer removable covers in our online store, available in a variety of colors. In its current form, around 40% of Impossible’s parts are customizable, such as the wheels and handlebars. We aim to make the other 60% similarly customizable. We plan to include even more accessories and designs in the future through our online store.  
     There are five models to choose from: BLACK, WHITE, RED, BLUE, and ORIGINAL. Impossible BLACK boasts a sleek smooth black frame, black wheels, and black handlebar inspired by the All-Black-Everything design, and will look incredibly stoic under all riders. However, for those who prefer more contrast, Impossible WHITE will offer the same features as Impossible BLACK, but in a more Tron-style. Impossible ORIGINAL takes on a minimalist design of maintaining the carbon fiber color. Impossible RED and Impossible BLUE can match your colorful headphones as your roll down the block.   
 

Design

     The intuitive design of the Impossible Bike app user interface gives you easy access and readable bike data, as well as battery notifications, activity feed, and more.

     No need to worry about a bike lock: Impossible Bike can always be at your side wherever you go thanks to its unique physical design.

Impossible Bike Specs

Hidden Batteries 

     Impossible has a removable battery installed in the body frame that makes invisible so you can enjoy the slick and clean design. You can simply take it out and replace it with another pair. This makes impossible the best travel companion. You can take it with you in a car, train, boat and even an airplane.

 

Available Packages 

  • Impossible Black

  • Impossible White

  • Impossible Black & White

  • Impossible Original Carbon Fiber (Limited Edition)

  • Impossible Dark Blue (Limited Edition)

  • Impossible Red (Limited Edtion)

Impossible T-shirts

  • Impossible T-shirt (Black)

 

Risks and challenges

     We’ve been developing the Impossible Bike for more than 3 years, so we are confident about our procurement strategy and production capacity. We have spent months in negotiations with various manufacturers, we just need the capital to pay the manufacturer.

This past year, we dedicated ourselves to mastering the development of our Impossible Bike's weight and fold technology, while designing the smartest road companion ever.

As we are gearing up to the final stages of our development and heading to mass production, we want to include you in the last chapter of this adventure to make sure we are truly designing the bike you all have been waiting for.

When you back this project, you are taking a journey with us. Therefore, your experience and insight are important to us and we will be listening to your feedback and trying our best to integrate them into the Impossible Bike.

story:
Please go to www.eyeonroad.com to order.

Night Hawk Mirror Dashcam with 2 Cameras | Super Night Vision​ | Co-Pilot Warning Technology | Accident Prevention

The only dashcam that can turn night into day to record and prevent accidents

Dashcams are great for protection from wrongful tickets and lawsuits after an accident. But what if it could have been prevented in the first place?

The Eye on Road Night Hawk is simply the best mirror dashcam on the market because of it's fast performance, and the most advanced night vision and accident prevention technologies.  

SUPER NIGHT VISION

The new Super Night Vision camera has the highest picture resolution and enhancements - especially at night.  It automatically switches from daylight to night recording modes.

Other dashcams that claim to have night vision just increase the brightness but wash out the picture.  They use infrared LED's to light up the picture but that range is limited.

The Night Hawk can make night seem like day - while maintaining the picture clarity and color quality.  The amount of enhancements can be adjusted up to 45% higher.

CO-PILOT WARNING TECHNOLOGY

Older warning systems fail to work at night because they need a well-lit view to "see". Our Super Night Vision helps the artificial intelligence Co-Pilot Warning Technology to work day and night to prevent lane drifting and following too close - the 2 leading causes for accidents.

The latest chip based algorithms ensure the fastest response times, and unlike older technologies, the Lane Drift Warning System is adjustable according to the size of your vehicle (exclusive feature).

The 5 inch HD LCD monitor (can be turned off) shows the lane guidelines in color, and even the distance from the car in front (exclusive feature), on an overlay.  When the Co-Pilot detects you’re too close or drifting, an alarm sounds, guidelines change colors, and distance indicator starts flashing from GREEN to RED.

The picture below is a zoom shot of the mirror monitor showing the guidelines and distance overlays.  The actual recorded video is much better quality and does not record the overlays.

170 + 90 DEGREES RECORDING

Both the front and 2nd cameras record simultaneously on 2 separate channels and show in a picture in picture or full screen display.  The 2nd camera can also be used inside a taxi or school bus for security.

The Night Hawk clips on top of your rearview mirror, and plugs into the cigarette adapter for easy installation. The thin wires easily hide on the inside, and the waterproof 2nd camera can be mounted inside or outside.

The monitor can be turned off, and the 2 cameras, Super Night Vision, and Co-Pilot Warning Technology will still be running to protect you with Audio Alarms.  You will never run out of memory because the loop recording makes sure that there’s always space for recordings.

 

So whether you’re a new driver, professional driver, young or experienced, the Night Hawk from Eye on Road will always be there to protect you and your property.   

SUPERIOR VIDEO FEATURES

  • 170 degree wide angle 6 element lens + 90 degree rear (2nd) camera coverage
  • Wide Dynamic Range eliminates glare
  • High Dynamic Range balances brightness and color reproduction
  • 3D Noise Reduction for accurate video recording

NIGHT HAWK DEVELOPMENT

My name is Kelvin.  One day in sunny Florida, a kid cut in front of me because he found my driving too slow.  His side fender hit the front corner of my car.  MY insurance told me that while they sympathized with me, unless I had video proof to show that he hit me, the burden of proof was on me. 

After that, we researched dashcams and found dozens from $20 to $400, and it is true that you do get what you pay for. The products on the lower price range were toy-like and not useful.  The ones on the higher range may seem expensive but will prove useful and pay for itself the first accident or ticket it saves you from.  

With our contacts in Asia, we started distributing mirror dashcams in 2015 to wholesalers.  During that time, driver warning apps began appearing for smartphones and we knew that if they were chip-based, that would result in faster performance and accuracy.   But it would need better night time imaging to work in dark areas.

With the cooperation and assistance of our manufacturing partner, we developed the Night Hawk to not only record video clearly day and night, it would also prevent accidents from happening due to the two most common causes - lane drifting from distracted or tired drivers, and following too close.  We believe that it will help protect all drivers.

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

In April 2017, we had a small beta test batch made and shipped to our wholesale customers.  Their feedback led us to believe that the Night Hawk can be helpful to any driver, and even other drivers, and pedestrians.

While the current retail price of $280 is still reasonable, we want to make it more affordable.  The components, lenses, chipsets are expensive because they are not used in high volume low priced models.  With that in mind, we are offering HUGE DISCOUNTS to Indiegogo members in the hopes that you guys can help us drive the volume up, so we can order more components in bulk and drive the prices down.

Either way, we have already reserved factory floor time for August and expect to start shipping Night Hawk units the end of August or early September.

  • April 2015 - we started distributing mirror dashcams
  • May 2015 to now - driver warning apps began appearing for smartphones
  • June 2016 - research to port warning technology to chipsets
  • April 2017 - small batch of Night Hawk shipped to distributors for feedback
  • May 2017 - Indiegogo campaign planned to raise volume and lower pices
  • June to July 2017 - Indiegogo campaign
  • August 2017 - Night Hawk production
  • Late August to September 2017 - worldwide shipping starts to Indiegogo backers

SPECIFICATIONS

  • 5 "IPS LCD screen 
  • Maximum memory card size 32 GB = 530 Minutes 
  • Front Camera Range 170 degrees
  • Sony CCD image sensor 
  • 30 FPS 
  • Camera resolution 1920 x 1080
  • Recorded video ​HD 2304 x 1296P
  • Rear 2nd Camera 90 degrees
  • Simultaneous 2 channel recording
  • Safe Distance Warning System
  • Lane Drift Warning System
  • G Sensor for Video Lock
  • Loop recording
  • Microphone on/off
  • Cigarette Lighter Adapter

story:
What is TwoFerry?

Let’s break it down, dictionary style:

Two [too] Noun

A cardinal number, 1 plus 1

In our case, it’s two people. A Captain and a Pilot. Both come to you. The Pilot drives you home in your car, and the Captain follows.

Ferry [fer-ee]

Verb

To carry or convey back and forth over a fixed route in a boat or plane

Before you get your hopes up, we only “carry and convey” in cars. Yours, to be specific. How awesome is that?

 

How it works

  1. You download the rider app and provide info about yourself and your car.
  2. Once you order a ride, a TwoFerry team comes and picks you up. Essentially, it’s a cab with 2 drivers. We call them Captains and Pilots.
  3. The Pilot will get out, confirm some information and then drive you home in your own vehicle, while the Captain follows behind.

That’s it! We will provide an easy and convenient way to reduce intoxicated drivers while getting you and car home at the same time and in one trip. It’s a win-win!

 

How it started

About 10 years ago, I had this crazy idea to buy a gas-powered, collapsible scooter and bring people home from the bar in their own car. I’d fold my scooter up and put it in their trunk, get them home safe, and then scoot myself back into town and do it all over again.

I never got further than buying the scooter. At the time I was young, inexperienced, short on cash and lacking a business mentor.

I'm now old, somewhat experienced and still short on cash, but I believe in this concept so deeply, that I recently left my cozy job in corporate America to commit to this business full time. More on that below, but first, check out this awesome video:

 

As I was saying

I’m looking for operating capital to ensure that we are able to expand TwoFerry into other cities sooner than later. Also, by donating through Indiegogo, I will be able to see where there are concentrated areas of interest for this app which will help dictate our growth plan and prioritize where we will go after Salt Lake City.

For your investment, we will give you “free” rides (and/or swag) based on the amount donated. Once the app has launched, we will put credits into your TwoFerry account on the app so you can redeem your rides at your leisure.

If we don’t meet the full fundraising goal, all the money raised will still be put into the business as the app is already in development!

 

The Impact

  • Here’s a sobering stat: 10,000 people die in the US EVERY YEAR from alcohol -
    related accidents. We all think it can’t happen to us, but we think you’re pretty cool
    and would hate to see anything happen to you (or for you to have to live with
    causing harm to another.)
  • We will also save potential impaired drivers a ton of cash. The average cost of a DUI
    is over $10K dollars. We’d like to put most of that back in your pocket (and just a
    little bit in ours.) Win/Win!

 

Apart from solving the annoyance of the “morning after car retrieval,” the higher purpose is to reduce the amount of alcohol related accidents and DUI arrests that this scenario causes. I firmly believe that people would make better choices and not drive buzzed or drunk if they could just get their car home with them safely and easily.

Oh, and by the way – bars, restaurants, and people who want to find a good parking space also benefit from TwoFerry.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • The main risk is if one of the “big guys” launch a similar concept inside of their existing robust infrastructure.
  • Our customers could have hoopties that nobody wants to drive.
  • There is a lot of regulation popping up around the ride share concept in certain states that will make it harder to enter those markets.
  • Drunk people are annoying, and it may be hard to find drivers willing to put up with that sh...stuff.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are so many ways we can help each other. Obviously, our donation offers are pretty one-sided, you get so much more than you give. However, we know that not everyone has extra cash lying around to give to a crowdfunded rideshare app. Luckily, your honest feedback is just as valuable! Take a moment to fill out this super brief survey: https://forms.gle/4ngToELdocmJZuLx6

Lastly, it takes a village... I’d be forever grateful if you could share this fundraiser with your friends, family, and professional network and follow TwoFerry on social media. 

From the bottom of my heart, thank you for helping me make this dream a reality!

Sincerely,

Tiff

#nocarleftbehind #responsiblyirresponsible #driven #womanowned #twoferry

  • Facebook: facebook.com/twoferry
  • Twitter: @twoferry

What is TwoFerry?Let’s break it down, dictionary style:Two [too] NounA cardinal number, 1 plus 1In our case, it’s two people. A Captain and a Pilot. Both come to you. The Pilot drives you home in your car, and the Captain follows.Ferry [fer-ee]VerbTo carry or convey back and forth over a fixed route in a boat or planeBefore you get your hopes up, we only “carry and convey” in cars. Yours, to be specific. How awesome is that? How it works
You download the rider app and provide info about yourself and your car.
Once you order a ride, a TwoFerry team comes and picks you up. Essentially, it’s a cab with 2 drivers. We call them Captains and Pilots.
The Pilot will get out, confirm some information and then drive you home in your own vehicle, while the Captain follows behind.

story:
We’re Jaunt - a Melbourne based start-up on a mission to up-cycle iconic four-wheel-drives and turn them into electric vehicles for adventure.

We’re building a car rental network to allow you to explore beautiful locations around the county while reducing your impact on the environment.

Be one of the first to drive an electric vehicle built for Australia. For as little as $25 you can help us construct our first prototype, be part of our development trials, and directly shape the future fleet.

 

We'll be converting Juniper, and taking her up the east coast for “on and off” road testing. And with enough support, to the NT, South Australia, WA and on the ferry over to Tassie. The more we raise, the more cars we can build and the faster we’ll be able to get to your part of the country.

Australia should lead the world in zero emissions transport. Help us prove that we love our country as much as we love cars and adventure.

 

Meet Juniper, she’ll be the first Jaunt car - our prototype.  With your help we’ll transform her into an electric vehicle, built to explore Australia.

Juniper is a 1971 Land Rover Series 2a and was used for years by a fisherman in southern  Queensland. She was then given a fresh coat of paint and spent the last 8 years as a daily commuter and weekend explorer around Gladstone.

These old cars are wonderful… and terrible. They’re difficult to operate, they’re loud, the fumes get into the cabin and they chew through oil and fuel. Conversion to an electric drivetrain transforms them. It removes all the mechanical complexity (and unreliability), increases the capability but leaves all the charm.

We want to see Juniper creating new memories with you over the next 50 years.

 

 

Australia is a place of incredible natural beauty with ancient rainforests and vast deserts, rugged mountain ranges and endless beaches. But the only practical way to reach many of these places, whether they’re remote or close to home, is with a car.

SUVs and 4WDs, cars built for adventure, continue to dominate our cars sales, but they’re also one of the reasons our transport emissions are one of the worst in the world.

We’ve always felt a little guilty exploring the pristine bush in a petrol or diesel 4WD. Electric vehicles are almost silent and have no exhaust emissions, allowing you to hear, and smell, the surroundings. Not the explosions of fossil fuels.

We think this desire to get out of the city and explore, for four wheel drives even, can be a catalyst for transforming our relationship with vehicles into something with a positive environmental and social impact.

So we’re up-cycling iconic four-wheel-drives into electric vehicles that’ll get you out into the bush using renewable energy. To start, we’ll be using Land Rovers, one of the cars that fuelled our spirit of adventure in the first place.

Land Rovers like Juniper helped build our major infrastructure, they fought bushfires, they worked on almost every farm, they deployed around the globe with our armed forces and they brought aid to remote communities.  They’re so much fun to drive and they can drive anywhere. They built the most remote roads in the country and yet they still look good in the inner city.

There are thousands of Land Rovers sitting on farms and in back sheds. For us, they’re the perfect candidate for an Australian electric vehicle as they have:

  • Aluminium body, which means they’ve not rusted.
  • Simple body on frame construction making them easy to work on.
  • Built to carry heavy loads, meaning we can install a lot of batteries.
  • Extensive parts network as many components remained unchanged for 50 years.
  • Still affordable to purchase and available nationwide.
  • Iconic, nostalgic shape, that inspires adventure


Eventually we’ll look at other car makes and models, choosing vehicles bespoke for locations.

There are a number for collectors and suppliers of old Land Rovers around the country. Dragging them out of sheds and cutting away the blackberries that engulf them is a full time job. We visited with Land Rover Heaven near Goulburn, NSW who sources vehicles for people all over country.

We acknowledge the traditional custodians of the land on which we travel and pay our respects to elders past and present. We acknowledge the sorrow of the stolen generations, the impacts of colonisation and recognise the resilience, strength and pride of the Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander communities.

 

We’re swapping the internal combustion engine for an electric motor that bolts straight to the existing gearbox.  We’ll remove all of the old parts that run off belts and vacuum pressure and replace them with modern components that run off battery power.

Juniper will be our first prototype, but the technology underpinning her is tried and tested.  We’re not inventing a new motor or a new kind of battery, we’ll be using a combination of parts that’ve been put into hundreds of conversions around the world.

A NetGain Hyper9 AC Electric Motor will spin the original drivetrain.  It puts out 100kw of power and 235Nm of torque from almost 0 rpm. Which means it feels amazing to drive, you don’t need to change gear and it has regenerative braking.  Lift your foot of the accelerator and it brings you to a stop.

The most expensive part of any EV conversion is the battery pack.  We’ll be using five Tesla Model S battery packs to power Juniper. Eventually we’ll move to a battery configuration designed to fit the unique shape of the Land Rover chassis, but Tesla batteries allow us to get up and running quickly, taking advantage of some of the worlds best engineering.

We’ll be doing a significant amount of design and engineering over the course of developing Juniper and subsequent prototypes.  We aim to produce an EV conversion kit that works across 40 years of Land Rovers. From motor mounts to digital displays on the dash it needs to be easy to build and easy to use, right from your very first drive.

We’re not trying to replicate a 1960s agricultural driving experience, we’re trying to improve it. We’ll keep the styling and ‘feel’ of the original car, but make a number of changes that take away some of the hard work. Power steering, heating, auto-cancelling indicators were all things missing when they were new.  More than just adding comfort, installing them makes the vehicle safer and more approachable to drive.

 

 

Be part of our test drive program for as little as fifty dollars, rent Juniper for a day, a weekend, or a whole week. Prove that Australians want to drive electric vehicles and be one of the only people to take a Jaunt this year.

 

Be part of development trials and test drive Juniper with our designers and engineers. Your feedback will directly shape the future fleet.  

We’ll be conducting on and off road trials where you’ll be able experience the fun of a very unique electric vehicle first hand. Juniper will be fitted with rear seating so you can bring most of the family along.

 

 

Book a Jaunt for a day, a weekend, a week or longer.  Take Juniper to the beach, or the rainforests, the mountains, the desserts or just around town.  Enjoy complete freedom in one of the most unique cars on the road.

Everyone who books a Jaunt for a day or longer receives a limited edition keyring and key to ‘Juniper’ to commemorate their status as the first to Jaunt.

 

 

In a ‘Founders Edition’ Land Rover Series Electric Vehicle. Three only available for private sale during the development of our national car-share fleet. Be one of the very few to own a Jaunt vehicle. Delivered in 2020* with latest developments in drivetrain, battery management and digital experience. Choose the colour, choose short or long wheelbase, choose to adventure.

Let’s chat forever@jauntmotors.com

*Available for test adventures as soon as it’s built. Used for marketing and promotion pre-delivery.

Help us embrace our heritage, provide an exciting, curated way to experience regional Australia, treat our natural environment with respect and harness the talent and experience of our regional communities.

With your help, we think everyone can experience regional Australia’s beautiful environment sustainably.

 

 

If we raise $50,000 we‘ll convert Juniper, and take her up the east coast for “on and off” road testing.  And with enough support, to the NT, South Australia, WA and on the ferry over to Tassie. The more we raise, the more cars we can build and the faster we’ll be able to get to your part of the country.

Australia has one of the lowest adoption rates of EVs in the world, and one of the highest transport emissions per capita. Cars built for adventure and exploration still dominate our new car sales. 10 out of the top 15 selling cars are utes or SUVs.

We believe the desire to get out of the city, to explore, for four-wheel drives even,  can be a catalyst for transforming our relationship with vehicles into something that has a positive environmental and social impact.  Our mission is to encourage adventure and drive Australia toward zero emission transport.

 

 

We just want to be one small piece of Australia’s future transport puzzle, but a piece that sparks the imagination. Australia should lead the world in zero emissions transport. Not be one of the worst. Help us prove that we care about our country as much as we love cars and adventure.

 

 

Dave Budge - Co-founder & CEO

Dave has combined emerging technology with beautiful design and meaningful storytelling for two decades, most recently as National Executive Director across Design, Creative and Innovation at one of Australia’s largest digital experience and technology agencies.

Dave grew up in Bendigo, Victoria and tries to spend as much time as possible exploring remote parts of Australia, either hiking or in his Land Rover Defender.

Marteen Burger - Co-founder & COO

Marteen has worked in advertising and production for twenty years. Recently she’s worked in executive leadership roles and operations and financial management. Skilled at enabling large and diverse teams to deliver their best work through practical and friendly project management and supplier relations.  

Marteen grew up in Mt Isa, Queensland and learnt to drive on outback dirt roads in a Mitsubishi Pajero 4WD when she was 10 years old.

Team Jaunt

Partners

 

 

 

​

Juniper is just one car - our first prototype - but ultimately, working in partnership with regional communities, we want to up-cycle the thousands of four wheel drives sitting on farms and in back sheds. Having the mechanical and electrical engineering work completed locally, installing charge points and creating bespoke travel routes that unlock the most wonderful places.

We’re not trying to cross the Simpson Dessert or get to Cape York (just yet), there is so much adventure to be had within a few kilometres of every town and city for tourists and locals alike.

 

From Bruny Island at the tip of Tasmania, to Fitzroy Crossing in the Pilbara, charge points cover all but the most remote wilderness.  Regional Australia is ready for sustainable adventure, but for us to embrace electric vehicles, we need electric vehicles that are built for the Australian imagination.

Electric vehicles account for under one percent of new car sales in Australia, which is one of the lowest in the world. The range of EVs available is small (and often expensive), we need vehicles that are easy to access, affordable and desirable.  

So if we can’t buy the EVs we want, then lets build them. Hundreds of Australians have already converted cars of all shapes and sizes.

Nick in Byron Bay, NSW bought a restored VW Beetle and then converted it with an EV West Kit.

Don in Yarrawonga, Victoria converted a military spec 1973 Land Rover “Lightweight” which is very similar underneath to Juniper. Check out his build blog.

James in Brisbane, Queensland created a dual motor R31 Nissan Skyline.

Mathew in Armidale, NSW converted his Hilux 14 years ago.

 

Australia should lead the world in zero emissions transport. Help us prove that we care about our country as much as we love cars and adventure.

We need your help to make this happen. Share this campaign on social media, get your local council excited, get friends to book, and suggest locations where we should be based. Reach out to say hello and if you have any questions or feedback: hello@jauntmotors.com

Get connected:
Follow us on Facebook & Instagram

Sign up to our email list here

“On Road Test Drive” & “Off Road Test Drive”

We aim to host test drives out of Australian capital cities, and regional centres. While we will endeavour to tour as many locations as possible for Test Drives, we cannot commit to going to all city and town locations. Therefore participants may have to travel to the Test Drive location.

Dates for Test Drives may fall between June 2019 and June 2020. Proposed test drive dates depend on the car’s completion date, and the dates that we will be travelling to the area. We will host a series of test drives each day.

Full terms and conditions available on our website.

 

“Group Jaunt Experience”

Group experiences are available within 100km of Australian capital cities, and regional centres. Contact us for additional location options, either on public roads or private property.

While we will endeavour to tour as many locations as possible to fulfil Bookings, we cannot commit to going to all city and town locations.

Dates for Group Bookings will fall between June 2019 and June 2021. Final dates depend on the car’s completion date, and the dates that we will be travelling to the area.

Full terms and conditions available on our website.

 

“Take a Jaunt” Rentals

We aim to host test drives out of Australian capital cities, and regional centres.  The number of days we remain in one location depends on the number of recipients in that area. While we will endeavour to tour as many locations as possible to fulfil Rentals, we cannot commit to going to all city and town locations. Therefore participants may have to travel to the “Jaunt Rental” location.

Dates for Daily Rentals will fall between June 2019 and June 2021. Final dates depend on the car’s completion date, and the dates that we will be travelling to the area. Pick up / Drop Off locations are announced in your region (four weeks prior to our arrival date), we will open an online booking form and ask you to book a time that suits you.

Full terms and conditions available on our website.


“Jaunt Forever”
How exciting! Get in contact - there is so much to discuss.

Reach out to say hello and if you have any questions or feedback: hello@jauntmotors.comGet connected:Follow us on Facebook & InstagramSign up to our email list here“On Road Test Drive” & “Off Road Test Drive”We aim to host test drives out of Australian capital cities, and regional centres. While we will endeavour to tour as many locations as possible for Test Drives, we cannot commit to going to all city and town locations. Therefore participants may have to travel to the Test Drive location.Dates for Test Drives may fall between June 2019 and June 2020. Proposed test drive dates depend on the car’s completion date, and the dates that we will be travelling to the area. We will host a series of test drives each day.Full terms and conditions available on our website. “Group Jaunt Experience”Group experiences are available within 100km of Australian capital cities, and regional centres. Contact us for additional location options, either on public roads or private property.While we will endeavour to tour as many locations as possible to fulfil Bookings, we cannot commit to going to all city and town locations.Dates for Group Bookings will fall between June 2019 and June 2021. Final dates depend on the car’s completion date, and the dates that we will be travelling to the area.Full terms and conditions available on our website. “Take a Jaunt” RentalsWe aim to host test drives out of Australian capital cities, and regional centres.  The number of days we remain in one location depends on the number of recipients in that area. While we will endeavour to tour as many locations as possible to fulfil Rentals, we cannot commit to going to all city and town locations. Therefore participants may have to travel to the “Jaunt Rental” location.Dates for Daily Rentals will fall between June 2019 and June 2021. Final dates depend on the car’s completion date, and the dates that we will be travelling to the area. Pick up / Drop Off locations are announced in your region (four weeks prior to our arrival date), we will open an online booking form and ask you to book a time that suits you.Full terms and conditions available on our website.“Jaunt Forever”How exciting! Get in contact - there is so much to discuss.

story:
Meet Loomo

YOUR MOBILE ROBOT SIDEKICK & MINI PERSONAL TRANSPORTER

 

 

 

Recently Featured In

"Loomo is one of the best robots we saw at CES 2018." - Digital Trends

"Segway made a robot that connects to your two-wheeled scooter." - TechCrunch

"The next generation of this personal mobility device is smarter, smaller and, yes, cuter than ever before." - Mashable

"... a show-stopping presentation." - Forbes

 

 

 

What Loomo Can Do

Self-Balancing Transporter

Smooth, self-balancing ride experience across most terrains. Easily travel 22 miles in one single charge.

 

Auto Follow Expert

With advanced computer vision, Loomo can follow you autonomously, shoot stabilized video, and more.

 

Friendly & Expressive Robot

Lovable personality and expressions will cheer you up and impress everyone around you.

 

Avatar

Speak, explore, interact, and experience as if you are Loomo via the Loomo app.*

 

*Disclaimer: Same wireless network connection is required.

 

New Skills Unlock Over-the-Air (OTA)

Loomo will continuously update its software and app to include new features to impress and surprise you.

For example, a simple drag-and-drop interface will be released later this summer - allowing users without programming experience to teach Loomo new tricks.

Loomo's programmable features mean the possibilities are endless! 

Loomo can learn to make new facial expressions, follow specific routes while capturing video, and even check your front door when someone swings by for a visit.

 

Free Loomo Android SDK

Directly access Loomo’s core capabilities to build on top of its mobility + AI platform.

  • Integrated management of Loomo’s hardware, software, and algorithms.
  • Control the base assembly and robot head at a proper abstraction level.
  • Attach additional hardware and physical capabilities to the robot via extension bay on the back.
  • Build a range of playful features or practical solutions.

 

 

BMW's self-driving car team partnered with Loomo to develop an autonomous parking solution.

 

 

Loomo’s capabilities were utilized at the MIT Hackathon to build innovative healthcare solutions.

To learn more about Loomo's SDK and development tools, check out the Segway Robotics developer site.

To view full videos of above, check out the Loomo YouTube Channel.  

 

Mobile Robot Sidekick Goes Where You Go

For tech enthusiasts, early adopters, creators, and Segway fans – this is your go-to robot. We’ve created the only robot that you can ride, interact with, and program. Dream up a feature that hasn’t been built yet? Well develop it using our Android SDK or work with our team to make it a reality！

 

Pre-Order Before Limited Offers Run Out



Be A Loomo VIP Insider

By joining the Loomo VIP Insider Access pool, you can enjoy these VIP privileges:

  • Be the first to receive news on latest product developments, as well as special offers after the crowdfund campaign ends.
  • A chance to win free seats at future events hosted by Segway Robotics.
  • Most importantly, you are helping Loomo shape the future of robotics. Your smallest contribution makes a difference and means so much to all of us on the Loomo team.

We appreciate every contribution that helps us make Loomo a reality!

Loomo Early Tester Reviews

 

 

Designed for Endless Possibilities

Loomo leverages powerful Intel RealSense technology, and is developed by Segway-Ninebot, the global leader in self-balancing vehicle (SBV) transportation.

Loomo Overview

 

Best-in-Class Mobility Based on Segway Mini Plus

Loomo incorporates Segway Mini Plus’s latest magnesium alloy base, which comprises of hundreds of self-balancing patents. Powerful motors & large volume battery enable speeds of up to 11 MPH, up to a distance of 22 miles. 11-inch anti-slip tires allow for smooth riding on uneven roads.

 

Multi-Sensor Perception Featuring Intel RealSense 

Loomo is equipped with:

  • Intel RealSense ZR300 camera for depth sensing & motion tracking, which enables 3D perception, robot mapping and obstacle avoidance
  • 1080p HD-camera with 30Hz streaming & 104 degrees FOV for visual perception and photo/video capture
  • 5-microphone array on its head to determine voice/noise direction and recognize voice commands
  • 2 infrared distance sensors and an ultrasonic sensor in the front for obstacle detection and fall warning
  • Several other touch sensors on its body that enable human-robot interaction and provide another method of control

 

Self-Stabilizing 3-Axis Gimbal

Loomo’s three-axis gimbal stabilizes its HD camera, enabling the robot to neutralize abrupt movements or vibrations. This stability allows Loomo to not only capture higher quality video but also better assess its surroundings and establish computer vision.

 

Visual Perception & Understanding

Driven by cutting-edge computer vision and deep learning technology, Loomo's visual system consists of an object Detection and Tracking System (DTS) and a Human Understanding System (HUS):

  • By incorporating detection and tracking techniques with high accuracy and efficiency, DTS enables Loomo to perceive its surroundings and track moving objects simultaneously (including people and pets),serving as the foundation for many other applications.
  • Powered by advanced recognition capabilities, HUS enables Loomo to identify users via facial recognition and analyze their gestures in order to better understand their behaviors, take gesture based commands, or engage in friendly interaction.

 

Robust Motion Control System

Robust motion control system with disturbance rejection and quick response techniques enables Loomo to ride smoothly on various surface types including: mud, grass, bumps, slopes, and other uneven surfaces.

 

Intelligent Planning & Obstacle Avoidance

By building high-resolution maps of its physical environment, generating predictive models that anticipate passerby behavior, and conducting ongoing analysis of its own mechanics, Loomo actively plans its movement and reacts instantly to its surroundings. As a result, Loomo can reliably move to a provided destination, smoothly track and follow its target, and avoid obstacles in its path.

 

Technical Specifications

 

 

See Loomo in action

Clicking the below links will take you off the site. To view all demo videos, check out the Loomo YouTube Channel. Selected YouTube video demos are linked out below:

 

Loomo App For iOS & Android

Loomo’s free iOS and Android app lets you easily explore Loomo’s full feature set and access exciting features such as avatar.This is in progress and will be released publically when Loomo begins shipping in May 2018.

 

LOOMO Setup is Simple & Effortless

 

What's In the Box

 

Loomo From The Beginning

Every step of the way, Loomo’s world class team has pursued excellence in robotics engineering and a deeply integrated software – hardware product development.


 

About Loomo＆Segway Robotics

What happens when you combine Segway mobility with cutting-edge AI? What if your mini transporter could also see, hear, experience, and engage at both work and play?
 
At Segway Robotics, we designed Loomo to be the world’s first truly mobile personal robot that can accompany you everywhere you go. We’re a diverse team of dreamers, scientists, and world class engineers in robotics and artificial intelligence. We also work with amazing strategic partners such as Intel and Xiaomi. Together, we’re excited to get Loomo into the hands of tech enthusiasts like you who are as passionate as we are about building the future of personal robotics!

 

We Are on Track to Deliver

 

Shipping

We are able to ship Loomo to the United States. Shipping is FREE.

We have a very capable supply chain team. However, component delays and unexpected shortages may occur. If this happens, we will be sure to keep you informed and try our best to quickly solve the problem.

 

 

For crowdfunding: Loomo orders will begin shipping in May 2018 by batches and will continue throughout the Summer.

For InDemand:  All orders will begin shipping in September 2018 after fulfillment of crowdfunding orders. 

Orders will be shipped sequentially. For shipment inquires please contact support@loomo.com

 

With our fully-formed production capabilities, we don't have any problems with getting products to you on-time. We're turning to crowdfunding to build up our core community of early adopters - developers, designers, and creators that'll help fully realize the vision of Loomo.

Join us - we’re excited to get Loomo into the hands of tech enthusiasts like you who are as passionate as we are about building the robot of the future!

 

 

#getLoomo

The more people who know about us, the more the Loomo community can grow! YOUR support and input will ultimately make Loomo a better product！





Press Kit

 

Frequently Asked Questions

ABOUT

What is Loomo?    
Loomo is your very first mobile robot sidekick and mini personal transporter that could bring you around and follow you both indoor and outdoor. 

Why are you launching an indiegogo campaign?    
After two years of research and development efforts, we are launching this product to the global market targeting early-adopters and innovators, who are enthusiastic about new technologies and would like to try new things out. With 15 million monthly active users, indiegogo is clearly the best platform, where we can find you, the innovators, to test out our personal robot, and grow with us together.

 

PRODUCT FEATURES

Can I put my bag on Loomo?    
Loomo was not specifically designed for this purpose, although it's such a popular feature that many people put their bags on Loomo during testing. Our recommendation is to put your bag on the footstep of Loomo and avoid blocking the sensors in the center of its body so that Loomo will not lose track of you when following.

How do we ride it?    
It's easy and safe to ride Loomo! Loomo will teach you how to ride it step by step using its voice. We also have a detailed explanation on how to ride Loomo on the Information Guide. 

How does the hardware extension bay work?
The extension bay contains a standard USB 2.0 host, and a 24 volt power supply with 1A limit. For additional information please refer to the developer SDK website at http://developer.segwayrobotics.com/

Is riding Loomo legal in my city and can I ride Loomo in the street?
Laws concerning motor vehicles vary from state to state, so be sure to check your local and state laws to see if there are any restrictions on riding self-balancing transporters in public areas.

Do I have to wear a helmet?
Safety should be paramount. We would recommend wearing a helmet, even if your state laws does not require it. Loomo is not responsible for injuries, please be safe while you ride.

 

TECH SPECS

What is the Operating System of Loomo?    
Loomo runs on the Android operating system. Developers need to use Android Studio as a development tool. For more information please refer to the developer page at http://developer.segwayrobotics.com/

What's the maximum speed of Loomo?    
8km/h (4.3 mph) in robot mode, 18km/h (11 mph).

What are the technical details behind Loomo's following feature?    
Loomo is equipped with a built-in, powerful Intel RealSense camera, which can detect an object in 3 dimensions. Developers can first use the Detection and Tracking system (DTS) in the Vision SDK to visually detect and track a person. They can then make Loomo follow the person using the MiniController in the Locomotion SDK. For more details please check our developers page at http://developer.segwayrobotics.com/
    
How long will it take for battery charging till full?    
On average it can be charged full within 3 hours.

How much weight can Loomo handle?
Loomo’s weight capacity can handle up to 220lbs. (100 kg).

 

ABOUT THE APP

How do I connect with Loomo?
You can connect with Loomo through two modes: Wi-Fi mode and Hotspot mode. For Wi-Fi mode, you can connect your mobile device to Loomo by joining the same Wi-Fi network, while for Hotspot mode you can connect your mobile device to Loomo by utilizing Loomo's hotspot.

Loomo can also connect with other devices using Bluetooth 4.1, for example you can connect your robot with bluetooth speakers etc.

For developers, you can connect Loomo with your computer using USB 3.0 Type-C on the head of Loomo and develop applications for it, just like developing apps for Android smartphones

 

SHIPPING

When does shipping begin?    
Loomo will begin shipping in May 2018, and will continue through the summer. Orders will be shipped sequentially.

Which countries will Loomo ship to?  
We are able to ship Loomo to the United States.

 

CUSTOMER SERVICE

What is your refund policy?    
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

What is your return / exchange policy?     
Return and exchange are processed on a case-by-case basis. If you find your Loomo defective and unable to operate as expected, please first review our limited warranty policy at support.loomo.com.  If you have further questions, please contact support@loomo.com, and our customer service team will get back to you to further assist you with complimentary technical support.

Please note: since repair and replacement requests will need to be shipped back to us in Loomo’s original packaging, it is recommended that you keep the shipping box.

If I have other questions, where should I contact?

  • Customer Support: support@loomo.com
  • Press Contact: media@loomo.com
  • Sales Contact: sales@loomo.com
  • Other Inquiries: info@loomo.com

story:
Our Core Values

We want our riders to feel connected to our products, so we design them to be stylish and inspiring. This guides our design philosophy and is why we integrate all the electronics, keeping them hidden from view and out of the way of rider.

We believe electric bicycles have a big part to play in America’s future recreation and transportation. All of our electric bicycles are designed and built for performance, convenience, and value which makes the AMP Errand Electric Bicycle a great choice - We want EVERYONE to have one!

On an electric bike that only has pedal assist, the motor only turns on if you're pedaling. We believe that our riders should always be able to control the power and speed of our electric bicycles, so all of our bikes come with throttle control.

In addition to the values espoused above, we are also a CVE-verified Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Small Business dedicated to providing every customer with unmatched service and quality. AMP Errand has partnered with 1% For The Planet, with our pledge to give 1% of annual revenues back to environmental charities.

AMP In The Real World

There are thousands of uses for the AMP Errand Electric Bicycle. How will you use yours? We've got a few suggestions:

Urban Commute - When folded, the Errand is the perfect size to stow away in a small closet or behind a couch. Just unfold it, hop on, and go! Using the throttle control, you can travel across town without breaking a sweat. No pedaling necessary! Fold the Errand back up when you get to work and carry it into the office. It's easily hidden next to your desk. You can even charge it during the day so you're ready to hit the road again at quitting time.

On The Trail - Headed out on the trail for some easy weekend riding with your family? The Errand is a great option for everyone. If you want to work up a sweat, simply use it like a traditional bike. But if you need to pull a few kiddos behind you, just give the throttle a twist and get the extra boost you need. And when you're all done, the Errand folds up nicely to fit in the back of your car.

Sightseeing/Touring - Exploring a new theme park, tourist attraction, or urban center on vacation? The Errand is the perfect solution for traversing new terrain. Since everyone already knows how to ride a bike, there's no learning curve! Plus, the comfort and familiarity of a bike, combined with the option to pedal or use throttle, makes the Errand a great alternative to other touring vehicles.

A Cut Above The Rest

Normally, an electric bike of this style with this size motor would retail for anywhere between $1,200 and $1,800. But because we are the manufacturer and because of our "low-cost operator" business model, we're able to bring this AMP Errand Electric Bicycle to you for the fantastic price of $499 (shipping included).

These prices include freight and are a one-time offer for this Indiegogo program. These are the wholesale prices, and they are an incredible value.

Because our Errand is a current production model for us, the assembly line is already set up and we can start production in less than 30 days. The shipping included in your price is by sea and domestic carrier, but if you prefer to receive your bike faster you can pay an extra $200 and we will air freight it to you straight from our factory.

Why Indiegogo? Why Now?

We want every home in America to have an AMP Errand Electric Bicycle! But, we are currently out of stock on our initial production run. Indiegogo allows us to offer the bike at wholesale price to jumpstart the next production run. 

Tech Specs

  • Battery - 36V 8Ah
  • Motor - 250W
  • Speed settings - 15-20mph
  • Throttle control - Speeds 1-5
  • LCD control panel - 2x1.25" screen
  • Distance - 15-20 miles per charge
  • Wheel size - 20”
  • Wheelbase - 42"

Our Core Values

We want our riders to feel connected to our products, so we design them to be stylish and inspiring. This guides our design philosophy and is why we integrate all the electronics, keeping them hidden from view and out of the way of rider.

We believe electric bicycles have a big part to play in America’s future recreation and transportation. All of our electric bicycles are designed and built for performance, convenience, and value which makes the AMP Errand Electric Bicycle a great choice - We want EVERYONE to have one!

On an electric bike that only has pedal assist, the motor only turns on if you're pedaling. We believe that our riders should always be able to control the power and speed of our electric bicycles, so all of our bikes come with throttle control.

In addition to the values espoused above, we are also a CVE-verified Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Small Business dedicated to providing every customer with unmatched service and quality. AMP Errand has partnered with 1% For The Planet, with our pledge to give 1% of annual revenues back to environmental charities.

AMP In The Real World

There are thousands of uses for the AMP Errand Electric Bicycle. How will you use yours? We've got a few suggestions:

Urban Commute - When folded, the Errand is the perfect size to stow away in a small closet or behind a couch. Just unfold it, hop on, and go! Using the throttle control, you can travel across town without breaking a sweat. No pedaling necessary! Fold the Errand back up when you get to work and carry it into the office. It's easily hidden next to your desk. You can even charge it during the day so you're ready to hit the road again at quitting time.

On The Trail - Headed out on the trail for some easy weekend riding with your family? The Errand is a great option for everyone. If you want to work up a sweat, simply use it like a traditional bike. But if you need to pull a few kiddos behind you, just give the throttle a twist and get the extra boost you need. And when you're all done, the Errand folds up nicely to fit in the back of your car.

Sightseeing/Touring - Exploring a new theme park, tourist attraction, or urban center on vacation? The Errand is the perfect solution for traversing new terrain. Since everyone already knows how to ride a bike, there's no learning curve! Plus, the comfort and familiarity of a bike, combined with the option to pedal or use throttle, makes the Errand a great alternative to other touring vehicles.

A Cut Above The Rest

Normally, an electric bike of this style with this size motor would retail for anywhere between $1,200 and $1,800. But because we are the manufacturer and because of our "low-cost operator" business model, we're able to bring this AMP Errand Electric Bicycle to you for the fantastic price of $499 (shipping included).
These prices include freight and are a one-time offer for this Indiegogo program. These are the wholesale prices, and they are an incredible value.
Because our Errand is a current production model for us, the assembly line is already set up and we can start production in less than 30 days. The shipping included in your price is by sea and domestic carrier, but if you prefer to receive your bike faster you can pay an extra $200 and we will air freight it to you straight from our factory.

Why Indiegogo? Why Now?
We want every home in America to have an AMP Errand Electric Bicycle! But, we are currently out of stock on our initial production run. Indiegogo allows us to offer the bike at wholesale price to jumpstart the next production run.
