story:
We have spent two years in research and development to bring you something revolutionary. Meet iSwile CUBE, one of the safest and most affordable electric mobility device on the market. Personalized electric mobility devices have been overpriced & inaccessible to too many people for too long. At $250, with exceptional power and performance, it is a price you can’t beat.

 

iSwile is a lightweight, portable, yet fully integrated, powerful electric wheel. It is engineered for fast, attaches in seconds on a wide array of vehicles and tools. Inexpensive and easy to use, iSwile mobilizes anything with a wheel.

 

True story: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ef8_hfei9dM

Our initial product motorizes skateboards.Ergonomic, simple attachment and detachment in seconds. It can convert a board from a skateboard to an electric skateboard within seconds. 

This allows you, the skateboarder, the luxury of electric mobility when you want it, unhindered performance skating when you don't. It can go up to 20 mph, 26 degree inclines become a breeze, and, using our unique interchangeable battery options, you can travel from 15 to 30 miles per charge. What's not to love? Save your energy for when it counts.

 

Cut down time on your commute and save money on public transit. Never meet up with your friends sweaty again. Show up to the skate park fully energized to perfect your verts.

So choose to cruise in style and enjoy the thrill of electric mobility when you want and the regular usage of your skateboard when you don't. We are not boosted board, we boost your board. 

 

Safety is central for us. That is why we have had our amazing engineers perfect our motors torque, batteries, and remote controls to maximize your experience with the most fluid yet powerful acceleration and braking system.

 
iSwile is a safer, more stable electric skateboard that allows you to share the board with a beloved and is even enjoyed by professional skater like Jason Ranft. Safe for the whole family to enjoy!
 

The next generation module will be designed to be connected or removed from: wheelchairs; baby carriages; carts; flatbeds; luggage you name it. The purpose is to introduce the usage of electric mobility into every person’s everyday life.

 

It is our mission to change the way you live your everyday life with the power of personalized electric mobility. We are working to develop what is the best for you in the way you want it. Join us and give us your feedback! Create with us and help build a better, brighter, more sustainable future.

 
We give you the freedom of choice and put the power in your hands, in how you want to be involved in the developed to cater to your needs. One cube, many solutions.


 

What happens with your support?

 

Currently we at iSwile have tested all the basic components of the project needed to bring this product to market. We have priced out our materials, identified our suppliers, and leased our production facility in New York City. iSwile has been trademarked and our product has been patented. At this time, we need $20,000 to produce an initial batch of product to establish a market foothold.

If demand proves to be significantly more, then additional time will be needed to fill preorders. We are in the position to scale, have manufacturing, and distribution ready to go.

Moreover, we have a number of additional goals we would like to achieve after we succeed in raising the initial $20,000:

$50,000 We will for free upgrade everyone's purchase to a custom motor with a 1000 Watt 36 V for a better ride, better performance, and a happier you.

$100,000 will enable us to upgrade our product from aluminum to carbon fiber, thus halving the weight of 8 lbs. 

$150,000 “Boost Battery Accessory”: Equip iSwile with an upgraded battery providing 30% more power. This will require additional tooling and stock. Also addition of “BlueToothy iSwile”: Control your iSwile with your smartphone using our Bluetooth app and receiver accessory

$250,000  “Tuning Swile”: USB and GUI interface allowing to adjust your breaking strength, torque, acceleration, top speed etc. “Sensitive iSwile: Incorporation of distance detection.

$500,000 Stable iSwile: Integrating of balance sensors and gyroscopic technologies to achieve greater stability; “Amped iSwile”: New tooling for badder, faster, safer iSwile wheel. This will enable us to make products with higher powered smaller wheels for lighter transport, while also bigger wheels for better all terrain experiences.

iSwile asks that you help yourself by buying the product and help it develop its future devices for the benefit of everyone.

The Impact

The ethos of the iSwile company is “positive thinker, positive doer”. We will change the way you live your everyday life. To save them time, money, and hassle. To introduce the joy of exploration, innovation, and creation in everyday life. Where there’s a wheel there’s a way.

Smiling is an universally accepted physical expression of joy, while SWILING means to express the internal sense of pride and joy where physical smile is not necessary. It is the knowledge that one is doing good for one's community and is bettering the lives of others. Come meet the team at this year's New York Maker Faire this September 23rd and 24th. We won Editor's First Choice last year and will be releasing a new line of educational children's toys, as well as offering free rides and experiences on iSwile CUBE.

Risks and Challenges

Since we have a working prototype the development risk is minimal.  The challenge is to obtain sufficient orders for us to proceed to a full manufacturing status.  Reaching this level provides us with funding to develop the myriad of other electric mobility products that we mentioned previously.

 

What happens if we don't reach our goal?

Simple. If we do not reach our entire funding goal, our first commitment will be to ensure that our backers get what they are promised. Our word is our bond, and we will fulfill all promises made. Even at cost to us. Your trust is paramount, and without it we are not a company.

Our central value is to only have the highest quality, highest performance and highest level of safety with our product. We are not selling you a product but providing you a solution at a price that everyone can enjoy. Driven by a vision, iSwile. We are asking for your involvement we want enjoy the future of personalized electric mobility devices safe with you.

 

How can you help if you cannot contribute?

Swile! This means doing good for others, and in doing good to others you do good for yourself. Share in positivity and this movement and idea to better others. Share us with your friends, like us on Facebook, give us your feedback on how we can make a better product for you.

Don’t forget you can use the handy-dandy Indiegogo sharing tools to help us spread the word about Swile!

 

 

Meet the team!

Michael Leviev is an entrepreneur with his MBA from International Academy of Business and Management,. His background is in organizational management and strategy. He has been the driving force behind the creation of the iSwile product & Swile lifestyle. He is dedicated to bringing positivity through activity. The perfect combination of CEO and visionary. 

Francesca Lubbock is a Columbia graduate with honors who is a organizational taskmaster and strategist. Versatile, adaptive, people oriented, and philanthropically oriented phenomenal COO.

Mandeep Singh Bhatia is a superstar robotics engineer and programmer. He is currently the team leader at mindcloud.ai. He has worked as the team leader at HiTech Robotic Systemz, and senior design engineer at GE Healthcare. 

Aleksy Mikhailovich earned the highest degree from the Moscow Aviation Institute, (National Research University). He worked for 13 years for Boeing in the engineering of the safety of airplanes. He has dedicated his life to mechanical engineering.

Jason Ranft is a self-made, highly sought after skateboarder and skatepark developer and builder. You can find his incredible work throughout the US - one of the few and elite of his kind.

Vladislav Ivangorodsky A brilliant marketing and creative director advisor, he received his BFA from Pratt Institute. He has worked with Jeep, Dodge, Coke, Arby's, and Under Armor, amongst other major multi-billion dollar companies, and when not working he can be found deep sea fishing. Check out his Instagram @iuseaspear for some insane videos.

Kirrill Motylenko He graduated from DIT as an engineer and specialization in 3D graphics. Our amazing and gifted graphic designer and video media editor that has visually brought ideas to life.

Jacob Bloy who is an electrical engineering student. Genius at his calling, he has been involved with the development of BLDC motors with several major company in the industry. He has redesigned the internals of our motors to max our torque output. He has also been involved in the development of firmware and hardware for our BLDC motor controller.

Arkadiy Leviev managing social connections with blogs and communication with college campus students.

story:
Our Mission

Transportation underpins every aspect of life – work, healthcare, groceries, education, relationships and more. At Liberty, we believe that where you live shouldn’t dictate your ability to go places, and keys should not be necessary to enjoy a high quality of life. We set out to transform lives by improving rural transportation, one area at a time.

We are the first rural-focused ride-sharing provider in the world, and we need your help to bring our technology and infrastructure to new areas where there is dire need for safe, reliable transportation. You can be a part of the story - you can transform lives just by helping us get seniors, young families, and individuals with disabilities where they need to go.

With your donation, we will be able to serve more people in more places. We need to expand our service areas and grow our team, focusing on elder care, assistance for people with physical and mental disabilities, veteran advocacy, and more. As a team, we can better serve the people in our coverage areas - especially those who need transportation the most.

Together, We Can Transform Lives

We designed our technology and business model with one goal in mind: Improve quality of life in rural and small urban areas by enhancing transportation. For example, our smartphone app and call center enable adult children to help their parents get to not only the doctor, but other important places and events without interrupting their busy schedules.

We're launching in seven states in 2017, with interest from partners all over the world. However, there's a large gap in the demand and what we have the current means to provide. We know that no two rural communities are the same. Your donations will allow us to expand and serve new communities. Additionally, you can provide critical miles of transportation for those in need.

Community Impact

Neighbors helping neighbors - it's as simple as that. Our drivers are servant-minded members of their communities who are specifically trained to go above and beyond to help people get where they need to go. Drivers come from all backgrounds and walks of life, united by a sense of purpose and a desire to make a difference.

The first-ever group of Liberty Drivers in Van Wert County, Ohio.

About Us - Mobility as a Service (MaaS)

Liberty is less about market share and more about helping people get where they need to go. By providing Mobility as a Service, we connect passengers with the best transportation option available, whether it's public transit, taxi, or Liberty driver. We rely on local partners and generous individuals like you to empower residents in rural and small urban communities with on-demand mobility.

Pay as You Go - Independently from Mode to Mode

You Can Help

We make data-driven business decisions, but the stories of individuals struggling to get to healthcare appointments, work, or the grocery store because of a lack of transportation is the fuel that keeps us going. These are realities for many in rural America, but together, we can change the narrative.

You can designate your donation to help a cause that is nearest to your heart. When you donate Liberty miles, you will directly provide critical transportation for one of four key identified areas of need - veterans, individuals with disabilities, seniors, or families in poverty. story_txt:
Our Mission
Transportation underpins every aspect of life – work, healthcare, groceries, education, relationships and more. At Liberty, we believe that where you live shouldn’t dictate your ability to go places, and keys should not be necessary to enjoy a high quality of life. We set out to transform lives by improving rural transportation, one area at a time.

We are the first rural-focused ride-sharing provider in the world, and we need your help to bring our technology and infrastructure to new areas where there is dire need for safe, reliable transportation. You can be a part of the story - you can transform lives just by helping us get seniors, young families, and individuals with disabilities where they need to go.

With your donation, we will be able to serve more people in more places. We need to expand our service areas and grow our team, focusing on elder care, assistance for people with physical and mental disabilities, veteran advocacy, and more. As a team, we can better serve the people in our coverage areas - especially those who need transportation the most.


Together, We Can Transform Lives
We designed our technology and business model with one goal in mind: Improve quality of life in rural and small urban areas by enhancing transportation. For example, our smartphone app and call center enable adult children to help their parents get to not only the doctor, but other important places and events without interrupting their busy schedules.

We're launching in seven states in 2017, with interest from partners all over the world. However, there's a large gap in the demand and what we have the current means to provide. We know that no two rural communities are the same. Your donations will allow us to expand and serve new communities. Additionally, you can provide critical miles of transportation for those in need.


Community Impact
Neighbors helping neighbors - it's as simple as that. Our drivers are servant-minded members of their communities who are specifically trained to go above and beyond to help people get where they need to go. Drivers come from all backgrounds and walks of life, united by a sense of purpose and a desire to make a difference.

The first-ever group of Liberty Drivers in Van Wert County, Ohio.
About Us - Mobility as a Service (MaaS)
Liberty is less about market share and more about helping people get where they need to go. By providing Mobility as a Service, we connect passengers with the best transportation option available, whether it's public transit, taxi, or Liberty driver. We rely on local partners and generous individuals like you to empower residents in rural and small urban communities with on-demand mobility.

Pay as You Go - Independently from Mode to Mode

You Can Help
We make data-driven business decisions, but the stories of individuals struggling to get to healthcare appointments, work, or the grocery store because of a lack of transportation is the fuel that keeps us going. These are realities for many in rural America, but together, we can change the narrative.
You can designate your donation to help a cause that is nearest to your heart. When you donate Liberty miles, you will directly provide critical transportation for one of four key identified areas of need - veterans, individuals with disabilities, seniors, or families in poverty. We'll send you an update when the trips are provided!

story:
I fjor vinter frøs mange syriske flyktninger i hjel, blant annet i flyktningeleirer i Libanon.

Alamal i Bergen har gjort en flott jobb med å samle inn varme klær til voksne og barn. Givergleden har vært overveldende. Organisasjonen hadde som mål å sende én container, men har nå fått inn så store mengder klær og sko at de kan fylle minst fire til.

Målet for dette prosjektet er å hjelpe med finansiering av transport slik at alt innsamlet materiale kan nå fram til de trengende før kulden kommer.

Les mer på aksjonens facebookside: https://www.facebook.com/groups/471502739691476/

eller se nyhetssaker fra

bt: http://www.bt.no/nyheter/lokalt/Drukner-i-klar-til-syriske-flyktninger-3437474.html

Bilde: Österreichisches Außenministerium

story:
Short Summary

The Delivery Foundation is our dream to give back to the community we live in.

Last year, we launched Lazy Delivery, a grocery delivery service in Gainesville, Florida. In a few months we had exponential growth, and after seeing our success in Gainesville, we realized we were on to something special.  

Some of our most regular and valued customers are persons with disabilities. To give back, we decided to launch the Delivery Foundation, a nonprofit organization that  provides grocery delivery service to persons with disabilities, free of charge, using the existing Lazy Delivery infrastructure.


What We Need & What You Get

Our team is hoping to raise $5,000 in initial startup costs and to begin providing free grocery deliveries to persons with disabilities.

  • A portion of the money raised will go towards marketing costs, such as printing and distributing flyers and other sources of information about the availability of our new charity.
  • A portion of the money raised will go directly towards paying the costs of grocery delivery for persons with disabilities.
  • We are incentivizing donations through our perks system.
  • Your donations are tax-deductible, as we are a nonprofit in 501(c)(3) approval process status.

The Impact

The Delivery Foundation is a new and exciting type of charity. Using Lazy Delivery's existing infrastructure, we can help thousands of residents in our community. 

In Gainesville alone, there are over one thousand residents with disabilities. As Lazy Delivery expands to Jacksonville, Orlando, Tallahassee, and more, we want to expand the Delivery Foundation with it, with the ultimate goal of providing our unique service to as many people we can reach.


Challenges Ahead

As we grow this new Foundation, we will need cash to market the work being done by our charity and to spread the word of its availability on the ground. The startup funds raised by this campaign will help us disseminate the information to those that need us the most.

  • Our youthful and organized Board of Directors hopes to earn your trust and your donations to make our plans a reality.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to help the Delivery Foundation in other ways, please visit http://www.deliveryfoundation.org/join.html

  • We are looking for volunteers to help spread the word on the ground.
  • You can help us spread the word online on Facebook and Twitter.
  • Share this Indiegogo campaign with everyone you know.


From the bottom of our hearts, thank you. Together, we will change the world.

- The Delivery Foundation Team

story:
Hitch a Ride With Us!

Hitch was born out of necessity for our team. We've been developing software projects for 20 years combined and we're filled with so much ambition that we can't stop wondering how much fun a ridesharing project would be. So, for the last 2 months, we've been working on a basic prototype for a next generation mobile application that will drive new users to our platform. We've provided some screenshots for you to see that we're well into the development process already.

Come Hitch A Ride With Us.

 Our App will be available on both the Google Play and Apple App Stores . So, we'll be supporting all of the latest smartphones on the market. We want each of our customers to feel confident that their data is protected and we've created a secure Customer Profile Page, to gather personal information. 

Here's our Customer Profile Screen.

Credit Card Entry Screen.

We're also interfacing with "Stripe" technology for our payment processing requirements. At the end of a "Hitched" Ride, we use the Stripe 3rd Party Vendor to reduce the cost of fulfilling credit card payments. The guys at Stripe are doing some amazing things with mobile credit card processing and they're a startup like we are. So we're supporting them as they allow us to keep our operating costs as low as possible. Just take a look at some of the companies that have already chosen them to handle customer payment data. 


We think the ridesharing concept is the kind of thing that gives people something new to talk about and we want to be a part of that everyday conversation. By offering the cheapest rides without sacrificing quality or efficiency, we know we can compete and be successful. And we hope you'll see the value, in our mission, the way we do.

We need the help of the, "Crowd" , to finish developing the application and to make the ridesharing community aware of Hitch as a new market offering. We're proud of what we've developed ,so far, and we think we can ignite the flame that brings us to our funding goal this month. Please spread the word in your social networks so that we can reach our goal. Any pledge is helpful but word of mouth can be just as powerful! 

If you're a driver, you should be allowed to achieve your financial goals without changes in your driving percentages. And if you're a rider, we want every ride you take to cost you as little as possible. We're not looking to overcharge riders because of the time of day. And we don't want our drivers spending all of their income on the cost of their cars. Our App solves both of those problems seamlessly.

Where we are in the Process and Where will the money go? 

We've researched what makes or breaks projects on Indiegogo. And the first thing we've made sure of, is that we can deliver the App. It's a software project at its core. For our team, creating the application and walking through the design and development meetings is what we're all about. We work nights and weekends. And we do this stuff because we love the process. 

We've worked on many projects over many years. The difference this time around is that it's a project for, Us". We're not selling our code to a huge company for an hourly or salaried rate. This time, we're creating a competitor in the shared transportation market. And the hunger for competition is what drives us. We know that we need a company and a brand to release this project to the world and we've started that ball rolling already. But before we run with that process, we want the product to be well in to the development cycle. 

We're looking to the Indiegogo CrowdFund to help us with the first release of our application. We need to allocate funds for our developers so that they can dedicate all of their time to finishing the Android and Apple IOS versions of the application simultaneously. By completing the programming, testing, and market research; we'll have the technical details ready for market. So, that's why we're here. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us. 

We THANK YOU for Your Pledge!

story:
Be Smart, use Intelligent Spark Plug! 

         Invest today for a better tomorrow! 


LATEST NEWS!


 - "When installing the Intelligent Spark plug our production AWD 450 DS motorcycle started and performed better than with a standard spark plug. Idle was noticeably more stable, smoother and acceleration improved" says Steve Christini, Owner of Christini All Wheel Drive Motorcycles, USA

CHRISTINI AWD 450DS is a Street Legal Dual Sport AWD (All Wheel Drive) Bike equipped with a 450cc Liquid-cooled single cylinder four stroke engine.


 - Intelligent Spark Plug will be officially introduced at SEMA Show, Racing & Performance Section.  November 1-4  2016, Las Vegas Convention Center, Las Vegas, Nevada



INTELLIGENT SPARK PLUG


WHEN INSTALLED ON OLDER CARS, ENGINES RUN LIKE NEW!
NEW CAR ENGINES RUN LIKE ELECTRIC ONES!

It is easy to install and makes the engine more efficient.
Spark plugs are used in ALL gasoline engines

The Intelligent Spark Plug works by delivering the sparks via a circle shaped area positioned appropriately from the cylinder walls, from the top to the bottom of the piston chamber and adorned 360 degrees around the center electrode; red volume on the diagram.



BENEFITS


INCREASED POWER & TORQUE FOR YOUR VEHICLE
UP TO 20% FUEL SAVINGS or $500/year*
LIFETIME WARRANTY
POLLUTION REDUCED UP TO  800%
SAVE OUR ENVIRONMENT
SAVE OUR HEALTH
SAVE OUR PLANET
SAVE OUR FUTURE
SAVE OUR CHILDREN
INVEST $$ AND SAVE $,$$$



VEHICLES TOXIC EMISSIONS Definitions:

HC (unburned Hydrocarbons) : the major contributor to smog and asthma, 

liver disease, lung disease, and cancer

CO (Carbon Monoxide): reduces the blood's ability to carry oxygen, overexposure is fatal.

NO (Nitrogen Oxides): precursor to smog and acid rain, destroys resistance to respiratory infection


EMISSIONS MEASUREMENTS ON A 14 YEARS OLD CAR

Conventional spark plug

Intelligent Spark Plug



EMISSIONS MEASUREMENTS ON A NEW CAR

World's first gasoline car with ZERO toxic emissions is using Intelligent Spark Plug!



SAVE up to 50% with this campaign pricing; retail price will be higher due to the distribution and retail markups


  • Have a moped scooter, a motorcycle, a boat, a snowmobile, an ATV, a generator, a power tool or a leaf blower? Intelligent Spark Plug will instantly improve efficiency and reduce noise. 



Intelligent Spark Plug 
A significant contribution to saving our planet and our health




The following video was prepared by a team of undergraduate students at Central Michigan University; Big Thank You Elizabeth!
Please have a look!



Intelligent Spark Plug is here, already tested for more than 100,000 miles  and with your support will be available to everyone. Together we can fix the past and improve our future! 

We are looking to raise $100,000. This amount will help us move from functional prototypes to mass production.  

If we reach $500,000, we will offer free shipping worldwide.
Outside of the United States, one might have to pay some import taxes based on local regulations.
If we don't reach the entire goal, we will fulfill the orders, but there might be some production delays.

You can help us by spreading the word!
Please check our website: www.usalpc.com
Use Indiegogo share tools and social media to let your family and friends know about this revolutionary, game-changing product!

* per year, for a family with two vehicles.


QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS

Question:

Any side effects that can affect my engine?

Answer:
Yes there are side effects; good side effects, the engine life is extended.
With 800% better ignition the combustion is faster and complete.
A faster combustion generate more power and less heat; the engine will run cooler with less wear.
A complete combustion produce more power and less unburned fuel; no emissions plus no carbon build-ups inside the engine.

Please see the dash board for the two 2016 Toyota RAV4 we did use for the fuel efficacy test and please note that for the same distance driven with the same average speed in the same period of time, the one with Intelligent Spark Plugs have a better fuel consumption.

Now please have a look at the zoom-in picture below and please note that due to a better power and torque resulted from the fast and complete combustion, the idling RPM and engine temperature are a notch lower.

New engines  are controlled by ECM or Engine Computer Module. The computer software can be upgrated and then the engine can take fully advantage of the Intelligent Spark Plug, with even more fuel savings and power increase. 

Question:
How about warranty and returns?

Answer:
We offer Lifetime Warranty.
If not satisfied with our product we offer full refund.

Question:
Wow!! it looks awesome!! 
I would like to see the same test with the entire machine filmed. thanks a lot.﻿

Answer:
Please see a new raw footage video with the 25CC small engine: 
This new video presents the whole set-up and the replacing of the conventional spark plug with the Intelligent Spark Plug  not edited. 
With conventional Spark Plug the idling speed averaged 3,200 RPMs at that particular outside temperature. As soon as the conventional spark plug was replaced with the Intelligent Spark Plug, the idling speed went down to an average of 2,600 RPMS...some 20% better efficiency...just by replacing the spark plug.



Comment:
The first test with the lighter has a huge difference in the size of the flame. Which would mean that the flow valve on the lighter is set differently for the two plugs...

Answer:
Please see the picture below that compares the sparking capabilities for conventional spark plugs and for the Intelligent Spark Plug. 

Intelligent Spark Plug strikes 360 degrees around the center electrode in a volume that is 20-100 times bigger than a conventional spark plug.

Now please see the new raw video with the ignition test and with a lighter that has a constant flow, so there is no way to adjust the propane flow. The propane flow was not enough to ignite the iridium spark plug, but again the propane flow is not adjustable on this model.

story:
Tri-Max Vehicles

Today, with the concern for the environment and the increased range in between charges, electric vehicles are now of interest to the buying public. Using a tried and true electric motor and battery system in a three wheeler makes for an very efficient and environmentally friendly mode of transportation. The prototype is fun to ride in and it catches the eye of people everywhere it goes. The production model is slated to have a MSRP around $15,000 to $20,000 depending on the battery pack size.  

Backers of our Project

story:
Short Summary

Hello to all, we are Andrea and Sebastian and we have really different backgrounds, Andrea is a child therapist and I am a steelworker. Even though, we make a good team so we got married. I had built one kart by then, not so strong or reliable but more than enough to imagine some new systems but mentally broken. So with Andrea's help and energy we decided to push the project forward and make it happen no matter what.

After two years and 5 fully working prototypes, here we are working on GoatKart, entrepreneurship dedicated to solving issues related to off-road mobility.
With one idea in mind, to bring accessibility to off-road areas from the fields to outdoor tours, from crowded areas to places without pathways.  

With a big load capacity and strong electric engine, this noiseless machines can carry up to 450 kilos of whatever you need to move whit their 2 trolleys, in a cool and safe way. And the most important, its lightweight will let you move around without damaging the environment. A green solution for offroad mobility. These karts can reach a maximum speed of 20km/h and 40km per charge.

Where can be used? for farming, for offroad tourism, for festivals, for competition, almost for anything you need to do in offroad, or just for fun, you name it.

From 2017 until now we have built all prototypes completely handmade and we want to build them in series. So we got to a point where we need your help to set a better workshop and industrialize our product. We already have a 100 square meter workshop, yeah.  But we need better tools to make it faster and better.

It has been a really long journey and we want you to be a part of it!

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to start with a fleet of 15 GoatKarts and 30 trolleys to rent them out or sell them and offer logistics service to outdoor events such as festivals, fairs or offroad tours and keep on building new prototypes and pushing our designs forward.

For that, we need a few things.

- just a couple of tools that will make working easier like a bandsaw for steel and a new vice, mine is broken and lacks precision. All the other tools I mostly have or I can build by myself.

-as we want to build 15 karts and 30 trolleys there will be some pieces that we will need to externalize and that will have some extra cost but the results will be much better.

-off course some marketing and multimedia to be able to show you how things are going.

-and never the less, materials for the build.. pieces... accessories.... steel... etc. things you need if you want to build a GoatKart.

It would be amazing for not to say a dream come true to be able to make it happen in this way. if this is not the case, we already said it. We will make it happen no matter what, so it will.

The Impact

For a long time now, heavy vehicles have been used in areas where the floor is too weak to hold their weight, damaging not only the view but also the floor, taking grass away and making big holes followed by mud and erosion. Therefore we bring a vehicle that even though can go through the most difficult terrain, it does not damage the floor in such a way. It's thin and robust wheels won't dig any further being able to drive over small trees without breaking them.

We have been in a couple of festivals where machinery was a big issue when the festival's doors are open, making it extremely dangerous to drive and slower than usual. With our karts we helped moving equipment, building materials, water, loads of dirt, etc. we even took paramedics and passengers with luggage on time and safe anywhere around the field, sorting out in this way all these logistics problems while keeping the environment clean and far from destruction.

Risks & Challenges

For all of this plan, we will need to rearrange the workshop and get used to other ways of building, besides the way of planing and all the responsibilities that it all takes and we know it. It will be difficult but loads of learning and thinking on the way and we are looking forward to them. We started two years ago with one small kart built in a room in our flat, now we have a bigger workshop, bigger ideas, and better designs.

We are passionate and hard-working people. As you already seen, we have been working alone for two years.. you can trust that sometimes things get difficult but at the end of the day, we always find a way to get those things solved and push them forward. We want to make it happen and we will.

If you can't contribute please help to share! we will more than grateful! and do not forget to use indiego tools!

story:
My name is Diego and I am an Automotive Engineering student. My father and I are working on an invention that can help stop the never-ending problem of impaired and mindless driving. We call it the Voice Prompt Driver Safety and Responsibility Reminder System (VPDSRRS). This is a reminder system in your car that can maintain your good driving habits through giving voice prompts in all aspects of driving.

You can learn more about the system by watching our explainer video above. However, before anything else, we ask for your help in proving that this idea is actually effective.
 
Our invention stems from the endless dilemma of impaired and mindless driving. If you didn’t know, the Government of Canada passed a bill in June 2018 legalizing the recreational use of marijuana. Effectively, the number of impaired driving-related road accidents is rising. In other words -- on top of alcohol-related accidents -- more crashes are caused by drivers under the influence of marijuana.
 
Experts, professors, friends, family, and university staff gave us positive responses about our invention. Many of the parents said they want this for their 16 year-old child to have in their car when they first start to drive. I believe that this could be great for all ages because let’s be honest, we all develop some bad driving habits over time.

Let’s think about of the current state of cars for a second -- Whenever you’re driving and you hear a random chime in your vehicle, do you nervously look at your dashboard trying to figure it out? This could potentially be dangerous because you take your focus away from driving. Wouldn’t it be better if the car itself tells you what’s going on?

Now let's take a look at the future -- Companies now are racing to make the perfect autonomous vehicle. Some cars now can even drive themselves but let's face it, autonomous vehicles will not be the norm for another 20-30 years (and that’s what the experts say!). Even then, a lot of people love driving and will still love driving. 


We see our invention as a preventive measure that will make a difference and we want to make a prototype. However, before we proceed with that journey, we first want to see how effective this invention actually is.

Therefore, we plan to conduct an experiment that will generate empirical data and can possibly conclude if this system works. We ask you -- the community -- to help us raise $1200 to compensate our testers for the experiment. And for your help we promise to update you on the results and our next steps for this invention. Whether it's $5 or $50, any amount helps.
 
I am a car guy and I love driving. I also firmly believe that it is a massive responsibility but many people forget this. Unfortunately, through the carelessness of a driver, lives can be lost. This is not new. Change is long overdue and as we await the adoption of autonomous vehicles -- basically, robots driving for us -- let us perfect our technique as humans and respect each others’ lives through becoming responsible and skilled drivers.


Thank you for your time and your help,

 

Diego Mendoza

story:
Text To Ticket - Mobile App

 

 

Hey backers! Thanks for visiting our Text To Ticket (TTT) mobile app campaign. We're a team based in San Francisco, California with backgrounds in Serial Entrepreneurship, Public Health, Law, and Government IT Consulting. Our vision for TTT began with a deep concern and a dash of frustration with the amount of distracted driving (aka texting and driving) we saw in SF. The amount of near accidents, real accidents and serious injuries we saw as a result of distracted drivers was more than we could bear. As a group that focuses on Public Safety, we had to do something about it.

The numbers around distracted driving are startling: 

  • The National Safety Council reports that cell phone use while driving leads to 1.6 million crashes each year
  • Distracted driving causes 1 out of every 4 accidents
  • Someone texting & driving is 6x more likely to get into an accident than someone under the influence of alcohol

Text to Ticket is the first mobile app of it's kind. Our mission is to reduce the amount of distracted driving by empowering people to report violators, and in exchange, get paid. Our premise is simple, and our vision is broad: we want to change the perception of texting and driving, because the reality is ... it's the most dangerous activity on the road today.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We're currently raising $100,000 for app improvements, operations, marketing and public awareness

Perks:

  1. Sincere Thank-you + Social Media Shout-Out ($2)
  2. Higher commission for video submissions paid out ($20)
  3. Bumper Sticker ($5)
  4. Silicone Bracelet ($10)
  5. Branded Tote Bag ($25)
  6. Dashboard Phone Mount ($30)
  7. T-Shirt ($50)
  8. Jacket ($100)
  9. $1,000 credit off mobile app development ($2,000)
  10. $2,500 credit off mobile app development ($3,250)
  11. $5,000 credit off mobile app development ($5,500)
  12. Week driving experience with the Wrapped Audi R8** ($10,000)

**CA only

The Impact

Our app will be the first crowdsourced way of preventing distracted driving. If we take a look at the government sponsored "Click it or Ticket" campaign for seat belts, the opportunity is huge. That campaign raised seatbelt adherence in one state from a compliance rate of around 59% to 82%! Imagine if we could reduce the amount of texting and driving by similar numbers - that is literally thousands of lives saved.

Additionally, we want to affect the perception of what it means to text and drive. A drunk driver is appropriately characterized as a villain, a danger to public safety and completely irresponsible. And yet, despite the numbers, distracted driving is seen as fairly innocuous! That's not right, and we're hoping to do something about it! With awareness and enforcement, we hope people will learn that distracted driving is dangerous, and is killing people.

In the end, our goals of more enforcement and negative perception will create behavior change --> so fewer distracted drivers, and safer roads. Let's keep in mind...

  • Cell phone use is only increasing
  • There's yet to be a smart and scalable way of cracking down on distracted drivers
  • Generationally, kids are growing up with more devices - it seems normal to them! 
  • We must nip this issue in the bud!

Risks & Challenges

Our main challenges are going to be partnering with the proper cities and municipalities as this is a new and disruptive method of enforcement. However, our backgrounds in government, law, and entrepreneurship give us the requisite experience and know-how to get the government to adopt our platform.

We want to be able to leverage our core platform and provide enhancements that conform to each county's specifications. We will need to rigorously test our apps before they get to all markets and we have supreme confidence in meeting the city requirements. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, if you're not able to contribute, that's ok, we still would love you to be part of the TTT community! Reach out to your local officials and let them know - you support bringing TTT to your community!

Please, download our iOS or Android app and keep an eye out for any distracted drivers! We'd love to put some money in your pocket and get another distracted driver to reconsider their dangerous actions. And, if you could spread the word to anyone else who believes in the cause, we would tremendously appreciate it - let's make our roads safer, together!

Thank you for visiting!

-Text to Ticket Team

story:
IMPORTANT NOTICE: Although crowdfunding has ended at Indiegogo, our project continues and all support is still very welcome via josefganz.org.

 

Recreating a milestone in automotive history

The Volkswagen Beetle would not have existed without Josef Ganz - a Jewish engineer who masterminded its basic design. We want to bring international acclaim to his work by rebuilding his "Volkswagen" - the 1933 Standard Superior:

  • Dutch journalist & writer Paul Schilperoord met Lorenz Schmid, a Swiss-born relative of Josef Ganz, when he was researching for the biography of Josef Ganz - and together we bought the Standard Superior.
  • Our car has the only complete surviving rolling chassis of the Standard Superior type I - an estimated 250 cars were built from April to September 1933. (This model was followed by the type II with different body styling)
  • The aim of our campaign is to raise funds to recreate the original beetle-shaped bodywork for this chassis - working with professional restorers.

Our goals & ambitions

If we are successful, the restored Standard Superior will be used in future international exhibitions & events to promote the work of Josef Ganz (1898-1967):

  • In return for your support we offer some very special perks - scroll down for more information and photos - including the biography of Josef Ganz, AutoCult's new set of 1:43 "Pre-Volkswagen" models, "Psychomotor" artwork by Swiss artist Rémy Markowitsch - and a unique event at the Louwman Museum to present the car. You can even go for a ride!
  • Should we not reach our entire goal, we will restore what we can with funds raised and keep searching for additional funds to complete the project and unveil the Standard Superior at the Louwman Museum as planned.
  • Stretch goals: If we raise more funds than initially required, we will use these to create exact replicas of interior trim, chairs, missing technical parts, etc.

Our plan to recreate the original beetle shape

Our car miraculously survived as it was kept on the road in East Germany for decades. Its chassis and running gear is fully original - including the wheels and wings - but the bodywork has been largely modified using Trabant P50 parts:

  • Step 1: take the existing bodywork off the chassis and clean up or renovate original parts, such as chassis, wheels and wings.
  • Step 2: the wooden bodywork will be reconstructed by Stellmacherei Tiede - using many original photographs from the Josef Ganz archives - and their associated partners will install artificial leather covering the wooden bodywork, do the paintwork and install windows and interior trim.
  • Step 3: locate and install missing parts, such as original lights, steering wheel, dashboard switches, door handles, radiator, etc.

The Standard Superior in Volkswagen history

The Standard Superior is the embodiment of Josef Ganz's propaganda campaign "For the German Volkswagen". As editor-in-chief of Motor-Kritik magazine, he outlined the specs for this future car: low-slung, streamlined, backbone chassis, rear-mounted engine, fully independent suspension with swing axles - and a price not exceeding 1,000 Reichsmark.

Ganz initially built two prototypes: the 1930 Ardie-Ganz and 1931 Adler Maikäfer (May Bug). As a technology demonstrator, the May Bug (see video above - with Josef Ganz behind the wheel!) inspired the industry to develop radical new prototypes - including the Mercedes-Benz 120, Tatra V570, Zündapp Type 12 "Volksauto" by Ferdinand Porsche (photo below, right), and Standard Superior based on the patents of Josef Ganz (photo below, left).

At the time of its introduction at the 1933 Berlin motor show, the Standard Superior was the only 4-wheeled, rear-engined car in production. At the show, the Superior caught the eye of Hitler - and was hailed by the press:

  • "On 4 wheels runs the highlight of the exhibition [...] rear engine = the future" - Die Neue Stadt
  • "the most advanced despite its small proportions" - Motor und Sport
  • "The Standard Superior, as devised by Ganz, has proven extraordinarily successful [...] and it will in all probability lead to the introduction of larger models with rear-mounted engines." - ADAC-Motorwelt

A journalist for The Detroit News concluded: "Whatever may be the future development of this type of car in Germany, without doubt the Hitler government will be responsible for its popularization." Although Hitler would indeed popularize the "Volkswagen", even the most prophetic journalist could not have foreseen that in the process he would deliberately erase the visionary Jewish engineer Josef Ganz from history.

Risks & challenges

Our main challenges are that no technical drawings are known to exist for the Standard Superior Type I - and that we need to find a number of original parts for the car that was only produced in very limited numbers in 1933:

  • We plan to work with specialists to recreate the original shape of the bodywork based on period photographs and a surviving original Standard Superior Type II. This car has different body styling but a similar overall construction.
  • A number of the original parts we need to find are electrical parts. Standard exclusively used parts by Bosch, which already was a well-established company at the time.
  • We plan to make regular trips to specialized events for pre-WWII cars, such as the VETERAMA, to search for missing parts.

Our perks & other ways you can help

We are very grateful for any contribution, support & promotion we get for our project. Please feel free to share our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools. Donations are most welcome and can be made by using the "BACK IT" button at the top of the page. Or select one of our unique perks:

Media attention

Recreating a milestone in automotive history
The Volkswagen Beetle would not have existed without Josef Ganz - a Jewish engineer who masterminded its basic design. We want to bring international acclaim to his work by rebuilding his "Volkswagen" - the 1933 Standard Superior:


Dutch journalist & writer Paul Schilperoord met Lorenz Schmid, a Swiss-born relative of Josef Ganz, when he was researching for the biography of Josef Ganz - and together we bought the Standard Superior.
Our car has the only complete surviving rolling chassis of the Standard Superior type I - an estimated 250 cars were built from April to September 1933. (This model was followed by the type II with different body styling)
The aim of our campaign is to raise funds to recreate the original beetle-shaped bodywork for this chassis - working with professional restorers.

If we are successful, the restored Standard Superior will be used in future international exhibitions & events to promote the work of Josef Ganz (1898-1967):

You can even go for a ride!
Should we not reach our entire goal, we will restore what we can with funds raised and keep searching for additional funds to complete the project and unveil the Standard Superior at the Louwman Museum as planned.

story:
Summary

On May 18th, 2015 Dot Com Zambia will launch its Bus Tickets Zambia project starting in Lusaka, the capital city of Zambia. 

Bus Tickets Zambia is a convenient and reliable way for the general public in Zambia to book their inter-city bus tickets online, using a variety of method from their feature phones to purchasing the ticket from an authorized agent like Post Dot Net, and then paying for the tickets using their bank cards, mobile phones or make cash payments to an authorized agent. Bus Tickets Zambia aims to decentralize intercity public bus travel for all Zambians regardless of social standing in society.

For nearly 2 years, Dot Com Zambia has been developing this system to make intercity bus travel more convenient, more efficient and more accessible to the general public through technology. The scale of this project is unprecedented in Zambia and across Africa and will change the way bus travel is conducted, not only in Zambia, but across Africa.

Our project has received tremendous support from the general public as well as acclaim from the international community including a recent recognition from Harvard University, which included a $15,000 grant, as the best new business venture in Africa for 2015 as well a $7500 Grant at the 2014 Global Innovation for Science and Technology Competition sponsored by the U.S state Department.

However like many entrepreneurs, bringing our business to market has been challenging, but through sheer will and support from various private parties, we have been able to develop a lot of the project on our own, creating jobs along the way and a valuable system that solves a common Africa problem built by Zambians. 

INTERNATIONAL AWARDS

Harvard Business School Africa New Venture Winner for 2015

Muvi TV Coverage of the Africa Business Conference at Harvard University

Lusaka Times Articles: Harvard Business School Names Dot Com Zambia’s Bus Project as Africa’s Best New Venture for 2015

2nd Place Finisher: Global Innovation for Science and Technology (GIST), sponsored by the United States State Department

BUS TICKETS ZAMBIA IN THE MEDIA (PR)

Since Bus Tickets Zambia was officially announced in November, 2014, the project has received media coverage locally and internationally. The project has been covered on ZNBC, ZNBC1, Muvi TV, Radio Phoenix and has been mentioned in several print and online media locally and internationally

1)  ZNBC Coverage of Dot Com Zambia

2)   Zambian 2nd in Technology contest - Daily Nation

3)  Africa scores a big win at GIST Tech-I competition 2014

4)  AAAS Announces Finalists in Global Entrepreneurship

5)   Bus Tickets Zambia Profile on ZNBC TV 2

6)  Bus Tickets Zambia is Africa’s Best New Venture


What We Need 

We still need resources to bring this project to completion and we are seeking support from you to in the final stages to bring this project to market. The amount we are targeting is at least $7000 to go towards building a feature phone system and SMS that would allow travelers with the most basic of phones and living in small towns and rural Zambia to access buses. Using this system a customer can just dial a short code like 360# and reserve their bus ticket or they can send an SMS to a short code like 3006 and reserve their bus ticket that way.
The funds will go towards the set up fee for this system with the relevant telecommunications authorities in Zambia. At $7000 in year 1 and $4000 every year there after, these fees are tough for aspiring entrepreneurs and smaller businesses. Your generosity will be greatly appreciated.
If you are having toruble donating on this platform. You can try going to www.dczambia.com and click on the payment link or click here 
If you have a non U.S Credit/ Debit Card you can contribute through the Dot Com Zambia platform (click here)

Who Will this Impact?


“Mr John Banda, is a trader, who lives 60 minutes outside of Kasama. Mr Banda travels to Lusaka for business twice a month to buy supplies for his store and small farm. This is a trip he dreads.  Bus travel is the only way he can travel. He will wake up in the morning and make the 45 minute journey to the main road. Once at the main road he waits for hours and several buses from Kasama going to Lusaka will pass Mr Banda and typically not one will stop. So he has to make the decision to hitch hike or jump on a smaller local bus back to Kasama or Mpika and start his long journey from there and when things area really bad his journey to Lusaka starts the next day, meaning he would have spent 3 days travelling. His return journey is marginally smoother, but there are times he has missed the 14:30 time bus back to Kasama on the popular buses, which means  waiting for hours for any bus or sometimes sleeping at Intercity Bus Station and leaving the next day. But because he boards the bus in Lusaka, the bus driver will at least stop at the junction to his small town, which is at least a relief.

“Monika Kabwafwile lives near Kafue, a place she says is the worst when it comes to bus travel. If she is travelling to the Coperbelt, she has to find her way to Lusaka intercity first and then work out how to travel from there. If she is going to the South, then she was to wait by the roadside and see what bus she can chance on its way to Livingstone. Once or twice she has tried to make her way to the station in kafue to reserrve a seat. While this has worked from time to time, it is  still a game of chance as the bus has to leave Lusaka with an empty seat, but this requires the two station to manually cordinate.”

Cant that bus operator pick up this traveller in towns where they don’t have stations? Why can’t the traveller reserve and pay for that ticket in advance thus giving them peace of mind and securing their journey?

OUR INSPIRATION COMES FROM PEOPLE LIKE JOHN AND MONICA AND THE HUNDREDS OF PEOPLE WHO HAVE WRITTEN TO US ASKING FOR THIS CHANGE !!!


Appeal Message From The  Founder


I had the pleasure of  meeting Sir Richard Branson in December, 2014 at the Zambia Investment Conference .One comment that he made in particular resonated with me, “the best businesses are born out of frustration”. I recall in 2013 I had to travel from Lusaka to Nakonde by bus, and I went through the most frustrating of experiences to purchase a ticket. I knew then, they had to be a better way, and I could not be alone in this view. And rightly enough 100% of the market that we interviewed felt the same way as I did. And at that point Bus Tickets Zambia was born and little did I know, at the time, that the project that started with an objective of trying to buy a simple bus ticket would morph into this large scale venture.

The ineffeciencies of bus travel is clear to see, with people outside of urban areas in particular hardest hit by buses that want full loads from the point of origin. And as an economy how much productivity and money do we lose because of the ineffeciencies in the system? Time is the most valuable commodity that people have. Bus Tickets Zambia has a social responsibility to change this and it will. Once fully implemented Bus Tickets will have tremendous social and economic impact on the transportation sector in Zambia and more importantly create jobs

But like many Zambian entrepreneurs the road has been tough,  I started Dot Com Zambia in 2009 alongside myself and one other employee operating out of my kitchen. We had no access to capital, but we managed to get our first customer to pay us in advance and from there we grew primarily by word of mouth. And with the income we generated we reinvested it back into the business.

Today, we now have 18 employees in Zambia alongside 3 international offices and with Bus tickets Zambia, we have already created 8 jobs and are set to create another 10 jobs immediately after the  business is launched, mainly in IT and customer service.  As an entrepreneur, there is no greater feeling than telling someone that they are hired and they can come to work for this amazing small company with huge ambition.

We have a ground breaking project that has the potential to succeed in Zambia and grow beyond our borders, but we need help to make this happened and I need your support to make this a reality.

You Can Help

You can help make this happened, support this project and ask others to support it as well. through social media

As an organization, we still have a lot of work to do, but the work done to date has been superb in getting us closer to our objectives. I am confident that we will execute. And your support will allow us to execute our social contract and responsibility to Zambia which include:

1)  A commitment to create employment, And the more we can grow and possibly expand internationally the more jobs we will create.

2)  Continue to make our country proud and show that Zambia has entrepreneurs that  have the potential to achieve great things.

Mawano Kambeu

story:
Halo Wheel: This single invention made by us can turn your Bicycle wheels into smart screens. Want to know what all this is about and how this started ? Well, join us in our ride to the past and discover it yourself. 

How the Halo Wheel team got started:
Li Qiyn, Shi Youlan and myself, Zhou Longpeng are the original members of this team. We met each other at a college contest for the Electronic Design and Line-cruising robots contest held at our college, University of Electronic Science and Technology of China. We are an entrepreneurial team of college students named as 'Morning Electricity Smart Team' and we have walked through many difficulties and obstacles during the process of venturing out. 
In the Initial days, we as a team rented a small house close to our school and marked it to be our office. There were instances when we stayed until midnight burning oil and were figuring out the algorithm for the 9-axis merging in the square of Shun Jiang. We made initial profits by undertaking outsourcing programs like designing of 4-axis air crafts, portable power source, Mp3 etc. We were quite successful and we steadily gained reputation in the field of hardware in Chengdu City. We are lucky to have made friends with some of the giants of the electronics industry who gave us the knowledge they had and familiarized us with the product development and research, thereby laying a solid foundation to our future. 

Fine, the team has started. But how Halo Wheel entered the scene? 
The idea originated from modifying a simple whirled clock in order to gift to the girls we love. As you might know, whirled clocks are composed of LED and can put up a display while whirling. What changed the path was that we added a Blue tooth model and controlled it through smart phones and thus we equipped it with the feature of displaying any pictures. We carried this idea forward and our first target was the cycle. 

After being equipped with Halo Wheel, even the most ordinary cycles seemed to be magical. The tires are now shining and displaying customized pictures, and this is why we made Halo Wheel, to add pleasure and delight to your bicycles. Traditional lights mounted on the cycles are dull and mundane but with Halo Wheel, there is a tinge of freshness added. Also, the LEDs used cover a wide range of areas and also provided safety to the riders in the evening. 

Basic design of Halo Wheel: 
We have used a simple setup consisting of two long strips of LED, equipped on the bicycle hubs as the cross-shaped tools. When the tires are in motion, they display a round picture and customized caricatures. The software part includes the function of editing pictures and recording data.

What we need now:

It was during March of the year 2015 and we have enrolled about 300 members in Chengdu. After trying Halo Wheel, almost all of them gave a positive reaction which boosted our confidence. We collected valuable feedback from our customers and updated the software regularly, thereby optimizing interactive experience. Right now, we are raising funds for scale production and US Marketing.

Halo Wheel is just a new start. We are keen to enter the future business and hopefully succeed. As far as stating business is concerned, all I want to say is that it has been really hard in the beginning as we were pressurized to continue our studies and we had to find the right balance between study and business. However, we as a team know that it is just a start and there is a long way lying ahead of us before we embrace our successful future.

Li Qiyn, Shi Youlan and myself, Zhou Longpeng are the original members of this team. We met each other at a college contest for the Electronic Design and Line-cruising robots contest held at our college, University of Electronic Science and Technology of China. We are an entrepreneurial team of college students named as 'Morning Electricity Smart Team' and we have walked through many difficulties and obstacles during the process of venturing out. 
In the Initial days, we as a team rented a small house close to our school and marked it to be our office. There were instances when we stayed until midnight burning oil and were figuring out the algorithm for the 9-axis merging in the square of Shun Jiang. We made initial profits by undertaking outsourcing programs like designing of 4-axis air crafts, portable power source, Mp3 etc. We were quite successful and we steadily gained reputation in the field of hardware in Chengdu City. We are lucky to have made friends with some of the giants of the electronics industry who gave us the knowledge they had and familiarized us with the product development and research, thereby laying a solid foundation to our future. Fine, the team has started. But how Halo Wheel entered the scene? 
The idea originated from modifying a simple whirled clock in order to gift to the girls we love. As you might know, whirled clocks are composed of LED and can put up a display while whirling. What changed the path was that we added a Blue tooth model and controlled it through smart phones and thus we equipped it with the feature of displaying any pictures. We carried this idea forward and our first target was the cycle. 
After being equipped with Halo Wheel, even the most ordinary cycles seemed to be magical. The tires are now shining and displaying customized pictures, and this is why we made Halo Wheel, to add pleasure and delight to your bicycles. Traditional lights mounted on the cycles are dull and mundane but with Halo Wheel, there is a tinge of freshness added. Also, the LEDs used cover a wide range of areas and also provided safety to the riders in the evening. Basic design of Halo Wheel: 
We have used a simple setup consisting of two long strips of LED, equipped on the bicycle hubs as the cross-shaped tools. When the tires are in motion, they display a round picture and customized caricatures. The software part includes the function of editing pictures and recording data.What we need now:It was during March of the year 2015 and we have enrolled about 300 members in Chengdu. After trying Halo Wheel, almost all of them gave a positive reaction which boosted our confidence. We collected valuable feedback from our customers and updated the software regularly, thereby optimizing interactive experience. Right now, we are raising funds for scale production and US Marketing.Halo Wheel is just a new start. We are keen to enter the future business and hopefully succeed. As far as stating business is concerned, all I want to say is that it has been really hard in the beginning as we were pressurized to continue our studies and we had to find the right balance between study and business. However, we as a team know that it is just a start and there is a long way lying ahead of us before we embrace our successful future.

story:
The Trail Cat is a new concept 18 speed quad fat tire bicycle made for the road, the dirt, the sand and snowy conditions. The Trail Cat can be ridden on mountain trails, on the beach, dry sand and wet packed sand, and in the snow such as fresh snow, hard packed snow. This is a lightweight and rugged bicycle that can handle most any terrain. This bicycle can be driven at typical bicycle speeds or a much slower leisurely speed. The Trail Cat is lightweight, highly maneuverable and easy to peddle.


 The Trail Cat features a custom well made 18 speed gear box with an all metal body and all metals gears and a 18 speed grip shifter, a lightweight high quality aluminum frame, aluminum rims, disk brakes on all four tires, and four fat tires on 100mm rims and a cargo rack for all of your gear. There will be a hitch on the rear frame to allow the attachment of a trailer for more gear. The Trail Cat will also come with a light weight aluminum framed seat with a comfortable, breathable and washable nylon mesh seat. The Trail Cat will come in several vibrant high gloss colors. This will be a high quality bicycle at a more affordable price than what is currently available on the internet.


 Health advantages of the Trail Cat over traditional bicycles. With traditional bicycles the rider must sit and ride in an unnatural position that can cause neck, shoulder and lower back strain over time. The Trail Cat allows the rider to sit in a more natural upright position. The comfortable seat can be slide forward or backwards to allow the rider a more comfortable riding position, The seat will also tilt backwards lowering pressure on the lower back and hips.


Similar products on the market have a base price of $3800 range, going up to well over $5000. Accessories such as the cargo rack, and fenders will come standard on the Trail Cat. These add hundreds of dollars to the final price on similar bicycles sold on the internet. The Trail Cats 18 speed gear box also is standard. Similar internal gear boxes retail from a few hundred dollars to a couple of thousand. The Trail Cat will be by far the best priced fat tire quad bicycle on the market, without compromising on quality, design or features at an introductory price of $1499.00.



What will the money go to?

  In order to get the required quality, at the right price, I must buy all of the parts in bulk quantities in order to make the Trail Cat more affordable. This project is more complex than most due to all of the different parts that must be purchased and from many different vendors. For example, a vendor for the 18 speed gear box, another for the tires, one for the seats, one for the brakes sets, one for the rims and so on. The frame will be the most expensive part of the bike to buy, In order to make the Trail Cat more affordable I must buy the frames in a quantity of 100 or more. Other expenses such as buying two seats of many parts, two seats of tires, two sets of tubes, two sets of brakes, two seats of rims. Two sets of parts will add to the projects price.

 Even if you are not able to contribute at the moment, please let your friends know about this campaign, and also if you could share it on your social media profile, that would be wonderful. If you have any questions please contact me. Thank you

story:
MATE x MONCLER HAS ARRIVED

MATE.BIKE and Moncler call upon the world of first-movers and urban mobility enthusiasts for the launch of the much-anticipated MATE x Moncler Genius 2020 limited edition eBike.
An extremely limited amount of MATEs will be hand-crafted for this pre-launch and exclusively made available here on Indiegogo, before arriving in selected Moncler flagship stores around the world and on MATE.BIKE online.


(Featuring world-renowned BMX athlete Nigel Sylvester)

MATE x Moncler Genius edition is the fastest and strongest MATE to date. Iconic design, physical boldness and now packed with smart features. This MATE is designed for both urban riding and mountain exploration. Experience an electrifying commute designed for both leisure and extreme adrenaline.

It’s a powerful, high-tech, high-fashion, all-season ready, foldable eBike with a unique take on progressive travel. It pushes the boundaries of conventional commuting and personal expression.

 

SETTING NEW STANDARDS 

Taking technical performance and presentation to new heights, the level of detail and upgrading that has gone into this project is unprecedented. The result is a truly exemplary model of pinnacle integration and design – available in PEAK WHITE and DEEP BLACK.

 

Only a very limited amount of this will be made available first for pre-order here at Indiegogo, where MATE was initially born and founded by more than 20,000 backers from 80+ countries. MATE is now the world's most global eBike brand.

 

THE GENIUS IS IN THE DETAIL

MATE x Moncler GENIUS edition features space-grade aluminum and a performance-tuned 250W or 1000W motor with throttle that allows this MATE to hit speeds of as high as 52 km/h / 32 mph (unlocked). The battery delivers 48V for unmatched torque to tackle steep ascents. It's also packing the highest capacity battery cells in the industry to ensure a range of up to 70 miles / 110 km on a single charge.

As the world’s first connected (4G) MATE, you can wirelessly customize your MATE experience with full access to performance settings. It includes remote live-tracking and anti-theft system with SDM™ – Self Destruct Mode, a patent-pending MATE.lab™ technology. 

 

PEAK WHITE

The glossy all-white edition draws inspiration from the exploring snow capped mountain peaks and alpine glaciers, complete with entirely custom white component and chrome detailing. It’s a truly unique look that is certain to draw attention.
 

CHROME DETAILING
The PEAK WHITE version sports high-quality chrome finish on key details to complete the crisp look.

CUSTOM 1000W MOTOR
Powerful 1000W rear hub motor introduced into the MATE line, custom tuned for unrivaled performance.


COMPACT FOLDABILITY
Foldable in seconds with 3 easy steps for storage and transportation. Take it on the train or put it in the car.
 

UPGRADED FRONT SUSPENSION
Adjustable air suspension fork for fine-tuning the sensitivity to match your weight, terrain and riding style.
 


DEEP BLACK

The matte all-black version is the yin to the yang of the PEAK WHITE, inspired by the shadows of cascading peaks, deep ravines and the dark unexplored forests. The completely custom stealth blackout of all parts completes the DEEP BLACK aesthetic.
 

INTEGRATED BATTERY
Packing the power source inside the frame adds to an improved center of gravity and balancing when riding.

SMOOTH WELDS
To complete the sleek look and feel we re-worked all the details down to the welds to set this apart from the rest. 

 

SMART COLOR DISPLAY
Featuring an easy to read waterproof backlit LCD display with a built-in USB charger. Easily manage and see all data on your ride from speed, power, distance and more.

IMPROVED REAR SUSPENSION
Durable yet active rear shock keeps you comfortably seated over rough terrain.

 

 

The upgraded SMART BMS BATTERY, Samsung 3400 Li-Ion 48V 17.5 Ah battery allows for, via controller connectivity, accurate readings of temperature, voltage, cell-balancing to protect the electrical system. The Next-Gen 4G connected chip installed in this MATE allows easy access to all ride data through MATE.app. Improved HYDRAULIC BRAKES provide smoother, more reliable braking with fingertip effort. Featuring eBike rated pad compound and automatic pad adjustment as they wear down. Expert shifting with SHIMANO 8-SPEED SYSTEM gives ideal range and gear steps for seamless transitions between shifts.

 

KEEP IT  WARM WHILE STAYING COOL

A custom MONCLER down quilted duvet crafted in technical microfibre with nylon laqué keeps your battery warm for maximum range when the temperature drops.

 

 

INTRODUCING A MATE.LAB INNOVATION

SDM™ - Patent pending technology

SDM™ (SELF-DESTRUCT-MODE) is the last line of defense if your MATE is stolen, with no chance of recovery such as being taken to another country. By activating SDM™ from the MATE.APP, you will destroy the MATE and its resale value, thus rendering it utterly useless for the thief. SDM™ is one of our MATE.LAB innovations, and a world’s first of its kind.

 

 

TWO BUILDS. ONE VISION.

 

KINDRED SPIRITS UNITE

Moncler’s vision is to reinterpret the ordinary through the extraordinary, to inspire emotions both in the cities and in the mountains where Moncler was founded. Through this distinctive lens, MATE and Moncler together realized a truly unique concept of delivering desirable personal expression at the summit of fashion and tech innovations.

 

FIRST OF ITS KIND

The MATE x Moncler Genius collaboration was revealed during Milan Fashion Week at the exclusive Moncler Genius 2020 show. MATE.BIKE is the first non-clothing brand to be included in the Genius collections.

"We’re super excited and equally proud to partner with Moncler on their Moncler Genius collection. MATE.BIKE and Moncler share the same brand values, always taking the road less traveled. With our new MATE created for extreme terrain, we’re the perfect fit for extending Moncler’s pioneering spirit as innovators of the outdoors."

– Christian Adel Michael & Julie Kronstrøm Carton

 

MAKING A STATEMENT

From the get-go, this collaboration has earned a lot of hype for breaking new grounds – and rightly so, in our opinion. We have been featured in : 


 

MATE FOR MUCH MORE

Founded in 2016 by Danish siblings, Julie and Christian, in the cycling capital of Copenhagen, MATE.BIKE has grown to become the leading electric vehicle brand on a global scale. 

MATE has produced two record-breaking crowdfunding campaigns totaling around 25 million USD. To date, MATE has delivered over 20,000 bikes. Around 13,000 of these were of the X model sold via Indiegogo, which was the largest grossing Indiegogo campaign ever. MATE is currently the world's most global eBike brand. 

Now backed by a growing team of specialists, our vision is to change the entire eBike category with a deep understanding of modern lifestyle and a clear vision of intersecting fashion, tech and sustainability.

story:
The size and power of the Hurricane X electric skateboard is designed to be the ideal board to travel with. It has a sleek unibody; making it light, slim, and easy to transport. It has a sports and beginner mode so everyone can enjoy riding around!

The Hurricane X goes up to 35km/h for 21 km (21 mph for 12.42 miles) and climbs hills of up to 30% / 17º. With regenerative braking, you can charge your board while going downhill. Not only does it look good in the day, it’s stunning at night too. With the built-in LED lights in the front and back, it enables you to see as well as be seen. It’s IPX7 waterproof, so rain or puddles won’t ever be a problem.

The board comes with a single or double brushless AC motors. Each motor is equipped with 900W of power, totalling to 1800W for the dual motors. Its efficient cooling system boosts the longevity of the motor, making this the only electric skateboard you’ll ever need!

 

The sealed motor is made of high quality steel and has gone through high precision CNC to ensure the best safety. A powerful takeoff is guaranteed by the 180ºC high temperature-resistant copper enamelled wire. N40 ndfeb magnet, imported silicon steel stator, Japanese NSK high-speed motor bearing, and customized high-quality tracks all contribute to the motor’s stability and power.

The deck is made out of a space grade 7075 aluminum, making it one of the strongest boards on the market. For its durable frame, it’s surprising light, weighting at 6.7 kgs / 14.7 lbs.

The 51º truck ensures the best performances in safety, load bearing, powerful takeoff and turning ability! Hurricane X’s durable deck, a space grade 7075 aluminum, allows it to bear up to 135 kg / 300 lbs.

The high damping shock absorption mat and PU wheels boost the overall shock absorption of the board by increasing the shock absorption rate by 30%. Enjoy the smoothest ride on the Hurricane X!

Similar to the motor, 2 options are available to control the board as well. With the hand held controller, you can just hop on and go as soon as you unbox it. The controller was ergonomically designed to deliver the most comfortable fit.

Or connect through our app!  It gives you the ability to control the skateboard, battery life reminders, and route history of where you’ve been. It’s also equipped with AI, learning your movements and habits, to offer you the best riding experience by making automatic adjustments!

 

The Hurricane X is designed with a USB port to turn your skateboard into a personal power bank. Never will you have to miss recording your adventures. Just plug your charger to the board and revive your devices.

With the 1800W powerful dual motor system of HurricaneX, 17º / 30% hill climbing will not pose a problem! It's a perfect personal vehicle for you to get around.

Thanks to the aluminum unibody design of HurricaneX, not only it is super strong, but it is also IPX7 Waterproof! Don't let the puddles get in your way, enjoy HurricaneX even more!

 

Getting around the city doesn't have to be stressful and tiring, it can be stylish and fun, ride HurricaneX now and start venturing your city like.

The HurricaneX team is a young and passionate team aiming to provide a solution to last mile transportation, making urban commute less stressful and tiring, but more exciting and fun! If you ever got scared off by the expensive prices of other electric skateboards on the market, which can easily be over $1000, HurricaneX is your best chance to own a personal powerful electric skateboard! Start venturing your city with HurricaneX!

As our product design and testing are gearing up to the final stages and heading to large-scale product, we’d like to invite you to the last chapter of this adventure to enjoy the convenience of urban commute as much as we do.

We are really excited to launch the HurricaneX that could make getting around your city a breeze. We know that the most important part of our process is the commitment we made to you and to deliver the HurricaneX to you on time! All rewards are expected to start shipping in May, 2018. We are confident in our supply chain management and production capability. However, if there are any uncontrollable factors, such as component delays or unexpected shortages, we will be sure to keep you well informed every step of the way and do our best to quickly solve the problem. We are excited to bring HurricaneX to life and get this revolutionary electric skateboard into your hands!
