The project's promoter team has been working with this type of materials for almost 20 years and we have designed and calculated hundreds of different parts, but never something as innovative as this bike.  In Cyclic, we wanted to bet on taking carbon fiber to the cities and, that is why, we have devised a design and manufacturing system that allows us to make very light frames, of very high performance at a tremendously competitive price. For a similar cost, or even less than a traditional metal components bicycle, we offer you a much lighter, more comfortable and manageable alternative.  In front of the more than 15 kilos that a conventional ride bike can weight, you can have your Cyclic for just around 8 kilos. Incredible isn’t it? That saving in weight will allow you to make less effort, especially when starting and climbing, being able to comfortably go up or down stairs or move more agilely. You can ride your bike easily and almost effortlessly when you get on the subway, the tram or just when you store it at home. The ultimate urban bike. Are you ready to be Cyclic?  HOW IS YOUR CYCLIC?After many designs, tests, calculations and prototypes, we came up with a solution able to manufacture carbon fiber frames, very light and resistant, that were made in a simple way and that hardly consumed time or resources. Our exclusive patented manufacturing system allows us to produce locally without resorting to process outsourcing to factories in Asia.  The result is a very light frame that combines technologically very advanced materials, such as high-strength polymers reinforced with fiber, which give it unique characteristics in terms of strength and energy absorption capacity. All this, together with the carbon fork. You can also customize it in different colors. Are you ready to choose yours?  CUSTOM SIZEThanks to the design of the assembly, we can create a bike completely adapted to you.  A fundamental aspect when you are riding a bike,either by the city, by the mountain or on the road, is to have an appropiate, comfortable and adapted position to your needs and likes. A forced position or a bicycle of a size that does not fit to your figure can cause us important muscle and joint lesion and a bad use of your own effort.All bicycles on the market are manufactured based on a size scale (S, M, L, ...) calculated based only on the user's height and do not always adapt 100% to our characteristics.Cyclic's modular manufacturing system allows us to make custom frames in record time, exactly adapted to the user's size by only indicating three simple measures: total height, leg length and arm length. Thanks to physiotherapy studies, we can adapt the frame perfectly to your needs and, also, to your pedaling likes. DESIGN YOUR OWN CYCLICNow that you know our exclusive frame ¿can you imagine being able to customize the rest of the bike components? In Cyclic we make it possible, we offer you the possibility to choose between different types of accessories and a multitude of colors. We want your bike to be a unique object!   Take this opportunity! We offer you the possibility to choose between one of our models. These are the color combinations we have chosen for you.  EXTRASIn addition to everything we have told you, our bikes incorporate several accessories and components that make it the ultimate urban bicycle.REAR LED LIGHTAll models have LED taillight integrated into the frame itself. It is charged by USB connection, it is easily removable to prevent theft, it has 50 hours of autonomy, waterproof and several modes of operation, among those that stand out the braking sensor that increases the intensity of the lighting when it detects a deceleration.TANNUS TIRESIf you are tired of having to change wheels due to inconvenient punctures or if you simply want to forget forever of having to inflate the wheels of your bike, we offer you the option of incorporating Tannus tires. There are even lighter than conventional camera and cover solutions and you can choose from a wide variety of colors. Forget about problems and maintenance for more than 6,000 kilometers and ride without worries with a total grip, both dry and wet, thanks to its innovative Aither® material  BIKONE BOTTOM BRACKETIn collaboration with the Spanish company BIKONE BEARINGS we incorporate in all our frames its innovative technology in the bottom brackets that are exclusively manufactured for Cyclic, that ensure the best behavior, without noise or cracking and with surprising lightness and durability. 3 SPEED INTERNAL HUBIf the slopes are not your thing and you want to ride comfortably, we offer you the possibility of incorporating a three-speed internal hub integrated in the rear axle. You will keep all the urban aesthetics of your Cyclic and there will be no ramp that resists you.  CYCLIC IS TECHNOLOGYIn competitive cycling, carbon fiber began to be introduced in the frames, and in other components such as forks and handlebars. But what about urban bicycles? Why in this sector almost all the frames and components are still made of steel or, at most, aluminum? The answer, as usual, is found on the price. Making a carbon fiber frame with traditional methods is very expensive, for the materials and also for the design and production process. While making a traditional one in steel, it is a much simpler and cheaper work. Under this scene, it is easy to understand why carbon has not been introduced into the urban world. With carbon fiber we can obtain the same, or even better, mechanical characteristics than in a piece made of steel, but with a weight five or six times less. That is, maximum strength and rigidity, but very lightly. For the realization of the prototypes and of the definitive designs, we have invested many hours of calculation and development, using the most advanced simulation techniques and following the rules that regulate the main cases of load in use of a bicycle. CYCLIC IS ENVIRONMENT At Cyclic, we are committed with the environment and we did not want to keep our bike as a simple element of sustainable urban mobility. Thanks to the exclusive manufacturing system, we managed to boost local production and achieve a production process close to zero CO2 emissions. The carbon footprint of a Cyclic frame is practically zero since, on one hand, we eliminate the emissions associated with import and transoceanic transport and, on the other, energy consumption and the generation of waste associated with the production process is almost residual in comparison with traditional methods. WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR WITH THIS CAMPAIGN?It is very simple, on one hand, we want to make ourselves known and give the opportunity to our first followers to have a totally innovative and customized urban bicycle for an absolutely unbeatable price. On the other, we need your help to start the project at an industrial level due to we need financing to acquire the molds that allow us to manufacture high-quality customized frames, with little effort. FUNDINGOur exclusive and patented modular manufacturing system allows us to produce fully customized frames in size, extremely light and resistant, in an agile and sustainable way, not only to stress, but also to the corrosion produced by water and moisture by not carrying metallic components.The current prototypes have been manufactured using 3D printing techniques and additive manufacturing and, although the result has been amazing, its high cost prevents the final production process through such techniques.In order for the joining parts of the tubes that make up the complete frame to have the necessary quality and strength, we need to manufacture them by means of an injection process of a carbon fiber composite material specially designed for us. That’s why, we need a series of molds that are the primary object of our investment. THE TEAM We are a dynamic and flexible team with diverse and complementary capabilities, but with one thing in common: the illusion for this project. We don't want to be just another company that sells bicycles, we want to create a community, see the streets full of bikes and think that we are having an impact on the world around us.Daniel RodríguezFormer professional athlete with more than 15 years of career. Expert in sports marketing and distribution.Rosa GonzálezSocial educator with great skills and abilities for the development of corporate social responsibility activities and actions of environmental improvements and urban sustainabilitySergio SerranoIndustrial engineer with more than 20 years of experience working with advanced materials. Passionate about bicycles and innovative projects.

story:
Who we are

London Electric Cars is a start-up run out of a small garage in central London.

It was started in 2017 by Matthew Quitter after he got fed up with the air quality and cost of petrol in London. He has a passion for classic cars and was excited by classic car EV conversions but soon discovered that they are expensive.

So Matthew set up LEC to figure out a way to bring down the cost of classic conversions.  However, he realised that if he could get conversion costs low enough, they would offer a solution not just for classic cars but for all vehicles.

Our goal is to use second hand EV components salvaged from the most popular electric cars to deliver affordable conversions.

We also want to develop conversion kits to enable local garages and home mechanics to easily convert cars to electric.

Development work is done mostly by Matthew but he is regularly joined by some great volunteers. He also benefits from sharing space with a local classic car club and is lucky to have the support of many Morris Minor enthusiasts, as well as the wider EV community.

We currently have space to work on four cars. We can carry out installations and develop our products. Welding, fabricating and other industrial processes are done off-site through our various suppliers.

Our prototype is a 1953 Morris Minor Series 2.

We took out the combustion motor and installed batteries and a suitable electric motor. All using only second hand equipment.

The car has been driving around London for over a year now and it’s loads of fun. It is a great short-range city car.

Currently we're working on five customer cars: A classic Mini, a Land Rover Series 2, a Morris Traveller, a Karmann Ghia and a Citroen H Van.

Based on what we learn from converting cars we've started developing conversion kits for the Morris Minor, Series Land Rovers and classic Mini.

We continuously seek ways to reduce the costs of conversions. 

 

Why we need your help

We want to hire great people, find larger premises to work on more cars, purchase equipment and increase the speed of development.

We need to hire some great staff. Ideally some of the recent volunteers who are talented EV fanatics and have been learning quickly. The more people working at London Electric Cars, the quicker we'll develop.

We have found a new, much larger space to move into, just round the corner from our existing site. With your help we'll be able to fully equip the new workshop, expand the number of cars we work on and have more space for research.

We want to explore the different sources of affordable EV components: Nissan Leafs  and E-NV200, BMW i3s, Renault Zoes, Kia Souls, Mitsubishi i-Mievs and Citroen Zeros etc. as well as alternative sources such as recycled computer laptop batteries, electric motors from hybrid cars or rewound industrial motors. 

We want to continue to refine our Morris Minor kit and speed up development of our other classic car kits. From there we will pick the most common cars on the road and develop conversion kits for those.

We would use your supporting funds to research ways to make conversions as efficient and affordable as they can be. 

 

Why?

Living in London, or around any city, it’s clear that there’s a pollution problem. People should be driving electric cars, the average journey is under 6 miles and most of the journey is spent at low speeds. But buying an electric car is still expensive. 

At the same time there are currently 1 billion combustion-powered cars, trucks and vans in the world. There are 37 million vehicles in the UK alone.

Nothing is really wrong with those cars except for their combustion engines. But despite that, as the world turns electric, current thinking would have them all headed for the scrap heap.

So why not make affordable electric cars by finding affordable electric car parts and converting old combustion engine cars.

 

How do you find electric car parts?

The biggest challenge to our plan is sourcing cheap electric car parts. To do this we’re buying salvage electric cars from breakers yards.

The top selling electric car in the UK is the Nissan Leaf so they’re the most commonly found electric cars in breaker’s yards.

We’re focussing on development based around components from the Nissan Leaf.

As more and more electric cars are sold and prices of new electric cars come down so will the price of salvage cars.

We’re also exploring other sources of components, such as the recycled laptop batteries, electric motors from other industries,

 

What else are we working on?

We’ve had lots of interest from the Minor community and are converting a Traveller at the moment. We have produced early versions of a kit that would allow any Minor enthusiast to convert their car to electric.

In the garage at the moment we’ve also got a 1969 Land Rover Series 2, a 1980 Classic Mini, a Karmann Ghia and a Citroen H Van.

From the experience of the Minor kit we’re also working on kits for classic Mini’s and Land Rovers.

We’re eager to properly explore ways of using recycled laptop batteries in traction packs. 

We also get involved in talks about electric cars, encourage young adults to come and spend time in our garage and evangelise about electric cars generally.

We’re also chasing the UK government for help, the OLEV for grants and we’re working to push down the price of a conversion below £10,000 for 100 miles range and rapid charging. If we could persuade the government to allow the plug in grant for conversions we could get closer to prices starting from £5,000.

Press

We've featured in a few of the papers...

Telegraph 

A Prelude to e-Minor - how this protoype electric Morris might change the world

 

 

 

The Sun

Crafty mechanic has joined the electric car revolution

 

 

 

 

And some great videos:

Silent D Motor Show - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T1JeK6sEhs8

Number 27 Car Show - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cdcT0LH_8HY

Vintage Voltage - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cBMyE1O0dQE

And featured in a few eco-company blogs...

Bulb Renewable Electricity - https://bulb.co.uk/blog/bulb-hero-matthew-found...

Raft Furniture - https://www.raftfurniture.co.uk/matthew-quitter...

 

Thanks for reading this far! 

If you've got any questions please drop us an email - we're always happy to talk electric cars and we'll know to add the information to the FAQs.

story:
Every backer will get their exclusive life membership card when we reach the stretch goal.The card will be upgraded automatically according to the final funding of the campaign.Learn more at the update #4.

 

 

Breeze II has great spec compared to most of the board on the market. As mentioned in the video, it can travel 15 miles in medium mode, climb up to a 30% hill and reach up to 28 miles per hour. The chart below compares Breeze II with one of the most famous electric skateboards in the industry. Even without the factor of such a big price difference, Breeze II still has advantages on the data listed.

 

 

On Breeze II, hub motor is chosen over belt motor for several reasons. As most electric skateboard users know, belt motor can provide more torque which can generate higher acceleration. However, belt motor needs frequent maintenance and makes loud noise during cruising. The hub motors are quieter and more energy efficient.

 

Those motors on Breeze II are also swappable. When the outside layer wears out, you can easily change it without changing the entire motor which is much more expensive. We also include a different size spare pair of wheels in the package.

 

 

 

 

For battery case and ESC case, we choose aluminum alloy to provide well crashworthiness and heat dissipation. The swappable function makes it easy to change the battery after the battery life ends. On the other hand, it also makes it possible to travel in longer distance if you carry a back-up battery during your trip.

           

 

Battery is one of the most importance parts of an electric skateboard. We select high quality Samsung battery which has 1000 cycles battery life. This means you can use up the battery 1000 times but still has most capacity of your battery. In addition, the Samsung battery can bear extreme weather. Breeze II can still function from -4°F to 140°F.

 

The deck of a skateboard can have huge influence on your riding experience. Breeze II’s deck is made of bamboo and two layers of glass fiber which make the deck three times more expensive than Canada maple deck. The combination makes a balance between flexibility and strength. The shape of the deck is designed for more comfort and stability.

 

In order to prevent water damage commonly seen on our previous boards. We enhance the waterproof level on Breeze II. It has one of the best waterproof features in the market, which reaches IP67. You can immerse the board entirely in water for short time period without damage it.

 

 

After the hardware introduction here comes the software.

 

We add in slide start function considering most skater used to slide start the normal skateboard. After couple steps of sliding, the board will automatically turn on.

 

Hardness of brake setting has always been tricky to decide. Since people have different braking habits, a single level braking can cause bad cruising experience and even injury. Breeze II has 4 brake settings from soft to strong. You can adjust the setting directly on the remote control during your ride.

 

By pressing the LED button on the remote control during cruise, your can cruise at the same speed you currently at. This function can make long distance trips much easier. You can stop the cruise control by braking at any moment.

 

Breeze II has two built in tail lights which will flash when you are braking.

 

 

By braking on downhill, you can charge your board during the trip.

 

 

 

 
 
 
 

 

We have shipped the first batch of Breeze II to our early bird backers. The second batch is in transit to our US and Europe warehouse now. We will arrange the shipment once they arrive.

story:
Hi there, my name is Earle and I'm the inventor of the Imbi.

I've been riding my bike and loving it for as long as I can remember and in the last few years become an avid mountain biker, taking part in various stage races including the 2014 Cape Epic in Cape Town, South Africa, generally considered the toughest 8 day MTB stage race in the world.

This often meant travelling long distances, sometimes over rough terrain to my training rides or events, mostly with a buddy or two sharing the ride. The only way I and most cyclists know of protecting our bikes when strapped together on the rack, is to stuff any form of soft padding in between the bikes. To my great frustration the bikes were often damaged when the makeshift padding moved or got lost in the journey. It was also a tedious exercise stuffing bits and pieces between the bikes and holding them in place. 

I searched high and low for a product that was specifically designed for this purpose but could find anything, so I decided to come up with the ultimate solution to this problem that's been annoying cyclists since the invention of bike racks.  

Below are images of our first prototypes and testing of new design idea.


 

 


Our first prototypes were terrible, but in time, and with the help of an award winning industrial design house, the concept evolved until it was perfect. And so Imbi was born and baptized. Perfectly "imbi"-tween!  


 

 


Watch the video below to see how IMBI works.


We've already appointed our manufacturers and all molds are finalized, but we need your backing to take the final big step and that's to place the production order to fill up a container.  



Product Images


 

 


Without your support we will not be able to bring this stunning product to market as we simply will not fill the manufacturer's minimum order quantity.

story:
Hi im Adam. Im an electrician by trade with a diploma in electrical engineering. I have 7 years experience in bicycle mechanics and design (recumbent specific) and 4 years experience in machining. 

For the past 7 years i have been following the WHPSC (world human powered speed challenge). I am passionate about creating the most efficient means of transport possible using human power alone. This passion ties in with my love of speed and care for the environment

So far i have done everything on my own. This includes 5 years of research, one prototype bike and hundreds of hours of computer design and aerodynamics analasys. The total cost i have spent on development and research i estimate to be around 15000 AUD. The moulds alone cost 15000 AUD on top of that. I am asking for assistance in helping fund this project. 

Nearly all the teams that compete have some type of sponsorship. That is normally either through a university of by a multimillion dollar company like google. I dont have any sponsors so by donating you will be helping cover the cost of materials such as carbon fibre cloth, mechanical parts like gears and pedals and eventually the shipping of the bike to america for the race. 

This bike race isn't only about speed. Its about developing new technologies to make vehicles and transportation more energy efficient thereby reducing the impact on the environment. Over the past 3 years the record has increased over 7% this is purely due to technologies like 3d printing being implemented into design. These technologies have only become affordable due to demand and increased popularity. Through this project i am trying to spread awareness of renewable energies and sustainability. 

If you can't afford to donate or would rather help out in other ways you can like my instagram account (hpt_falcon) or share this campaign with friends on social media. Thank you for your help.

So far i have done everything on my own. This includes 5 years of research, one prototype bike and hundreds of hours of computer design and aerodynamics analasys. The total cost i have spent on development and research i estimate to be around 15000 AUD. The moulds alone cost 15000 AUD on top of that. I am asking for assistance in helping fund this project. 
Nearly all the teams that compete have some type of sponsorship. That is normally either through a university of by a multimillion dollar company like google. I dont have any sponsors so by donating you will be helping cover the cost of materials such as carbon fibre cloth, mechanical parts like gears and pedals and eventually the shipping of the bike to america for the race. 
This bike race isn't only about speed. Its about developing new technologies to make vehicles and transportation more energy efficient thereby reducing the impact on the environment. Over the past 3 years the record has increased over 7% this is purely due to technologies like 3d printing being implemented into design. These technologies have only become affordable due to demand and increased popularity. Through this project i am trying to spread awareness of renewable energies and sustainability. 
If you can't afford to donate or would rather help out in other ways you can like my instagram account (hpt_falcon) or share this campaign with friends on social media. Thank you for your help.

story:
About Cycle Mower X

What you can do more with your e-bike or bicycle?

Mowing the lawn for your yard or for communities!

Yes, Cycle Mower X is the most eco-sustainable ride-on mower in the planet. Cycle Mower X is perfect for everyone whether your lawn be large or small or in straight long runs.  

Each year, Americans burn 800 million gallons of gas cutting their lawns, according to the Environmental Protection Agency.

One gas-powered motor releases 88 pounds of greenhouse gas carbon dioxide and 34 pounds of other pollutants into the air, the EPA says. Save and conserve with a Cycle Mower X. The reel mowers execute the healthiest cut. Their blades cut in a "scissor" action which helps the growth of a healthy lawn. 
You will benefit from a little exercise for your health too while achieving mowing sustainability without using electricity or gas, which is perfect for rural and urban gardens.  It cuts really cleanly and makes a lovely restful sound instead of a stressful roar like power mowers. 
There are no fumes in your face while working, no petrol costs, no noise and no vibrations from an engine when mowing with a Cycle Mower X.

It does a MUCH better job than the mowing with a petrol mower.
You save money on fuel and oil while making mowing fun as Cycle Mower X will change your gardening experience.

The mower is also very light and takes up a small amount of space compared to a petrol mower. The other obvious benefit is that it doesn't use fuel.

A good look for the lawn is achieved after mowing with a Cycle Mower X.

It is awesome for the environment too. There are no wires and  no fuel needed to fill up,  so nothing really to go wrong which makes this nice and easy to use.
 

 No petrol, fumes or energy use, just exercise. Easy to clean and maintain.
 The children especially love it and play with it without realising that they are cutting the grass!It’s a great way to go green.
Easy to assemble, easy to use. We have a 1.5 acre yard and it's easy to mow with Cycle Mower X And it cuts evenly.
While you enjoy the cycling the lawn mowing job is done at the same time.

The feedback for reel mowers:

Great for REGULAR lawn maintenance.

The best bit, no petrol costs and NO fumes in my face while working.

A great device, likely to work well for years.

Great mower for Buffalo, Zoysia, centipede grass, Kentucky bluegrass.

Happy.

People, it is not like a grandpa's old push mower, this works super. Imagine, if everyone start to use push mower. The world will be using less gasoline, more human power, less noise !!!

thinking of getting a reel lawnmower as a petrol also makes me feel ill. hardly surprising as the amount of pollution crud that comes out of a petrol lawn mower and into the lungs is really high for the small amount of petrol used﻿.

It's a great workout that you get used to after a while. I cut the grass mostly for exercise anyway. And I can mow @ 6am if I want to.﻿

Hey, is it much longer to mow your lawn with this than with a gas mower? I consider buying one, but I have a pretty big yard. Takes me about 4 hours to mow it with my standard gas mower. Let's say that 4 hours smelling gas, earing the engine and feeling the vibrations are quite annoying.﻿

In the south a reel mower will make your grass at least 30% greener than a regular mower. My neighbors always ask what fertilizer I use because my grass is better looking and greener than their lawn service. My answer is none, I use a reel mower.

This is cheaper, quieter, and requires less maintenance. The key is to play with the blade/cutter spacing to get the most effective cut. Personally, I use ~1mm spacing (i.e. still free-rolling) and it seems to work well. Had it for 12 months or so, still no problems.

It takes about 15 minutes to mow the front yard, which is flat. Cutting the grass in the backyard takes about 30 minutes, due to the incline with the house being built on a hill.

Perfect for the normal family yard. Great fun too!

Economic, light and effective.

The whole family have enjoyed the exercise benefits. 

We have found a new way to both get our mountain biking training in and lawn mowed at the same time.

The contraption not only offers a way to exercise, but is also beneficial to the environment.

It's a lot of fun.

 

Go On, Your Way

Less Hard Work, More Powerful

Mowing the lawn with a Cycle Mower X become's a piece of cake.

 I don't mow anymore. I take nice quiet riding with my Cycle Mower X and it does the work. ﻿

If you only need mowing small lawn, that is a good news.  You can invite a few families to join for sharing Cycle Mower X. Then everybody has fun together.

If you need mowing for a larger lawn, this is good news too. You can jump on saddle and start to exercise with Cycle Mower X, While you enjoy the cycling the lawn mowing job is done at the same time.

 

 

Order now – and have your Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit delivered in June (US)/ June(EU)

June: Japan, Malaysia, UAE, Hong Kong, Republic of Korea, Taiwan, Thailand

June: US, Canada and Mexico,

June: EU and Europe 

June: Rest of world

Share our indiegogo link https://igg.me/at/cyclemowerx to your social media platforms or send our link to your friends.

If you  can meet over 20,000 visits total amount from all your social medias before we meet our goal. ($100,000)

You can get free Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit (value $58 to $98),   if you can approved by sending us all your links and screen shot to show the numbers of your visitors.

Please join us as promotion VIPs team to help us to meet the goal.

This reward program only valid when we reach our goal ($100,000).

Additional questions? 
Contact us at hello@cyclemowerx.com

 

Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit fit for most brands of reel mower.

 

 

 

 

 

Disassembling the push handle from the reel mower.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Assembling Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit.

The mower is attached with two short arms pinned to the bicycle to allow movement in all directions.

The mower is attached with two short arms pinned to the bicycle to allow movement in all directions.

The Cycle Mower X Trailer turn itself when the bike turning left or right.

The mower is attached with two short arms pinned to the bicycle to allow movement in all directions.

 

 

 
 
 
 
 

Our goal is set. Let’s reach it together.

 

 
 

We’re done with prototyping and are currently optimising parts, configurations and logistics. To start up the production, we have set a  goal of $100,000  for this campaign. We want to take this Cycle Mower X  to the next level and get even more people out on the saddle.

With this said, everyone who helps us in the making of the next Cycle Mower X,  will get it at less than 40% of  the retail price – and will be the first to be offered exclusive, premium perks as well as VIP access to the upcoming web store.

What we need

Our goal is to make this mower the sustainable  choice for people across the globe. And we believe the Cycle Mower X can help us reach that goal - an affordable, mini ride-on lawn mower  that is fun to ride for mowing the lawn.
Biking and mowing at the same time is fun, convenient and  good for both your health and the environment.. also something we are deeply passionate about.

We’ve put a lot of work into making the perfect kit. We’ve got our prototypes ready and with the support from our early backers from the campaign, we can now go into production and share it with the world. The final version of the trailer kit  is  better, stronger and cooler than ever. The more we sell, the more affordable we can make the Cycle Mower X in the future, which is our ultimate goal.

This is a strictly limited offer  as a reward for those who support our vision and product. All campaign supporters will also become Cycle Mower X VIPs and are entitled to exclusive early bird offers and discounts on future accessories.

All campaign supporters will also become Cycle Mower X VIPs and are entitled to exclusive early bird offers and discounts on future accessories.

The Cycle Mower X story

Why has Copenhagen been called the happiest city on Earth?  BIKING!

Riding a bike gives you exercise, allows you to move freely and is the greenest form of transportation as well as mowing the lawn at the same time. 

We realise that for some people mowing the lawn is not as enjoyable  as “riding a bike” and there can be many obstacles along the way that prevent you from even considering  happy mowing  as an option in your lifestyle.

We think people would be happier on a mower  that could actually remove all the downsides of mowing. That’s why we created Cycle Mower X: to show the world how much fun, convenience and reward riding a bike for mowing the lawn can be.  So you have freedom and the constant advantage of doing the right thing: for yourself, for others, for the planet.

 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How much does shipping cost?

A: Shipping is set to $20 or more due to the fact that we ship worldwide directly from our factory in Asia. It is also one of the reasons its possible to keep Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit prices so competitive, as there are no intermediaries between you and the factory.
NB: Application of extra shipping costs:  if you are in a “difficult to ship area”, such as remote locations, extra shipping costs may be applied. Please also note that some destinations, such as remote islands, can prove simply impossible to ship to. If you think you live in a hard-to-reach location, then please contact us before placing your order.

 

Q: I live in Australia, can I pick it up myself?

A: Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit is ordered in bulk and will be shipping to individuals directly from our assembly in Asia, as well as to regional commercial warehouses that is not setup for walk-in or local pickup.
Cycle Mower X trailer kit will be shipped via ground shipping to your address we have on file.

 

Q: Why is my Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit spec’d with a component that differs from that listed on your site?

A: Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit is still in its prototype stage, so some components are subject to change if we find better, more suitable replacements. Once past this stage, we will continue to reserve the right to switch components for ones equal or higher in value. The purpose of this is to ensure that the customer continues to get the best value kit for the price.

Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?

A: Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit come with 12 month limited manufacturer's warranty. Should you encounter some production related manufacturer’s defect during this time, we will take care of it according to our warranty. As many elements of a kit may get damaged due to normal cycling use/natural ware, we do not offer warranty on parts such as clamp, nuts and bolts, round bar, etc. For more details, please contact our customer service department.

 

Q: What is your returns policy?

A:We are so confident that you will love your new Cycle Mower X so much, that we offer you a 14-day money back guarantee when you have received your bike if you are not satisfied. If you decide to return your bike it must be in new and resell-able condition. The bike must be returned to our warehouse and the shipping cost must be covered by you.

Q: What about spare parts? Can any bike shop assist me?

A: The components are fairly standard, so you can upgrade/repair/customize your bike as you wish with other parts either from us or your local bike shop.

 

Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?

A:The backer is responsible for any additional taxes, duties, and VAT. Taxes, duties, and VAT vary from country to country.

In the US, the taxes, duties, and VAT are 0%. In Europe, the amount is 25% in VAT and 6% in duties. For other countries, please check the regulations in your country before purchasing.

Please note that taxes, duties, and VAT will be collected after the campaign and before shipping. We will send payment links, invoice overview and ask for a final delivery address confirmation before we ship your Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit. 

Q: Can I test ride a Cycle Mower X?

A: We offer test rides in Mittagong NSW Australia. Contact us by email us hello@cyclemowerx.com for a test ride.

We hope to be able to offer test rides and demonstrations in other countries in the future.

 

Q: Does Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit come in different sizes? 

A: Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit is designed to fit most brand of reel mower, meaning that the size from 16" to 20" according to your reel mower. 

 

Q: Can I get a refund?

A:Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.

In the event we are unable to deliver your  Cycle Mower X trailer kit to your location due to any legal restrictions on the import or delivery of your kit, we shall refund you 75% of the amount on your indiegogo campaign contribution. You are responsible for determining whether its legal to import, deliver, and operate the Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit at your location. In the even you cancel your Indiegogo contribution more than 10 days after it was made, we will assess an administration fee of 25% of your pledge and shall refund the remainder. 

 

Q: Can I change my order?

A: Yes, it is possible to upgrade or downgrade your size. If we are still in the campaign period, the best way is to ask for a refund is through your profile on Indiegogo where you’ll find a “refund” button. And then “back” a new perk/make the order again. If the order is locked and you are transferred to our database, we charge an additional fee on 50 USD in administration fees.


Cycle Mower X Trailer Kit is Design Registered with the Australia Intellectual Property Office 
 

Additional questions? 
Contact us at hello@orroro.com

Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ

story:
What is the Bakcheion?
Bakcheion (Βακχεῖον) is a sacred guild honoring Dionysos Bakcheios, the god of ecstatic deliverance. Formed with the sole intent of hosting a Dionysian ritual at Many Gods West 2015, the Bakcheion includes members from all over the United States and the polytheist and pagan spectrums.

The Ritual
Held on the 1st of August at the conference hotel. The ritual will be open to registered participants and conference members. It will include a devotional performance, music and offerings in honour of Dionysos and his retinue. 

Impact
Foremost, this sacred act is dedicated to Dionysos with the intent of honoring and pleasing our beloved god. However, this ritual will also be an opportunity for pagan community members to come together in joint celebration; some, for the first time. Participants come from different backgrounds. 

It is our hope that the work we do and the energy created will have an impact that will resonate throughout the polytheist and pagan community--granting blessings, strengthening bonds and establishing networks. Looking towards the future, the success of this ritual has the potential to be a strong impetus for creating future Dionysian gatherings and events.

Call for Donations
The Bakcheion consists of volunteers with members offering their services for free and out of their own pockets. As some relief, we're calling for donations to help cover member travel expenses, accommodation and performance costs; including props and materials, libations / offerings and whatever other expenses may surprise us. If donations exceed the asking amount, it will be distributed back into supporting the polytheist community.

Perks

Bakcheion
(Βακχεῖον) is a sacred guild honoring Dionysos Bakcheios, the god of ecstatic
deliverance. Formed with the sole intent of hosting a Dionysian ritual at Many Gods West 2015, the Bakcheion includes members from all over
the United States and the polytheist and pagan spectrums.

The
Ritual
Held on
the 1st of August at the conference hotel. The ritual will be
open to registered participants and conference members. It will include a
devotional performance, music and offerings in honour of Dionysos and his
retinue. 

Impact
Foremost,
this sacred act is dedicated to Dionysos with the intent of honoring and pleasing
our beloved god. However, this ritual will also be an opportunity for pagan
community members to come together in joint celebration; some, for the first
time. Participants come from different backgrounds. 

It is our
hope that the work we do and the energy created will have an impact that will
resonate throughout the polytheist and pagan community--granting blessings,
strengthening bonds and establishing networks. Looking towards the future, the
success of this ritual has the potential to be a strong impetus for creating
future Dionysian gatherings and events.

for Donations

story:
Short Summary

It happened so many times in the past. But for me personally, it seems not the case when I've heard about such a tragedy like the Malaysia Flight 370. Furthermore, watching victims relatives grieving with such anger simply because they were unable to burry their love ones in dignity, was chocking and heart broken.                                                            
In such a time of well advanced technology, have we tried enough to address these type of problems the way we should, I've been asking myself. Going back to what happened to flight 370, there are many unanswered questions that need to be addressed, but this time with new ideas.  With over twenty years of experience in the manufacturing industry, I felt the need to tackle this challenge head on. Then all a sudden, a lot of questions started pouring in. 

What if, we could come up with a system that would help us pinpoint or get to the trouble site a little faster, instead of searching for weeks, months, or even years?
That could help answering some of the questions we've all tried to ask ourselves after such a tragedy. When did the passengers died, or did all of them died at the same time? For how long they were alive after the crash? Could some lives be saved if help got to them sooner?

Also what if, the Air Traffic Controller did have a better option to re-establish communication with the airplane after it disappeared from the radar?

Again what if, and only if, we could take a snapshot of the inside of the airplane, just to have a clear idea of what was going on prior to the crash. Were passengers and crew members unresponsive? Was there any hypoxia event in the cockpit? Why the pilots did not answer the call? The list can go on and on. That left us with so many questions, but very few answers. 

That's the reason we're asking you to join the challenge and make a difference while saving lives all around  the world.

What We Need & What You Get

OFERS is currently patent pending. If we don't reach our goal, our first priority would be to start the patent process in the US and abroad.

It's not so easy to evaluate a program this magnitude. That's why this fundraising is focus primarily on patents and prototype. While the technology that will likely make this project possible may already available, the man power required will be tremendous. We will encourage private high-tech companies and universities to bid on the project while providing their best approach to make this project a reality. Also, not to mention a joint effort of the government agencies all over the world which must play a big role in making this project a reality. This is a world wide campaign for a world wide cause. Once a prototype is available and fully tested, efforts will be made to demonstrate it to the world. One of the best way to do so, if possible, would be to feature OFERS in either a movie or a documentary. Hello Hollywood, you're on notice. We'll see. So as you can see, this fundraising may not be the last, no matter how much money this campaign will raise.

OFERS is currently patent pending. If we don't reach our goal, our first priority would be to start the patent process in the US and abroad.  

The Impact

  Pre-flight safety demonstration like the emergency exits, oxygen mask, life vest and others are not to entertain. They're a reminder that we're about to embark into a serious journey to say the least, whether we want to admit it or not. While this project's main focus is to locate and track a plane in distress, it may also be the tip of the iceberg for future safety and security improvements. OFERS may be designed to even take control of an airplane in some circumstances. Even though the aviation industry is safer than it was many years ago, flying  is still a big concern, with no exception whatsover. OFER tends to bring some hope and confidence to this industry. Surviving a plane crash depends greatly on how fast the rescue team gets to the crash site. OFERS may be there not only to show the way, but also to witness and recite the story later.

This campaign, contrary to many others, is not about pre-selling a product which will likely become obsolete or outdated sooner or later. Rather, it's about impacting the lives of people across the globe for generations to come.

Risks & Challenges

When this idea was in the making, safety was our main priority. OFERS (super drone) is designed to be silent or unseen while onboard the airplane, with no active Wi-Fi connection whatsoever. However, it only becomes active once the plane is in trouble and the drone is launched either by the pilot or remotely. Also, to increase safety and security, the drone (not the airplane) may be designed to operate under the radar, providing a security clearance from the government is granted. Keep in mind that the drone will likely be controlled, maintained and operated by the government itself or a trusted third-party. Our prediction is that OFERS will likely be known as THE INTERNATIONAL AVIATION EMERGENCY RESPONSE SYSTEM. We are confident OFERS will be safe and useful to people around the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't have money to contribute? Do something. Grab your phone or computer and let everyone you know in the world about this project. This project will likely save someone's life one day, and it could be their own. Remember: planes have  crashed and lost before, and it will likely happen again.

story:
The lack of quality light/indicator systems on electric scooters can be one of the main causes of accidents on the roads.

 

bSeen it’s a professional light and indicator system that guarantees the riders' safety, and makes turning intentions visible to other road users:

Day or night

Unlike conventional 5 Volt LED sidelights and/or rechargeable USB systems - which are not bright enough to be seen during the day light - bSeen it's a true 12 Volt system and incredibly bright, with 200 Lumens LED units.

 

 

bSeen is the world's first and only 12V system sold as a "do it yourself" kit, that integrates light, indicators and horn in one single package, suitable for all electric scooters, and in line with existing automotive industry regulations.

 
 
 
Quick tutorial video - How to install bSeen on a Xiaomi M365
 

 

 

At bSeen we are already producing and shipping our systems, and you can visit us at any time at www.bseen.co.uk.

Since June 2019 we developed 4 main systems, being one of them especially designed for the world's best-selling electric scooter - the Xiaomi M365.

 
bSeen is a universal "do it yourself kit" and fits most of electric scooters on the market. We developed a small print electronic control unit, which can be fitted anywhere, inside of any electric scooter's deck.
 
bSeen is plugged directly to any electric scooter battery pack via an adaptor cable and connector,  making it an integral and a safe system.  Check out our FAQ section and feel free to ask us any question if you require further information. 
 

 

 

At bSeen we are re-shaping the business strategy in order to make the product more competitive and recognised on a global scale.

 

There are millions of electric scooters worldwide sharing busy roads with cars, motorbikes, lorries, public transport and other vehicles. More than just an accessory, bSeen is a professional safety device, designed to fill a gap from almost all electric scooters' manufacturers: lack of basic road safety systems such as indicators.

 

Our ultimate goals are:

  • Improve our marketing and advertising strategies.
  • Built a strong web based sales platform & a network of international Distributors
  • Introducing bSeen to high street retailers.
  • Modernise our existing production, and make the product more competitive, by outsourcing some of its components.

 

bSeen is totally handcrafted in the UK by us in the town of Bournemouth. All components are sourced in raw and carefully assembled in-house by a small team of dedicated engineers. Each kit is made from scratch, which contributes for its high quality built and control, throughout its manufacturing process.

 

 

 

We know bSeen helps riders around the globe, and bringing you on board of this journey will make all difference to turn bSeen's goals possible.

If you're a rider, retailer, installer or just a backer, we offer you the chance to get one of the amazing perks we selected for you. That will support us on achieving our goals.

 

Ride Safe

www.bseen.co.uk

P.S. I have decided to do a preliminary experiment to check on the theory. Follow the discussions on reddit



 My name is Marco and I have a dream! Actually, it's more than a dream.

I've been working in the communications industry for 25 years and specifically satellite communications. I have always had a keen interest in flight and the science that enables us to fly. At some point I realized that rockets just aren't good enough if ever we really want to conquer space and since then I've been looking and researching to see what other possibilities there could be.

Naturally this involved looking into "alternative" science which can be a difficult subject as there are so many claims and stories! Interestingly a very prominent person and his research, although not so well known in "established" science,  kept coming to the forefront. He was Nikola Tesla, well known in the "free-energy" circles.

Now for the sake of this article I will not go into much detail regarding these discoveries. Suffice to say that he did stumble onto something that would have enabled space flight, which rather than sharing he kept to himself, and when he died, it disappeared.

So what does this have to do with my campaign? Well, I believe I have enough information to set up an experiment to test an engine that works on these discoveries by Tesla. This is not based on any of the known patents held by Tesla, and Tesla's work only confirmed the theory I was working on through other research. The basics of this theory involves electro-magnetics (EM). Now before some of you jump up and say that it's impossible, I need to point you to some links wherein research has already been done in this area with some success and to the bewilderment of the scientific community!

Electro Magnetic Drive

Confirmed by Chinese

Clearly something is happening that modern science apparently cannot explain. This is also the basis of the theory I am currently working on, although different from the ones shown. Funny enough, this theory is not really new. It was just rejected in favor of another!

This campaign to me is only the stepping stone to something much bigger, namely starting a space exploration agency where the average Jane or Joe can play a huge part in making it a success. The Wright Brothers were bicycle manufacturers but that did not stop them from building one of the first successful planes. So what stops us (the average Jane and Joe) from building a spaceship!

Interested? Well, then see below how you can play a part!   



As I mentioned above, this campaign ($35 000) is only the kick-start for a much bigger goal, namely a space exploration agency by and for the average Jane and Joe. The biggest challenge in this, I believe, will be Stage I: The Engine Platform (EP), as it is yet still unfamiliar territory.

Before I move onto the specifics of the funding, let me just give you a brief outline of the (future) bigger goal and its different stages that would enable us to start our own space agency:



Depending on the support, we can also run the other stages in parallel with Stage I. This will enable contributors to play a more prominent role by giving ideas and inputs and help out with programming, etc.

Now, back to Stage I where it all starts:

For Stage I I've worked out a budget of $35000 for a 9 month period in which I should be able to verify whether the theory is correct, or not. I already have some equipment and components for the experiment but will need to import additional parts as well. I do not have any expensive measuring equipment but I do not believe it to be necessary for now as the experiment will just be to prove the concept. Test equipment might be necessary at a later stage, but I am confident that I will be able to do without it for now. This will allow me to experiment on a smaller budget (which is important)!  



This comes to a total of $35000.

I will make a detailed expense report available at the end of each month as soon as the money is received from Indiegogo. 

                      Mission patch (pictured above).



Each contributor will receive a thank you note via email, with an attached (printable) certificate of appreciation for his or her contribution to the campaign. Shoulder patches with the campaign logo, as well as caps, will be made available at a discounted price for small-amount (albeit still important!) contributors and for bigger-amount contributors as a free gift. However, these options will only be available if the $35000 budget is exceeded by a viable amount, as this is needed for the experiment.    I would love for every contributor to have a patch that they can proudly wear or display, especially as this could be the start of much greater things - us average citizens having our own space agency! Sounds too big an accomplishment? 
In today's world just about everything has been taken over by big corporations, but the technology they are using came from individuals. Individuals with big dreams like the Wright brothers (who happened to be bicycle makers)! And so there are many more examples of individuals making a huge difference! Rocketry is not the science of the future and we need to change that. I am confident that I have enough information pointing us in a specific direction that, through diligent research, could enable us to reach this dream.

Fancy your name on a plaque on the moon? When the final goal has been reached (sending a probe to the moon and back) we will leave a plaque on the moon with every contributor's name on it. This plaque might end up having quite a long list of names. In order not to clutter the moon with unnecessary debris, the plaque would be made of thin, flexible aluminum or stainless steel, with the names laser cut into the plate and rolled up in a cylinder which will be left on the moon. 
So what happens to the funds if this campaign does not reach its first goal?  I would be able to buy much needed components with little money, but would battle to find time to physically start and finish the experiment. Half the amount would enable me to buy components and still give me about three months of full-time experimentation, which would be a good start. I did consider doing the campaign via Fixed Funding, but the thought of missing the goal by a few dollars and then losing the opportunity to at least make a start changed my decision. 




The space industry is massive and ever growing with not only governments competing against each other, but now private companies as well (SpaceX and Virgin Galactic for example). They are all investing in rocketry to get their equipment up in space, which is expensive and very much limited in its lifting capability.  Your contribution will help me prove that an EMD (Electro-Magnetic Drive) is the way forward! Naturally, if successful, the impact will be massive. We might want to start with cleaning up the space junk floating around earth after sending a probe to the moon and back. The picture below gives an indication of the amount of debris around earth alone:



 It's clearly a huge problem and one, few companies are willing to invest in. Your contribution could help solve that as well!
Tesla's decision not to share his discovery with the world might seem selfish to some extent but something made him hesitant. As an inventor he depended on private corporations (JP Morgan's Morgan & Company for instance as well as Westinghouse). Unfortunately these corporations had the power to decide the future of his inventions since they were the sole investors. Tesla did not do it for his own personal gain and died a poor man. He was a humanitarian and wanted his inventions to benefit all mankind (and not the few). If crowdfunding had been available in his day, it would have been a very different story!

                      Photo: European Space Agency






There is of course a risk that the experiment fails. Unfortunately, success when researching and developing something new, can never be guaranteed. So what makes me so confident you may ask? Well I'll admit that the idea of wasting someone else's money (if the experiment fails) really bothers me! It's the last thing I would like to do! Failure on the other hand does not bother me in the sense that I will have failed, but wasting other people's money, does. 
Nobody likes failure but it does serve a purpose. To grow stronger one needs to learn through failure (as well as success). In this world, falling down and getting back up gives you much more experience and strength to tackle the next hurdle even though it might hurt. So why am I willing to risk this at the possible expense of others? My answer to this lies in the information that I've gathered over the years. It's one thing to develop a theory and try to test it just based on your own theory. It's another thing to constantly go over the theory and reassess with new information to check if there is any validity in the theory. This theory is not mine. It's a continuation of various ideas and theories thought out before by others of which Tesla seems to have gotten the closest that we know of. That inspires me to take the leap and hopefully I can inspire you to join me!

Let's look at it in perspective. If 35000 people each contribute $1 we will reach the objective of $35000. So how bad would loosing $1 be? Or even $5 from 7000 people or $10 from 3500 people. Per person that risk becomes very small for the possibility of making a huge difference!




Feel free to share this and join me on Facebook where I'll be able to answer more questions, or send me a message via Indiegogo or follow me on Twitter . Naturally I'm not going to discuss too much regarding the theory! :D


But let's talk about space and the things you would like to see happening when we get this space agency off the ground (pun intended)!

This campaign to me is only the stepping stone to something much bigger, namely starting a space exploration agency where the average Jane or Joe can play a huge part in making it a success. The Wright Brothers were bicycle manufacturers but that did not stop them from building one of the first successful planes. So what stops us (the average Jane and Joe) from building a spaceship!
Interested? Well, then see below how you can play a part!   







 

As I mentioned above, this campaign ($35 000) is only the kick-start for a much bigger goal, namely a space exploration agency by and for the average Jane and Joe. The biggest challenge in this, I believe, will be Stage I: The Engine Platform (EP), as it is yet still unfamiliar territory.


Before I move onto the specifics of the funding, let me just give you a brief outline of the (future) bigger goal and its different stages that would enable us to start our own space agency:





Depending on the support, we can also run the other stages in parallel with Stage I. This will enable contributors to play a more prominent role by giving ideas and inputs and help out with programming, etc.
Now, back to Stage I where it all starts:For Stage I I've worked out a budget of $35000 for a 9 month period in which I should be able to verify whether the theory is correct, or not. I already have some equipment and components for the experiment but will need to import additional parts as well. I do not have any expensive measuring equipment but I do not believe it to be necessary for now as the experiment will just be to prove the concept. Test equipment might be necessary at a later stage, but I am confident that I will be able to do without it for now. This will allow me to experiment on a smaller budget (which is important)!  









This comes to a total of $35000.

I will make a detailed expense report available at the end of each month as soon as the money is received from Indiegogo. 


                      Mission patch (pictured above).






Each contributor will receive a thank you note via email, with an attached (printable) certificate of appreciation for his or her contribution to the campaign. Shoulder patches with the campaign logo, as well as caps, will be made available at a discounted price for small-amount (albeit still important!) contributors and for bigger-amount contributors as a free gift. However, these options will only be available if the $35000 budget is exceeded by a viable amount, as this is needed for the experiment.    I would love for every contributor to have a patch that they can proudly wear or display, especially as this could be the start of much greater things - us average citizens having our own space agency! Sounds too big an accomplishment? 

In today's world just about everything has been taken over by big corporations, but the technology they are using came from individuals. Individuals with big dreams like the Wright brothers (who happened to be bicycle makers)! And so there are many more examples of individuals making a huge difference! Rocketry is not the science of the future and we need to change that. I am confident that I have enough information pointing us in a specific direction that, through diligent research, could enable us to reach this dream.Fancy your name on a plaque on the moon? When the final goal has been reached (sending a probe to the moon and back) we will leave a plaque on the moon with every contributor's name on it. This plaque might end up having quite a long list of names. In order not to clutter the moon with unnecessary debris, the plaque would be made of thin, flexible aluminum or stainless steel, with the names laser cut into the plate and rolled up in a cylinder which will be left on the moon. 
So what happens to the funds if this campaign does not reach its first goal?  I would be able to buy much needed components with little money, but would battle to find time to physically start and finish the experiment. Half the amount would enable me to buy components and still give me about three months of full-time experimentation, which would be a good start. I did consider doing the campaign via Fixed Funding, but the thought of missing the goal by a few dollars and then losing the opportunity to at least make a start changed my decision. 














 
The space industry is massive and ever growing with not only governments competing against each other, but now private companies as well (SpaceX and Virgin Galactic for example). They are all investing in rocketry to get their equipment up in space, which is expensive and very much limited in its lifting capability.  Your contribution will help me prove that an EMD (Electro-Magnetic Drive) is the way forward! Naturally, if successful, the impact will be massive. We might want to start with cleaning up the space junk floating around earth after sending a probe to the moon and back. The picture below gives an indication of the amount of debris around earth alone:


 It's clearly a huge problem and one, few companies are willing to invest in. Your contribution could help solve that as well!
Tesla's decision not to share his discovery with the world might seem selfish to some extent but something made him hesitant. As an inventor he depended on private corporations (JP Morgan's Morgan & Company for instance as well as Westinghouse). Unfortunately these corporations had the power to decide the future of his inventions since they were the sole investors. Tesla did not do it for his own personal gain and died a poor man. He was a humanitarian and wanted his inventions to benefit all mankind (and not the few). If crowdfunding had been available in his day, it would have been a very different story!



                      Photo: European Space Agency










There is of course a risk that the experiment fails. Unfortunately, success when researching and developing something new, can never be guaranteed. So what makes me so confident you may ask? Well I'll admit that the idea of wasting someone else's money (if the experiment fails) really bothers me! It's the last thing I would like to do! Failure on the other hand does not bother me in the sense that I will have failed, but wasting other people's money, does. 
Nobody likes failure but it does serve a purpose. To grow stronger one needs to learn through failure (as well as success). In this world, falling down and getting back up gives you much more experience and strength to tackle the next hurdle even though it might hurt. So why am I willing to risk this at the possible expense of others? My answer to this lies in the information that I've gathered over the years. It's one thing to develop a theory and try to test it just based on your own theory. It's another thing to constantly go over the theory and reassess with new information to check if there is any validity in the theory. This theory is not mine. It's a continuation of various ideas and theories thought out before by others of which Tesla seems to have gotten the closest that we know of. That inspires me to take the leap and hopefully I can inspire you to join me!Let's look at it in perspective. If 35000 people each contribute $1 we will reach the objective of $35000. So how bad would loosing $1 be? Or even $5 from 7000 people or $10 from 3500 people. Per person that risk becomes very small for the possibility of making a huge difference!








Feel free to share this and join me on Facebook where I'll be able to answer more questions, or send me a message via Indiegogo or follow me on Twitter . Naturally I'm not going to discuss too much regarding the theory! :DBut let's talk about space and the things you would like to see happening when we get this space agency off the ground (pun intended)!

story:
THE REVOLUTION IN THE BIKE RACK

Aligator is the first universal, magnetic, trasportable bike rack that respects your bicycle. Aligator is studied in any detail to be the most versatile bike rack of every time. You can use Aligator screwed to the wall or attached with its magnets on an iron surface.

ALIGATOR respects the wheels, it doesn't twist or it doesn't damages your precious bicycle rim; the wheels are supported by the tire. Your bicycle is always in its natural position, perfectly lined up.


ALIGATOR is universal, you can use it for all of your bicycles and it is designed to hold every type of tires of inclusive width between 23 mm and 70 mm.  

The only product for all the bicycles of your family.





ALIGATOR is magnetic: you can attach it to any surface in iron: on your car, on your van, on a street lamp, everywhere!



ALIGATOR is portable.  Bring it to the car wash, attach it on the wall with its powerful magnets and  wash your bicycle without the fear that it falls. 



It is always a problem to transport a bicycle on a pick-up.

ALIGATOR definitively resolves it for you. You can attach the bar to the back of the pick-up and you can drive without damaging your bicycle.


KIT ALIGATOR PICK-UP


ALIGATOR is sure.




ALIGATOR is colorful. It colors your passion with joy and design.


ALIGATOR IS STUDIED IN ANY DETAIL TO BE THE MOST VERSATILE BIKE RACK OF EVERY TIME



FIND YOUR WAY TO USE ALIGATOR.

Send the photo of your alternative use of Aligator and become part of Aligator's tribe. The photo will be published on Aligator-rack.com.


TIMELINE


OUR HISTORY

We are three friends very keen on bicycle and with the common dream to create something unique, revolutionary and useful.

At a point in our life we have lost our job and despite this we decidet to join our dream.

ALIGATOR was born by the need to have an object that can preserve bicycles without damaging them during transportation on pickup or truck.

We have had the first ideas, the sketches were born, we have created the first wooden prototypes and we have made them with a  3D printer.

Idea has taken form,  combining design and functionality and it has produced the smallest bike rack able to follow you anywhere thanks to its powerful magnets.

Help us to give form to ours small, great, revolutionary dream!!!



YOUR SUPPORT

We belive in this project and we need your help to bring ALIGATOR in your house.
As a SUPPORTER you will get ALIGATOR at a very SPECIAL PRIZE!!!
So please help us to create a dream and to improve your life and the life of your friends.
Share our project using the share button on facebook, this will help us to spread the word!

THANK YOU!!!

story:
Short Summary

KONNEH TRANSPORTS LLC

Konneh Transports LLC will be a new transportation company located in Guinea, West Africa.  As a start, Konneh Transports LLC will be transporting people 520 miles between Conakry and N'zerekore while making stops in Kindia, Mamou, Faranah and Gueckedou in a 2016 Toyota Hiace.  Upon expansion we will extend our services to other cities in West Africa.  Konneh Transports LLC will be running services 7 days a week while targeting  entrepreneurs, miners, middle aged men and women along with university students who usually have to travel across the cities for various reasons.  Konneh Transports LLC will provide an easy and convenient way to travel at competitive pricing.  Our intentions are to create many employment opportunities.  We will feature a great team that will be under proper management.  Konneh Transports LLC will also take into consideration a healthy environment for traveling through features included in the Toyota Hiace such as clean air filters and strict emission standards.  The goals are for Konneh Transports LLC to expand to other cities in West Africa using upgraded buses and influence economic growth.

What We Need & What You Get

Konneh Transports LLC will transport "the people" in a 15 seat Toyota Hiace commuter.  The Hiace has many safety features that will improve service overall.

  

 

 

 

  • Funds received will be secured in a bank account for Konneh Transports LLC

PERKS!

  • Have your name displayed on our bus for a month!

"

  • Let other's know "Konneh is on the way" with a T-shirt !

  • Thank you for making this dream a step closer to reality!

 

Current Conditions...

 

The Impact

Konneh Transports LLC will aim to revolutionize the transportation industry in Guinea.  KTLLC will introduce new concepts to the industry by involving technology in commuting through the use of Wi-Fi, navigation system, and entertainment.  KTLLC will also introduce better employment conditions and aim to show gratitude to the employees through better management.  Our reliance is on "the people" to enjoy our service which will urge them to push the leaders to improve road conditions leading to an improvement in our service overall.  It is our intentions of bringing attention to the infrastructure which will provide a smoother ride overall and benefit the country.

 

 

                     Risks & Challenges

There are many risks and challenges associated in business as we all know. Guineas former transportation company is

No longer in service...

 

"Sotragui" failed due to buses given to them by China not being properly maintained, along with poor management which led to employment strikes.  Because of those events a challenge for KTLLC would be regaining trust from "the people" and assuring them a transformation in the industry.  To prevent from making the same mistakes as the former company, KTLLC will continue to provide maintenance for the Toyota Hiace which is more compatible for the current road conditions alongside an investment into infrastructure.  Our advantage of being a private sector will prevent the occurrence of previous events by having a great management team.  Konneh Transports LLC management team will consist of people with better knowledge using standard business practices and retaining value of "the people".

Conditions

The current road conditions are also a challenge.  With many of the countries roads unpaved, KTLLC will solve these challenges using a more compatible vehicle that will give us the opportunity of investing into infrastructure for better roads.

It is speculated that 

Even though this new company may pose as an indirect competitor, Konneh Transports LLC will have the advantage of being a private company with a better management system providing more knowledge and services with technological features. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Word of mouth: Let "the people" know about the campaign!

  • Share our campaign via social media

  • Dont forget the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

-TARATA KONNEH

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Tim Carolin.  I live near the majestic Glacier National Park in Montana.  I have been working on a self empowerment tool for everyone, from the adventurist to third world living, because  we trust nature for our survival and entertainment.  My commitment to our human family inspired me to expand my focus on the transportation  alternative energy market.  It is so important to me that we have clean air and water for our children.  My teacher and mentor, Ryin has shown me how fun life should be. There is always a place to explore being a real soul adventurer, reveling in pushing boundaries, and she is only 13 years old. With your help we will create a path for the next generation to live well, thrive and be happy. This is your chance to be part of a world changing project that will benefit everyone for generations. You can be part of saving our Blue Planet and cleaning up the environment, while having more fun that you ever imagined!  We need your love for nature to help fund the manufacturing of KYMIRA. If we don't reach our goal the backers funding will go to securing 12 approved European countries for patent protection on the Rim Drive and product development.  Be one of the lucky ones that gets a production bike first and show the way of sustainability to your friends, while empowering your life!   I have been mentored by Jere Perchy, the best of the best in the biking and manufacturing industry. Together, with his proven track record we will bring you the "highest quality product available on the planet". We have almost 9 years of product development in this rim driven, regenerative electric bike. We have already faced and overcome our greatest obstacle of patenting and developing a dependable drive system and regenerative methods. Now we need your support to take it all the way to manufacturing and get KYMIRA into the world. UNITED as ONE TRIBE we will bring balance to our world and save countless endangered species from extinction, while having the time of our lives riding our bikes.

  • KYMIRA will launch you up to 60 mph with the capability to haul Max 1000lbs, utilizing natures forces to regenerate the battery. Charge in life while recharging!

  • The power storage system has several passive charge systems. If you drain your bike from extreme riding from high speed or heavy towing it will still recover in record time! It is all dependent on nature's forces how fast it will recharge and how much power you used.

  • Stationary pedal charging makes recovering your power even faster with double leg kick stand. Warm up pedaling your breakfast smoothie with your own power!

  •  KYMIRA is empowered by way of perimeter braking and downshifting, regenerating high power, while driving. Adjust on the fly with twist selector ring. (Left hand bar)

  • Pedalic torque sensor bottom bracket turns your legs super human or use the twist throttle ring. (Right hand bar)

  • Riding in ECO Mode max speed 35mph can maintain battery life determined by load, riding conditions and human response through twist adjustments. This bike needs you to fine tune your operation style for max efficiency! (6,400 watts max motor power in Eco mode)

  • Aerodynamic fairing/brush guard with led head light

  • S,M,L Frame size and only 65lbs!

  • Waterproof frame design with EMP shielding encasing electrical components.

  • High torque towing circuitry for heavy loads.

  • Never plug in again with KYMIRA zero emission vehicle!
     
        KYMIRA Features
        -6 ways to regenerate power
        - Patented Rim Drive 2WD
        -Motors combined output 13,000 watts
        - Performance/Eco electric transmission
        -2 person adjustable Suspension Seat Max 420lbs
        -Towing package, (trailer optional) Max 580lbs
        -14.5V auxiliary power supply and 5V usb
        -PTO for belt drive
        -Digital display
